13.content:
Justin was good looking. Really good looking. He could have easily dated any girl (or guy) we wanted. Being the hottest male at a summer camp wasn't really anything new for the male, as he was usually recognized first for his looks. As soon as the other guys at the camp laid eyes on him, they were instantly filled with jealousy. I mean, could you blame them? Being able to make all the girls swoon with just a passing glance really was a special ability. Despite being incredibly handsome, Justin was empty on the inside; literally and mentally. The male longed for someone to understand him and love him the way he loved himself. And, although he'd never admit it, he always had a secret fetish for being stuffed. He would dream of being fed and blowing up to an unimaginable size, eventually not even being able to move. Justin would never really do it if he was given a choice, he'd lose his wondrous six pack and natural charm.

The host of the show, Chris McLean, gathered all of the campers together to speak to them. He gave a short introduction of himself and explained the basic rules of the island; what to do and what not to do. After finishing his explanation, he told the campers to get unpacked and head into the dining hall, as it was time to eat. Justin felt relieved at that statement, having not eaten for several hours now.

Justin unpacked his belonging quickly and rushed into the mess hall, first in line to receive his food. Chef eyed him oddly as he dropped a huge load of what Justin could only hope was a sloppy joe. Despite the food looking like it belonged in a garbage can and not on his plate, the male happily accepted the food. He took a seat at one of the tables and eagerly began feasting on the burger, even more hungry then what he was before. The other male members filed in around him with their food, also starving. Through making idle chat with a boy sitting next to him named Trent, he found out that the females wouldn't be joining them for the meal, as it would take them a while to unpack everything they had brought. Justin continued talking with the other boy until he swallowed the last bite of his meal. "That wasn't so bad and hey, this guy's kind of cute." Still incredibly hungry, Justin approached the service counter and asked Chef for some more food.

"You want some more food muscle man?" Chef asked, giving the teen a questioning eye. "Sure, come on back and I'll get you some more food." He nodded, smiling deviously. Justin, uncaring, stepped back through the push door and took a seat on a chair Chef guided him to. "Now just sit tight, I'll be right back." Chef told the male, grinning even wider now. Chef walked through another door off to the side of the kitchen and walked through it, leaving Justin alone. Justin looked around the kitchen for a brief second. It wasn't exactly what he would call sanitary, but hey, a kitchen was a kitchen. A few moments later Chef returned with his hands behind his back, quietly tip-toeing his way behind the chair Justin was seated. Without warning, Chef grabbed Justin's arms and whipped them behind the back of the chair, tying them together and around the chair.

"Hey, what are you doing?" Justin shouted, causing Chef to grin. "You're about to get everything you want, just sit tight and I'll be right back." Chef stated, happily strolling back into the room he was previously in. Now that Justin's alone, he...

131.content:
Justin, not wanting to wait and see what Chef was planning, he screamed as loud as he could, "Hey! Help! Can anyone hear me? I'm trapped in the kitchen!" Several seconds went by with no sound from anyone, not even the cook himself. Just as Justin was about to call again, the push door gently glided open and in stepped the male Justin was talking with earlier, Trent. "Trent! Thank god you're here! I need you to untie me, the crazy chef has me tied." Justin pleaded, getting no reaction from Trent. "Uh, are you going to help me?" Justin asked, wondering what the other teen was thinking.

Suddenly, the door that Chef had gone through busted open; Chef stepping out of it with several trays of food loaded in his arms. "Ah, looks like we have some help." Chef laughed, staring at Trent. "You going to help me or not?" The cook asked, approaching Justin. "If not, you'll just get to watch me feed this kid until he can't eat anymore, and then I'll feed him until he can't move." Justin gulped, hoping Trent would actually help him instead of assisting Chef. "Fine then, I'll get started on my own."

Chef picked up some of the grub he had piled on one of trays and forcefully shoved it in Justin's mouth, making the boy swallow it. "What're you doing?" Justin choked, coughing from the food he had just been fed. "Isn't it obvious boy, I'm gonna be feeding you until you can't move anymore." Justin's eye grew wide, but he wasn't nervous or scared. In reality, this is actually what he had been dreaming about. He just wasn't sure if he was ready for it. "Open wide, here comes more." Chef announced, now picking up two pieces of food and forcing them down Justin's throat, causing him to cough again.

Get over here and help me stuff this kid." Chef called, facing Trent. Trent nodded slowly and stepped over to the male, grabbing two handfuls of food and tossing them into Justin's mouth. "Is he into this too?" Justin thought as Chef and Trent began taking turns force feeding Justin food. He had to admit, he really was enjoying all the food. He could feel his stomach growing larger and larger, just waiting to bust of the shirt he was wearing. The feeding continued for several more minutes, Justin's stomach not even being close to full. Owen smiled. "I am glad Leshawna, especially since well, I don't think I can move my legs right now anyways." Leshawna giggled. "That's okay. Besides, it just gives me more to do." They then let out a wet belch which causes Owen to laugh. "You're getting there sweetie, just a bit more."

"Thank you, I bet you're glad to have someone like me over Izzy now don't you?"

"Oh absolutely, she tried to stop me from gaining this weight and was nuts. But you're okay with my size and down-to-earth." Owen said before rubbing his moobs. Leshawna stopped rubbing his belly and proceeded to climb up his stomach and moved his hands away to massage them instead. "I am glad to hear that, a big guy like you should be with a big person as well, not with a sissy like Izzy."

"Exactly!" Owen said before letting out another belch. "You get me. And you are also okay with gaining a few pounds which I like."

Leshawna smirked. "I can also gain some more since I am technically both genders now. Or we can keep stuffing you like a pig first until you can't hold that gas in anymore and let out the most luscious fart you ever released."

Owen ponders this for a moment while Leshawna continues massaging and reaches his decision.

15.title: More Choices

151.content: So how will the bad boy Duncan gain weight ?
151.title: Duncan

choices: Duncan finds a partner to secretly train him
Alejandro backs off a little and at least begins to work on a gradual slope
1511.content:
Duncan was a man and a bad-ass. He could handle whatever anyone threw his way and would never back down from a challenge. Which is why he found himself agreeing to this absurd challenge to bulk up for a few months and then lose all the weight, if he could. That might not have been such a good idea since his friend/rival/enemy/sometimes lover Alejandro (they had a very complicated relationship that nobody could figure out) posed it and then claimed to full control of everything Duncan was going to eat for the next 6 months and when. Of course Alejandro was going to bankroll it being rich so at least Duncan had free meals for the next while but that left Alejandro in charge. Duncan could back down but that would leave his reputation in tatters and no one would ever take him seriously or fear him again and after working so hard for all that, no way is he going to let that happen.

Alejandro first took him out for breakfast and ruthlessly ordered the 4 pancakes with a side of sausage, bacon, and eggs special. He wasn't going to start easy and a meal didn't actually count as complete unless it was eaten in its entirety. This made the contest even more tricky because it wasn't just 6 months, it was 6 months of meals that required full completion and any that weren't would have to be redone at a later date until finished. While Alejandro was keeping record, Duncan was also keeping meal records to make sure Alejandro wouldn't at a later date cheat and order more than the original meal to be made up since Alejandro did do stuff like that in other contests.

Unfortunately, Duncan couldn't do it all the way, only able to eat 3 and a half pancakes and most of the sausage/bacon/eggs before being too full to manage anymore which made Alejandro smirk as he circled it as a redo like he planned. Duncan could see where this was going and Alejandro was going to play it to do nearly inconsumable amounts of food to greatly extend the deadline and how much Duncan was going to eat. He was going to need to figure out a way to stop that as he doubted Alejandro would show any mercy and there was no way he was going to back out against this guy.
1511.title: story 1

15111.content:
"I'm going to go wash up before we go to the next place." Alejandro said as he got up and walked towards the restaurant's bathroom. Duncan took this opportunity to pull out his cell phone and quickly dial his buddy, Geoff. The phone rang several times before Geoff answered, "Heeeey, what's up, D-Man?"

"Geoff, I can't believe I'm saying this, but I need your help. I made this stupid bet with Al that I could gain a bunch of weight, and then lose it all. Problem is, if I don't finish all of the food he gives me at each meal, he makes me eat it again later. He's trying to make the bet last longer than we agreed and I'm screwed cause I can't finish it all. Do you think you could help train me?"

Geoff chuckled, "Sure thing, dude!! I'm more than happy to help a bro out."

Duncan sighed in relief, "Oh, thank god. Come over at midnight and we can start. Al plans on leaving my house at ten." Duncan hung up his phone just as Alejandro exited the bathroom and walked over, "So, are you ready to go? We're moving on to the lunch meal."

Duncan bit his lower lip nervously. He was still stuffed from the meal he just had. His stomach was bloated and pushing against his skin tight shirt, "Sure..." He lifted himself up from the couch with a grunt, and followed Al back to his car. The two headed towards...
15111.title: Asking for help.

choices: Duncan meets with Geoff that night after Alejandro leaves
Alejandro takes Duncan out for dinner (after rest of course)
151112.content:
They headed to the local burger joint and Alejandro helped Duncan out of the car.
"I know how much you like burgers," Alejandro said as his hands patted Duncan's stuffed belly. "You always say you always have room for a good burger or two. Well, we'll see you make good on your boast now," he taunted and Duncan pushed him off.
"You bet I will," Duncan said confidently although inside he wasn't so sure as he never had big meals so close together before and he was still stuffed with his breakfast meal, let alone with soon to be at the very least a hamburger or two of some size. But he wasn't going to let Al have the pleasure of rattling him.
"We'll see," and with that Alejandro and he remained quiet for a few minutes until they got up to the cashier. Alejandro gave a bright smile to the cashier girl and she was start-struck. 'Big mistake lady' thought Duncan as he watched Alejandro flirt a bit, smiling all the while as he pretty much walked off without paying and not even noticing.

"You didn't pay for that," Duncan said once they sat down at a table and Alejandro laughed a bit.
"Neither do you all the time. I don't see why you care."
"You can afford it even easier than I can."
"It's so much more fun this way though," Alejandro said, smiling that disarming smile again that continually fooled the unwary into doing stupid things.
"Whatever. Let's just get this over with you weirdo." Alejandro tutted but said nothing in reply to that although Duncan knew he was angry. Maybe he shouldn't piss him off so much but he couldn't help it.

"Two double quarter pounders, large extra fries, and large drink," Al intoned, placing the objects in front of you. Duncan groaned and Alejandro smiled again.
"Remember, throwing up is also immediate failure to complete meal," he said smugly. Duncan just sighed and rolled his shoulders back.
"Okay, I get it, but you're going to have to leave a reasonable time to digest, not just skip from one meal straight into the other." Alejandro shook his head smiling.
"Very well, I promise to most of the time leave some room to digest more and space the meals out-most of the time."
"Why most of the time?"
"Because every now and then I want to have fun in watching you squirm and struggle a bit."
"You already get to see me struggle every meal."
"True, but extra. Nonetheless, I promise not to do it very much. After all, if you throw up before you even begin, I don't get anything out of it." Al really was evil.

Duncan looked at the food, feeling a little sick. Despite what Al said, he was sure Al wouldn't mind at least making him do the indignity to throw up every now and then. This was a meal he could probably comfortably do on an empty stomach and really hungry. But since he was still stuffed full of pancakes, sausages, eggs, and bacon, this was definitely going to be a bit hellish. Damn his manliness and inability to refuse dares. Alejandro just smirks at him watching.

"Do you give in?" he asks, needling. "A wimp who can't even eat a measly couple of burgers and fries?" Duncan was tempted to throw them at him but refrained because he wasn't going to lower himself down to that level. That and Alejandro would make him pay for it later probably.

"Nah, just catching a second wind here," Duncan said trying to calm his unhappy stomach. He dipped the buns in his drink and Alejandro looked at him curiously.
"They go down easier if wet," Duncan explained and Alejandro shrugged.
"Sure, whatever. It doesn't really matter what method you use as long as in the end, everything is gone."

When he managed to finally restrain the urge to puke, he took a bite and moaned in delight at the taste. No matter how evil Alejandro was, at least he got good food. He might actually be able to do this! Maybe anyways. Taking a few more bites, he took a sip of his drink. "Thank god for Dr. Pepper," Duncan murmured as he continued. Dr. Pepper made everything better. Already the pain in his belly was receding to the background of his mind as he munched on his hamburgers and absently scratched his belly at the other end. Alejandro maintained the blank pokerface which would have been creepy if Duncan payed any attention to it but he was too busy with his food. Alejandro couldn't but help lift a corner of his mouth when he saw Duncan's white belly poking out which Duncan paid no mind to.

The first burger went down pretty easily thanks to the bread trick and Dr. Pepper and how delicious it was but it was definitely harder now with his pants digging in against his stomach. Undoing his skull belt, he paused and undid his pant button at well, sighing as the pressure disappeared. Giving a loud burp, he continued on his task of the next burger.

Definitely more difficult and he was taking many, many sips of his drink with it while Alejandro seemed to be paying no attention at all, texting on his phone. Bastard. When he finally finished, Duncan was panting a bit rubbing his stomach furiously, trying to ease the pain and keep from throwing up. It was pretty close. Alejandro got up and bent over to him.

"Need help?" he asked and Duncan really wished he could have spat at him but it hurt too much and Alejandro was amazing at massaging his aching belly. However it felt so amazing that he burped in Alejandro's face. Sadly, he was more amused rather than disgusted.

"Hot darling. Still have room for more though so get to it," he said nodding at the remaining drink and fries. Duncan flipped him off which did nothing but cause Alejandro to laugh again and left Duncan frustrated that almost nothing bothered that guy. Grunting, Duncan steeled himself for the next part and stuffed his face with fries as fast as he could, barely chewing and stuffing more in. If he left his mouth empty for even a second, he knew he would be unable to finish and he was not going to let that happen. Sooner than he thought, the fries were gone and grinning (or rather, grimacing) in victory, he chugged the rest of the drink which was mainly empty from his frequent sipping earlier, and slammed it down for emphasis letting out a massive belch that caused people to turn and look at them and finally knocked Alejandro out of that calm emotionless appearance, looking rather turned on and surprised.

"Buuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuurrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrpppppppp, ah yeah, I win." Duncan said, thumping his chest. Alejandro gave a shaky nod before going into sexy overconfident.
"True but you still have many more before you even coming close to the war, And trust me, it's not going to be easy." Duncan belched again, crossing his arms behind his head and showing his bloated belly,
"I look forward to it."
151112.title: A burger joint

choices: A hour later, he finishes it.
An hour later, he doesn't finish it.
1511122.content:
Duncan grunted as he shifted in the passenger seat of Alejandro's car, trying to pull his shirt down over his bloated stomach but failing. The mohawked teen signed and just rubbed his stuffed belly, letting the car ride soothe him, "So where are we going now? Out to stuff me to the point of bursting again?" Al chuckled, "Nonsense. You're obviously to full for that, so I'm taking you back to your house to rest that full stomach of yours." He said, patting Duncan's bloated belly. Duncan rolled his eyes and kept to himself the rest of the ride.

Al dropped Duncan off at his house and drove off to his new place in town, leaving Duncan alone to drag his tired, stuffed body to the front door. He fished his keys out of his pocket, opened the front door, dropped his body onto the couch, and passed out. Hours passed as Duncan slept off his two meals, but he was woken up by a loud knocking at his front door. He lifted himself off of the couch, stretched, and yawned, before walking over to the door and opening it to see Alejandro, "Well, you look well rested. Your face no longer matches that shade of green on your mohawk." Duncan scoffed, "Yeah, I'm feeling better. Where are we going next?"

A sly grin spread across Alejandro's face, "A steak house. Your dinner meal are going to be VERY large. Let's hope that little stomach of yours can handle it." Al's eyes traveled down to Duncan's stomach and he grinned, "Look's like your stomach isn't as little as it was before." Duncan looked down and lifted his up his shirt to see that Al was right. His once bloated stomach and shrunken down, and he had a very small curve to his abdomen. His abs were still visible, but were slightly less defined. Al reached down and pinched a small bit of Duncan's new belly, "It's actually kind of cute." Duncan swatted his hand away, "You sure are getting some weird kick out of this, huh?"

Al shrugged and turned around, headed back to his car. Duncan sighed and followed, his stomach already growling. He wasn't sure if it was for food or if it was because it knew it was about to go through hell. The two reached the steak house soon and parked, heading inside. The interior of the place had an old western theme and the smell of steak and beer filled the air. Duncan and Al were helped to a booth, where their waitress came over and set down a large basket of buttery dinner rolls. "What can I get you two boys?" She asked, pulling her notebook out of her apron and clicking the end of her pen.

Al leaned forward and smiled, "I already ate, but my friend here would like The Frontier Special with a Dr. Pepper." Duncan raised an eyebrow, and looked at the waitress, "What is that exactly?" he asked. The waitress finished scribbling down the order and looked at Duncan, "The Frontier Special is a 12 oz steak, fully loaded baked potato, corn bread, and a 40 oz soda." Duncan's eyes turned towards Al, who had his usual cock smirk on. The waitress walked away and Al sat back, "Don't forget, you have to eat everything I get you. Including that basket of rolls." Duncan frowned at Al, who wasn't kidding when he said that the dinner meal would be big. Without saying another word, Duncan grabbed the basket of rolls and pulled them closer, shoving the first one into his mouth. Once he tasted it, he had completely forgotten he was angry at Al. The rolls were so buttery and sweet that he began to devour them like crazy.

Al smirked the entire time as Duncan stuffed his face with the dinner rolls. The large basket was empty in a matter of minutes and Duncan pushed it away and grinned at Al, "I can handle this." Al chuckled, "Really? Cause your order is here." The waitress set the large plate down in front of Duncan, along with his massive soda and another basket of rolls. Duncan stared down at the plate in front of him, a little intimidated. The steak was large and took up half of the plate, the other half covered up by the baked potato, which had butter, sour cream, chives, and bacon bits on it. Duncan lifted up his fork and knife and cut into the first bite of steak, putting it in his mouth and quickly began chewing the tender meat.
1511122.title: The Frontier Special

choices: He would give Duncan a day off from eating
He would stay round Duncan's for the night
15111221.content:
"Ooooh... my belly..." Duncan groaned and clutched his full, bloated stomach. Despite being sated halfway through the meal he had managed to force down the remainder of the food, spurred on by his need to beat Alejandro at his own game. It had come at a price however, by the time he'd finished the steak his belt had snapped clean off, being stretched to the limit by his overstuffed belly.

Alejandro had been watching him this whole time but was still completely astonished. He never realised just how driven Duncan really was, let alone how big his apetite could go. Snapping out of his daze he got up and helped lift his large friend out of his chair. He kept an arm around him as they walked slowly out to Al's car, and he couldn't help but sink his fingers into Duncan's soft flesh while the poor guy was still out of it.

A half an hour later and the two had arrived back at Duncan's house. Duncan was still deep in his food coma so Alejandro had no choice but to carry him up to his bed, bridal style. Even for a strong guy Al felt a little winded by the time he'd put Duncan to bed. 'He's really letting himself go...' By this point Alejandro made a rather risky decision:
15111221.title: A hour later, he finishes it.

choices: Duncan had not forgotten but was just surprised
It had totally slipped his mind somewhere and he had
15111222.content:
Duncan of course tried his best to finish it but he knew and Alejandro knew that it wasn't going to happen. However, it wasn't in Duncan's nature to let anything go without trying, Carpe diem and all that. However, the meal was simply too big right now and he'd never eaten so much food in his life in a single day before. He used to consider himself a fairly big eater but man after only a single day, that idea had been pretty much blown to shreds. Maybe a big eater compared to the average person but by no way and means truly a big eater like those mass monsters or even the slighter yet still hungry as heck dudes that one wonders exactly where the food goes.

And truly, he got farther than he thought. He finished those bread rolls (both baskets) which were oh so good and yummy and delicious. And he ate about a third of the meat and made a decent dent in those mashed potatoes and drink before finally throwing in the towel (again unfortunately) for the day with his again stuffed and bloated belly. Alejandro chuckled in sympathy as he moved over again and started again rubbing Duncan's poor belly.

"I know, I know it hurts. But consider it a pretest. By the next time you do this, you'll easily do this and possibly still be hungry afterwards. Won't that be fun?" Duncan nearly shuddered by the thought of how big he would probably have to be in order to do that easily but admitted it did sound kind of fun if he could do it. "It's only your first day and you're well on your way to becoming sexy." Duncan blinked his eyes blearily.

"Er-what was that last part?" he asked and for a second he thought he saw Alejandro blush.
"N-nothing! Just considering what torture I'm going to put you through tomorrow." Duncan burped a bit as he struggled to his feet, looking down at his again exposed growing belly. 'This shirt isn't going to fit much longer,' he thought as he struggled to again pull it down but kept riding up. Alejandro helped him to the car as he was a bit too full for much activity right now and Duncan was fairly sure there were many who were staring at them as they went by, or rather at his again bloated belly. Alejandro pinched his belly all of a sudden and grinned cheekily at Duncan's glare.

"Nice and big," he said and wasn't that such an obvious statement? Alejandro took him back to Duncan's house and helped him to the couch where Duncan once again parked himself.

"See you tomorrow," Alejandro said tipping his head and back out the door he went. Duncan just vegetated for a while, taking a quick nap when all of a sudden the doorbell rang. Confused, Duncan got up and stretched with a big yawn and shuffled to the door and opened it, ready to give whoever it was a big piece of mind. He was shocked when he saw Geoff at the door.

"Geoff, wha-"
"Hey Duncan, I'm here to help you with your problem. Did you forget or something?"
15111222.title: An hour later, he doesn't finish it.

choices: An extra large bucket of fried chicken
151112221.content:
Duncan rubbed his eyes and laughed, "Oh, no, I didn't forget. I just fell asleep for a few minutes. You're here early, though. I said to come over at midnight." Geoff gave Duncan a quizzical look, "Dude, I'm late. It's one in the morning." Duncan blinked. That couldn't be right, Al had just dropped him off at his house ten minutes ago. Duncan looked over at the clock on the cable box and couldn't believe it. He'd been asleep for a good four hours.

Duncan reached down and grabbed the bottom of his shirt, lifting it up over his stomach. It was still bloated and digesting, but it wasn't as hard as it was before.
Geoff looked down and chuckled, "Wow, D. You really ARE putting it on, huh?" Geoff pressed his hand against it and was surprised by how it felt. It was solid and full, but at the same time soft and squishy.

Duncan moved Geoff's hand away and pulled his shirt back down, "Yeah, I know. It sucks, but what can I do about it. I made that stupid dare with Al and now I'm stuck getting fat." Geoff looked up and Duncan and grinned, "Well, I'm here to help with that. I brought over some food for your special training. You ready?" Duncan rubbed his and thought about it. His hand drifted down to his bloated belly and pressed against it. He was still really full and didn't know if eating now would be good, "I don't know, Geoff. I'm still pretty stuffed."

"I can help with that." Geoff said as he took Duncan by the shoulders and lead him to the couch. He had Duncan lay down and Geoff sat the other end. The party boy cracked his knuckles before pressing both of his large hands on Duncan's bloated stomach and rubbing it in slow circles. Duncan was so surprised at how good Geoff was at this that he let out a low groan before belching loudly. Geoff chuckled and the two talked for a good ten minutes while Geoff rubbed Duncan's stomach to help his digestion. Duncan sat up and grunted, "Thanks, Man. I'm feeling a lot better now. So what did you bring over for me to eat?"

Geoff pushed himself off the couch and headed outside, "Lemme go grab it!" Geoff came back moments later with...
151112221.title: Secret Training with Geoff

choices: Alejandro comes the next day with a surprise
Duncan's phone startles him out of his sleep with Alejandro asking where he was
1511122211.content:
"I've brought pizza dude! God's gift to man, teenagers, and alternate life forms everywhere!" Geoff said brightly, coming back. Duncan laughed at the statement. Geoff sure was...something but absolutely right. However Duncan raised his eyebrows when he saw the size of the pizza. Extra-large, really?

"Uh, I thought you were helping me train, not joining in Al's torture of my unfortunate belly." Geoff shook his head good naturedly.
"Not true, not true dude. I mean, I'm not going to make you eat it all and stuff like that although if you could that would be both really cool and impressive right now. No we're just working on stretching your appetite a bit. Kind of think like your stomach as a muscle, because it is in this case, like your biceps and triceps or something. They get bigger through use. You getting me?"

"Yeah, kind of. Although I'm really not following where you're going with this. I know the stomach will get bigger, trust me on that it's not as fun, but...where are you going with this?"

"We're stretching your eating capacity so you'll be able to eat more, more often, and even when you think you can't go on any more. Like building your pectorals with hard work."
"Have you done this before? Because you seem to be knowing a lot" Duncan asked. Geoff turned a bit shifty, looking away and changed the subject.
"I thought about it-now lets go on," he rushed out somewhat uncharacteristically and Duncan wanted to probe him but Geoff would probably bolt and leave him to Al's (fairly non for the most part)existant mercy alone.

"What Alejandro seems to be doing is bombardment and throwing you in the deep end right away. Of course, he himself has nothing to lose doing this so it's okay for him but man, it's going to be hard for you. No practice except his harsh learning curve and you'll probably be stuffed to near capacity everytime very heavily which unfortunately will have to continue. But what I'm going to do is help build endurance and make you enjoy being this full with classical conditioning so the pain will hurt less and less." Duncan just stared at Geoff, blown off his mind.

"Who are you and what have you done to Geoff? Those are a lot of sentences, words, and classical conditioning? I didn't even know such a thing existed," Geoff broke into a grin and tapped his head.

"Not so stupid D-man, I've been practicing. It makes me sound so much smarter doesn't it when you use words like those?" and just like that, Geoff was goofy Geoff again.
"Kay, so let's get started. Take off your clothes." Duncan just stared at him again, shocked.

"I mean your shirt and pants, not your underwear because that would be just inappropiate right now, but I mean it is always easier and more comfortable to do this in just your underwear. And honestly, your shirt is approaching done for at this point and too small to cover anything anyways and just would get in the way. Hell, it was small on you before you started this so now it's getting silly." Geoff did have a point. Even with his relaxed stomach, it still wouldn't go down all the way, showing off his softening middle. It looked less bad removing it than it did with it squeezing against him like that. Geoff reached over and undid the belt taking it as Duncan unzipped and took off his pants.

"I would probably stop wearing this. The way you're going to be stuffed all the time is going to make this redundant and only cause pain for wearing unless you like the thought of having to undo it all the time or something. Whatever floats your boat but it isn't necessary. By the way, nice choice of underwear, I have some just like those," Geoff said nodding at Duncan's striped boxers.

"Now, you're going to eat as much as you can take of this pizza. Any amount is fine but you really have to try. Any leftover could be used as extras for later but for right now, just focus on eating as much pizza as you can take. I am going to help you do this in whatever way you want or if you don't know, I'll choose. But against Al, you need to get used to being constantly stuffed and not feel ill. He is not going to play easy or very fair so you're going to need to be able to have this stretched capacity which is only going to happen if you eat all the time. And yes, it sounds contradictory and painful. You'll probably hate this soon enough as it does hurt although it will hurt less for when Alejandro tries to pull fast ones on you. Your body will constantly need to be bloated with food, kind of like a body builder which we're also going to have to work on if you want to win this bet but more importantly to even be mobile after all this is over. And eventually, despite all this extra food, you'll still be hungry and enjoy it."

Geoff came and sat down on the couch, next to Duncan and opened the box letting the smell of cheese pizza peforate the room and Duncan's belly begin to growl a little. Geoff smiled a bit.
"See? You're hungry already as you become used to eating. Alejandro is kind of follwing a similar principle but definitely meaner and continually adds more for his enjoyment of making you intake it twice or multiple times. Now start eating." Duncan relaxed on the couch on the couch eating pizza, enjoying the dripping and hot cheese as he and Geoff talked about random things and topics jumped all over the place and sometimes became encouragement and admiration of what Duncan was doing. Whenever the last of a slice disappeared, Geoff thrust another into his hand. Geoff even occasionally massaged Duncan's belly and easing the pressure that was building as Duncan belched. Soon enough, the sensation of fullness came back and Duncan slowed although Geoff massaged and talked him into a few more pieces that Geoff generously fed him bit by bit by hand. When all was said and done, about 2/3 of the pizza sat resting in Duncan's belly. Duncan belched again and rubbed it.

"-uuuuurrrrrrrppppp, ah, that feels so much better. You're right Geoff, the pain has gone down a bit. Yeah, it's still there, quite horribly, but earlier I would have probably puked and that was definitely more pizza than I thought I could have. But damn, I feel so friggen huge," Duncan said as he poked the once again the bloated belly that didn't even have a hint of his abs anymore and jiggled it slightly although it didn't move much from content in it." Geoff moved behind him and massaged again as Duncan leaned back tiredly.

"So, so tired. I am going to hate breakfast tomorrow. But thanks for doing this. You're like a life-saver as I would hate to do this unaided against the plotting mastermind that is Alejandro."

"No problem dude. That's what friends are for."
"If there was any way I could repay you..."
"Speak no more of it right now, we'll talk later. But if you feel tired, you should sleep. I'm not going anywhere until you are."
"Okay," Duncan said yawning and closed his eyes, dead asleep and didn't even feel the removal of Geoff's hands as he took the remaining pizza with him and drove off.
1511122211.title: An extra large pizza

choices: His training worked, Duncan finished it and is still hungry.
Duncan needs more training, he can't finish it.
15111222112.content:
Duncan was enjoying a nice quiet slumber on the couch when all of the sudden his phone went on full blast, startling the gaining punk and making him fall off of the couch. Duncan sat up and pressed the answer button, holding it up to his phone, "Hello?" he asked, irritated.
"Now, now, Duncan. Is that the kind of tone you should be taking with the man who's feeding you?" Alejandro said in his usual cocky tone.
"Oh... what's up?" Duncan asked, lifting himself back onto the couch.
"I'm on my way over and I wanted to make sure you were ready for your big breakfast today."

Duncan blinked the sleep out of his eyes, "Lemme jump in the shower first, okay?"
"I'm almost there so make it fast." Al said before he hung up the call. Duncan lifted himself up and walked into the bathroom, flicking the light on. Once his eyes adjusted to the lights, Duncan saw himself in the mirror and looked himself over. He was still fairly fit, his chest and arms retaining the muscle definition he's always loved, but his abs were almost completely gone now. His stomach curved out now, a little tiny bit past his pecs(which weren't as big as say, Geoff's or DJ's) and when he smacked it, it jiggled. Duncan liked the thick, manly sound it made, and he squeezed his new belly fat, enjoying the way it jiggled. He remembered what Geoff had said the last night about how Duncan was going to have to start working out his muscles along with his gaining. Duncan instantly started thinking about all of the super beefy athletes who were super muscular, but also had some serious fat on them. Duncan liked the idea of getting like that, "Maybe this gaining thing isn't gonna be so bad."

Duncan showered fast, leaving his mohawk flat today, and quickly brushed his teeth to get rid of the pizza smell. He didn't want to take the chance of Al finding out about Geoff's training him. Once he made sure his breath was minty fresh, Duncan put a piece of gum in his mouth, just to be safe, and went to go get dressed. Duncan groaned as he looked over his t-shirts. Not a SINGLE shirt was big enough to fit comfortably over his new belly. Duncan sighed as he pulled a shirt over, which clung tightly to his stomach, and threw on his shorts and sneakers just in time. Al was honking his car horn from outside. Duncan hurried out and sat down in Al's passenger seat, "Hey."

Al smiled and leaned over, rubbing Duncan's new belly, "Hey, Gordito. That shirt sure is looking tight on your new belly."
Duncan raised his eyebrow, "What the hell does 'Gordito' mean?"
Al smirked as he pulled out of the driveway, "Chubby. It's my new nickname for you. Now, since you weren't able to finish the breakfast that I had ordered you yesterday, we're going back today to see if you can finish it."

Duncan and Al were seated at a booth and Al ordered the same special that he had gotten Duncan yesterday: 4 pancakes with a side of sausage, bacon, and eggs. The order came quickly and Al put his hands behind his head and smiled, "Eat up, Gordito. You've got a big day ahead of you." Duncan picked up his fork and knife and dug in, hoping that the training from last night works.
15111222112.title: Breakfast, Round Two.

choices: Alejandro does just that and gets Duncan some more food
Alejandro decides to let Duncan's apetite build up for lunch
151112221121.content:
Duncan leaned back in his seat, a smug grin on his face and his belly protruding out. "All finished, guess I'm getting good at this, Al."

Alejandro smiled back, "Yes, it looks like it. That means I'll have to up your intake immeduately then." Duncan's smile left his face almost instantly. "Well, you are the one who said you've improved. A piece of cske, as they say."

At the mere mention of cake Duncan's stomach growled loudly, attracting attention from some of the patrons closest to them. Duncan blushed as Alejandro's eyes went wide. "And it looks like you're still hungry. I guess I should get you some more to eat."
151112221121.title: His training worked, Duncan finished it and is ...

choices: Duncan is dropped off at the gym while Alejandro goes his merry scheming way
151112221122.content:
Duncan threw down the fork and pushed the plate away from his aching belly. Alejandro was very surprised at this turn of events.
"Are you okay?" he asked concerned. "I mean, you ate less than you did yesterday of this. You aren't sick or something are you?"
"No, not really," Duncan said, rubbing his aching belly. "Just full from yesterday," he said and added 'and full of pizza from training with Geoff' in his mind. Yeah he was f-ing full.

"Oh, okay." Alejandro said shrugging. "You'll get used to such large amounts of food eventually so that it wouldn't even be a struggle to get something like this down" Duncan was amused by how similar that sounded to some things Geoff said. Alejandro turned back his usual cocky irritating self. "Failed. So we're going to do this again at a later time. So having some time to kill while we wait for your belly to digest enough to be good to go for lunch, what do you want to do?"

"Hey Alejandro," Duncan asked.
"Yes gorditio?" Alejandro said amused and a smile playing on his mouth and Duncan gritted his teeth a bit.
"Two things I need to know. Do you even eat? I have yet to see you eat once since we started this. And also, I was thinking to help get get the food to serve a better purpose that I would be allowed to work out and lift weights and stuff which will keep me in shape and also burn off energy for more eating. I'd still be beefing up quite a bit but in a sexier more manly and attractive way."

Alejandro looked thoughtful for a moment as he glanced Duncan up and down although Duncan wasn't sure what it was Alejandro was thinking. Then Alejandro smiled hugely and he nodded.

"Sure thing buddy!" he said punching Duncan's arm jovially. "As I said, whatever method you want to use to do this is allowed as long as you eat everything and you don't actively try to lose weight for at least 6 months, probably more. So no cardio and running, heavy weights only but otherwise yeah, it's fine! And honestly, you'd look phenonomenal as a big and beefy powerlifter, so you have no complaints from me if that's what you want to do." Duncan smiled in relief.

"Oh, that's good. I was worried you were trying to turn me into an out of shape fat slob who didn't do much of anything." Alejandro looked shocked.
"You? Never! Not an immobile lazy slob. Possibly fat and lazy, but not immobile. I'd have staged an intervention before we got to that point."
"Why are you doing this anyways? What's in it for you? Duncan asked curious." Alejandro gave a mysterious grin and chuckle.
"Na-ah. That's a secret you have to earn. Just know I am only having your best interests in mind."
"Clearly," Duncan said sarcastically and Alejandro laughed as he reached out and patted Duncan's bloated belly.
"Don't worry amigo, you are perfectly safe. I am a man of my word and honor, much as you are."
"But for my other question, why do you never eat around me?" Duncan asked curious.
"Oh, that's to prevent me from unintended consequences of doing this with you."
"Consequences?"
"Yeah. Many people who work at feeding others tend to be fat or start becoming so while working at such good food. If you were eating at the same time, you'd eat the same thing as your partner and not only that, would try to match them or forget just exactly how much you've eaten." Duncan smirked.

"So you're worried about gaining weight with me as well because you don't trust yourself to not give into temptation."
"Yeah, pretty much." Alejandro said.
"Coward. It's fine for me to be stuffed like a hog but not you." Duncan said bitterly.
"No, I'm not a coward. Just smart. And you look good with the extra weight, I always did think you were a bit too skinny." Alejandro wrapped his arms around Duncan.
"Amigo...Duncan...never forget I mean the best for you, always." Stunned, Duncan watched as Alejandro straightend up and his face changed again. Alejandro gave Duncan's belly a big slap and Duncan burped as it jiggled the slightest.

"Hot. Well, let's get going. We have a lot of work to do. I'm going to go drop you off at the gym for you to do your weight exercises, and remember only such and no cardio, while I do some errands and prepare for later. We're going to have so much fun you and me and it's only just getting started.
151112221122.title: Duncan needs more training, he can't finish...

1511122211221.content:
All pulled up to the gym after letting Duncan change at home and smiled, "I'll be back in a few hours to pick you up, Gordito. We're gonna skip lunch today and go straight into a BIG dinner." Al reached over and rubbed Duncan's belly, patting it a few times before putting his hands back on the wheel, "You have fun beefing up, Amigo."
Once Al was out of sight, Duncan pulled his phone out of his pocket and and punched in a quick number. He let it ring a few times before he heard the other end pick up, "Geoff? Hey, it's Duncan. Can you meet me at the gym? I wanna start these workouts now."

"97... 98... 99... 100!" Geoff called out as Duncan lifted worked at the bench press. Duncan put the heavy weights back on their holster and sat up, wiping sweat from his forehead. Geoff walked away from the bench press and towards the dumbbells, "So, lemme get this straight. Al doesn't eat around you when he's stuffing you like crazy, cause he's afraid he'll get fat?"
"Yep." Duncan said, picking up two 50 pound weights and started working on his arms, "He said that I would look good with extra weight on. I think that he thinks that he doesn't have the body type to work a gut."
Geoff laughed, picking up a set of 75 pound dumbbells and working the same as Duncan, "Probably. I have to agree with Al, though. Ever since you started putting on weight, you've been looking better. You're belly is small, but all these workouts are gonna make you massive, D-Man."

That gave Duncan an idea, "Hey, Geoff. Since you're helping me train to eat more, maybe you can help me build muscle mass too?"
Geoff grinned, "Sure thing, dude!! You wanna do that eating training again tonight?"
Duncan kept working out as he thought, "We'll see about it. Al said he has a "BIG dinner" planned for me tonight. I'll call and let you know after."
"Sure, thing, dude." Geoff set his weights down and walked over to Duncan, who out his weights down also. Geoff squeezed Duncan's bicep with his large hand, "Damn, dude. I can already feel these getting bigger."
Duncan flexes, "You think so?" He looked himself over in the large mirror on the wall; his stomach was stretched out farther than his pecs, but Duncan knew that would soon change, "I think I wanna go do more bench presses."

Duncan and Geoff spent the rest of the evening working out, taking short breaks through out to get their stamina back. When Duncan's phone went off, he recognized Al's ring tone, "Looks like Al's here. I better go. I'll call you and tell you if we're still on for training."
"Sure thing, dude!! I'll be here!!" Geoff called as Duncan headed out. Duncan tossed his bag into Al's back seat and plopped into the passenger seat, "Hey, Al." Duncan noticed Al wasn't talking, which was odd since it was Al, "You okay?"
Al had this look of surprise on his face, "Wow Amigo... You look bigger already!" Al reached over and squeezed Duncan's bicep, before doing the same to his pecs, "Oh, yeah. You're definitely bigger." Al reached down and squeezed Duncan's belly, which was soft now that he had digested all of his food "We're gonna make this little thing bigger, too."

Duncan chuckled, flexing his arm, "Thanks, man." Al pulled out of the parking lot and to Duncan's house, waiting in the car while he showered and changed clothes. Duncan came back out wearing, once again, a shirt that clung to his new frame. The shirt stretched tight over Duncan's pudgy belly and was snug across his slightly bigger chest and arms. Once he sat back down, he and Al headed out to...
1511122211221.title: Duncan and Geoff discuss Al.

choices: Duncan finishes his plate, Alejandro's portion, and will even have dessert
Duncan eats as much as he could yet is too stuffed to even think of dessert
15111222112211.content:
Alejandro pulled him to the front of a place that Duncan had never been to before and Duncan looked around at the almost empty parking lot.

"Uh, hey Al, where exactly are we?" Duncan asked crossing his arms as he shivered a bit from the cold. Man the temperature really dropped and looked like it was going to rain soon. Alejandro wrapped his arm around him and Duncan snuggled against him, glad for his warm body although he'd smack anyone who'd suggest that to him. Duncan DID NOT cuddle thank you very much! Alejandro chuckled lowly so that Duncan did not hear him as he was well aware of Duncan's distaste of anyone thinking he was soft despite Duncan being an internal marshmallow despite his bad-assnessitude as Duncan called it. He drew Duncan closer and slid his hand down to that soft growing man gut he was assisting to grow and rubbed it. It was very nice and suited Duncan well along with those sexy muscles. He couldn't wait until he was even bigger and beefier which Duncan would be incredible at and much better than that skinny frame. Playing with Duncan's vanity and ideal concept of him being macho was a bit underhanded but it would teach Duncan a lesson as well and the results...the results were so worth it. Grinning he subtly rubbed Duncan's belly and muscle while Duncan was focused on the warmth Alejandro seemed to exude.

"It's a place that I found by accident and surprisingly few people know about it which is a good thing. It's one of those all you can eat places where you can get as much as you want."
"You mean a buffet? And it looks kind of dirty and suspicious."
"Yeah, that also tends to detract from people going in most likely but you should see the inside." Alejandro and Duncan walked into a somewhat drab waiting room and Duncan raised his eyebrows at Alejandro and he just smirks.

"I know, just wait for it." Alejandro went up and paid the $10 a person entry fee and conversed with the bored looking cashier over who knew what. Duncan looked around at the dirty wallpaper and crooked paintings and sad looking potted plant in the corner.
"Are you sure this is the right place?" Duncan asked Alejandro when he came back with their tickets. "I don't mean to be a judger and all but this place seems a bit fishy to be a buffet. Are you sure this is safe or I don’t know, healthy?”

“Oh ye of little faith, I would not risk you or your health if I thought the food here was in the slightest bit dangerous for consumption or this place suspicious. Just come inside and take a look.” Alejandro led Duncan through a side door and what Duncan saw on the other side made him stop and gape in surprise. The interior of this room was way different than the outside or its surroundings. He felt like they were transported into a different dimension or something as it was a huge spacious room dimly lit for ambience and subtle mood, portraits and pictures covering the wall and statues and plates of armor lining the perimeter. It looked like a medieval castle banquet hall complete with said banquet and Duncan was stunned at the amount of food on the table.

“Holy fu-er crap,” Duncan breathed. “No f-ing way.”
“Way dude,” Alejandro said smugly.
“How on Earth did you discover this place again?”

“By a mixture of accident and information obtained by network. Trust me, I was surprised as you. Very few people know of this place’s existence. But you must promise to not tell anyone that you wouldn’t trust with your life. Possibly not even then.”
“Because they’re going to find and kill you?” joked Duncan and felt a chill when Alejandro’s face didn’t change.
“Something like that. It’s very…select clientele sworn to discretion and secrecy.”
“It’s a lot of food for a place that has such a small number of customers,” Duncan said. Indeed, there was only one other couple there in the whole spacious hall and the amounts on the banquet said it could feed hundreds, easily.

“Don’t worry, the food does get reused elsewhere. This is just its first stop. It often will go to other restaurants and charities or elsewhere. But anyways, let’s dig in.” Duncan was surprised.
“You’re eating too? I thought you weren’t going to.”
“But it’s this place and I have my own way of getting rid of what I don’t eat,” Alejandro said pointedly looking at Duncan’s gut. Duncan rolled his eyes but was strangely a bit flattered.
“Yeah, yeah, let’s just do this already,” Duncan said as he headed up to the long tables that held all the food, Alejandro following behind him.
“How is this going to work?” Duncan asked and Alejandro smirked.
“I’m going to tell you what you’re going to eat. How bout we start with those mashed potatoes, mac and cheese, biscuits, rice, pork, bread…” said Alejandro as he loaded up
Duncan’s serving plate which was quite a lot as the plates they used here had to be twice the size of regular plates.
“and we could come back for some spaghetti, ham, chocolate cake…” Duncan was both looking forward to and dreading this as not only did he have to eat his plate, probably a lot of Alejandro’s who had gone on and filled his plate as well, winking at him, as well as dessert…ugh, this wasn’t going to be good for his stomach. Alejandro was grinning and smiling at him and Duncan gave a weak smile back as Alejandro poked his belly.
“Yep, we’re going to feed this little thing till it aint so little anymore,” and Duncan felt his belly growl in agreement with that.
15111222112211.title: An All-You-Can-Eat Buffet

choices: Geoff stays until Duncan falls asleep.  Al brings breakfast over.
Geoff stays all night for Duncan.  Al takes Duncan out the next day.
151112221122111.content:
Once Al finished loading up both of their plates, the two sat down. Duncan didn't know what he was going to do. This is three times the amount of food that Al had ever tried to feed him. Al smiled at Duncan and he picked up his fork, "Eat up, Gordito." Duncan picked up his fork and took a deep breath, preparing himself before diving in. Duncan started with the large portion of mashed potatoes, knowing how good they were for bulking up. He finished the potatoes fast, shoveling in the Mac and Cheese quickly as well. Duncan stopped for a second, taking a large drink from his soda, before quickly eating a biscuit or three.

Duncan slowed down after the biscuits, realizing how fast he was eating and how sick he'd feel later for eating like that. The mohawked teen went back to eating after catching his breath, finishing off his last few biscuits before eating the rice and pork. Duncan sighed happily and leaned back in his seat, the very bottom of his belly poking out from under his shirt, "Done. What next?"

Al smiled as he pushed his plate towards Duncan. Though Al had eaten a considerable amount, and was very full, it looked like he hadn't put a dent in the plate. Large portions of fettuccine alfredo, fried chicken, biscuits, and of course, mashed potatoes, over flowed the plate, "Here. I'm too full to finish this. Can you finish it for me?"
Duncan raised his eyebrow, "What happened to eating with me?"
Al scoffed, "I just did. I'm too full to finish. Can you finish this or not?"
Duncan smirked. He had expected this the entire time, and picked up his plate, "You bet I can." Just like before, Duncan started out by shoveling down the mashed potatoes and biscuits, before moving on to the fettuccine alfredo.

Al grinned, "I guess letting you rest and work out was the best way to go. You have such a big appetite now." Duncan didn't hear him, which have Al an idea. He stood up and walked back towards the food, filling another plate up for Duncan. When he returned, Duncan was relaxing in his seat, rubbing his bloated stomach, "Awww, look who's full." Al said as he patted Duncan's gut, "Only two more plates, okay, Gordito?" Al set a plate down in front of Duncan, who was surprised by it. It was nothing but a large mountain of mashed potatoes, "I know how much you love these, so eat up. Once you finish this, you can have dessert."

Duncan looked up at Al, "Are you trying to make me explode or something? This is way too much now."
Al shook his head, "Not for you, big guy. Once you finish this and desert, I'll drive you home and let you sleep it all off."
Duncan sighed, "Fine." He picked up his fork and dug into the large pile of mashed spuds, but he was moving much slower now. Even though he slowed down earlier, he was still going to fast, and now he was full. But he knew that Al would make him eat all of this again, so he sucked it up and kept going, despite the painful feeling in his bloated belly.

After a good 15 minutes of slow eating, the plate was clean, and Al grinned, "Good job. I knew you had it in you. Now, for dessert." Al pushed a large slice of chocolate cake to Duncan, who stared at it like it was the most evil thing in the world. Duncan re-adjusted his seating and unbuttoned his pants, sighing at the feeling of relief. Once he was ready, Duncan consumed the slice, finally falling back into his seat and groaning, frosting on his cheeks. Al chuckled as he sat next to Duncan and wiped the chocolate off his cheek with his finger, licking it off, "Delicious. Now, lets get you home so we can get you some rest, big guy." Al helped a bloated Duncan back to the car and drove him home. Neither talked, but Al rubbed his belly with his right hand the entire way while he drove. He helped Duncan into his room and laid him down on his bed, "You rest up, okay, Gordito?"

Duncan adjusted himself slightly, "Uuuugh... yeah. I wi- UUUUURP... will." Duncan rubbed his bloated stomach as Al left, and once he heard the front door lock, he pulled his phone out and called up Geoff, "Hey, Geoff. Do you think you can come over? I'm super stuffed and in need of some relief.. you will? Okay. Just use the house key I gave you."

Ten minutes went by and Geoff came into Duncan's room, "WOW. When Al said he had a big dinner planned, he wasn't kidding." Geoff sat down on Duncan's bed carefully so he doesn't upset his stomach and began to rub it for him, his fingers working like magic.
Duncan groaned, "Man, dude. You're the best best friend ever."
Geoff laughed, "Don't mention it. Now just relax. I'll be here for as long as you need."
151112221122111.title: Eating way more than planned.

1511122211221112.content:
Geoff rubbed Duncan’s belly comfortingly as Duncan moaned in pleasure and pain of his way overstuffed belly that kept rumbling ominously, but not in hunger. Geoff was upset and impressed with Alejandro and Duncan because he was surprised Duncan managed to eat that much and Alejandro forcefully threatened, bribed, whatever it down. Geoff was sketchy on the details and Duncan wasn’t spilling as he was ‘sworn to secrecy’ or something. Geoff moved over besides Duncan, continuing his ministrations as he spoke.

“D, you don’t have to do this you know. This whole thing with Alejandro…isn’t necessary. I’m sure Alejandro would understand if you backed out and at times like this, it seems like it’s going a bit too far. I’m not sure if he’s trying to get you bigger or cause you to explode from overeating but are you sure you want to continue with this?”
Duncan nodded. “I gave my word and I don’t ever back down from a challenge nor am I planning to from a bit of mild discomfort-” Duncan groaned and let out a long belch and Geoff rolled his eyes a bit, “or let him intimidate me.”

“Why is it so important to prove your awesomeness to him? The fact you even agreed and started this should be proof enough.”
“I just do, I can’t really find the words to explain.” Geoff shrugged. Duncan was so stubborn when he wanted to be which was both admirable and irritating as heck at the same time. It was one of his many charming qualities, as Duncan would put it. Geoff massaged a bit harder and Duncan stopped talking and turned back into sounds of pleasure. Sometimes Geoff did not entirely get his friend and had to wonder about his friend’s sanity at times, like that time he dated that Courtney chick. At least this was somewhat saner and reasonable compared to that. Also, Duncan was certainly putting on the weight and beefing up which was actually pretty hot and despite Al’s almost cruel methods of doing so, it certainly had results. Although Geoff would never tell Duncan this and respected him to much too, Duncan had been a bit scary skinny earlier and had Geoff not seen him eat (which was actually pretty much nothing compared to now!) he would have suspected the punk of being anorexic. Whatever Geoff felt about Alejandro and he wasn’t entirely sure, he admired Alejandro’s resolve and ingenuity at this. That and Geoff got to touch Duncan’s bloated belly, feeling how stuffed it was and listen to it rumble and getting to massage it and give pleasure to Duncan as well…well, it was all good.

Looking down, Geoff saw that Duncan was by now pretty much asleep and although Geoff knew he should go, he just wanted to stay. His mind was made up when Duncan started to twitch and groan in his sleep, either from dreams or indigestion and Geoff laid right back down beside him. Lifting up one of Duncan’s arms, he laid his head next to the punk’s and wrapped his arms in a hug around Duncan and grinned as the breathing slowed into a more natural rhythm. They slept peacefully like that for quite a while until…

Duncan’s cellphone started playing a tune that was familiar as his own and Geoff’s. It was Alejandro, checking to see what was up. Duncan’s eyes sprang open instantly as he reach out and picked up the phone from the side table.
“Hello?” Duncan said nervously, looking down to see Geoff still asleep, cuddled besides him.
“Hey, how’s my big gordito? I just wanted to see how you were doing and if you were feeling any better and stuff.”
“Uh, yeah, I’m feeling pretty great actually,” Duncan said as he carefully picked up Geoff’s heavy arm and tried to move it off but it just went back around him as soon as he did. Darn it Geoff, let go!
“Oh good. I’m coming over in a few minutes because I’m eager to see you.” Duncan cursed in his head although some might have slipped out when Alejandro said “what was that? I didn’t quite catch that.” Duncan panicking tried to kick Geoff off him who was still asleep. ‘Damn, why is he such a heavy sleeper?’ thought Duncan as Geoff refused to let go.

“Uh, how long until you get here?” Duncan asked, his voice shaking a little as he tried to again push off Geoff’s arm around him.
“About 10 minutes. I can’t wait to see you love,” Alejandro said, almost cooing although Duncan was too busy trying to silently yank Geoff off to hear that part. There was a click as Alejandro hung up and Duncan breathed a sigh of relief before again panicking when he realized Geoff was still asleep and refusing to move from letting go of Duncan. Suddenly, Duncan was struck with inspiration on how to wake up the party boy. Grinning, he moved besides Geoff’s earlobe and gently brushed some of the luscious blonde hair aside. Then taking a deep breath, Duncan paused and then yelled as loudly as he could-

“I’VE GOT ICE-CREAM!” startling Geoff so much Geoff slammed his arm back against Duncan’s nose as he looked for ice-cream.
“Where’s the ice-cream?” he asked, sounding confused and Duncan glared, feeling his nose to make sure it wasn’t broken.
“There is no ice-cream, although you did hit me,” complained Duncan rubbing it. Geoff reached over to help but froze when Duncan glared. “At least it isn’t broken or whatever, ow. What are you still doing here?”
“I stayed with you through the night,” Geoff said and Duncan gave a grin before remembering the trouble that was coming.
“Uh, Geoff, Alejandro is coming and…” they both fell silent as a car parked outside and a knock came at that door and then the door opened and there was footsteps coming up the stairs and the door was suddenly thrown open and-
“Hey amigo! I was just thinking of and wanting to see you so I-” Alejandro stopped and stared in surprise. He looked from Duncan to Geoff and back to Duncan.
“Uhh…what’s going on here?” Alejandro asked completely, utterly stunned.
1511122211221112.title: Geoff stays the night and a discovery

choices: Alejandro brings Duncan his next snack
15111222112211121.content:
Duncan decides to tell the truth because he knew it had to have come out at some point eventually since secrets didn’t stay secret long, he just hadn’t expected it to be so soon and of course at such an awkward moment. He also didn’t want to lie since he, rather strangely, felt guilty and he doubted if he could lie to Alejandro anyways since Alejandro was scary good at reading people and when they’re lying and caught Duncan numerous times before when he lied. He just had to hope Alejandro wasn’t mad or going to take it out on him.

“Alejandro, this is my buddy Geoff and he’s been helping me train for your challenges a bit,” Duncan stated nervously and waited for the yelling or beatdown or whatever to begin. A few moments passed and Duncan looked up at Alejandro.

“Did you hear what I said?” Duncan asked Alejandro and was utterly confused when Alejandro let out a little chuckle which seemed uncalled for.
“Oh don’t worry, I did” Alejandro said, laughing again although the corners of his mouth tightened and his eyes seemed to blaze at Geoff causing him to scoot back a bit since the way Alejandro was looking at him, not only would he be dead but there’d be bloody nothing left of him. Alejandro’s glare intensified when he saw Geoff and Duncan shirtless and Geoff cringed back more.

“It is just for the challenges, right?” Alejandro asked, locking his eyes back with Duncan’s.
“Yes, that is all. He is just helping me through the hell you put me through.” Duncan snapped back and Alejandro winced a bit. Okay, he deserved that a bit.
“So, you guys aren’t together?” Alejandro asked and Duncan shook his head.
“Of course not, and even if we were, it isn’t any of your business.” Alejandro ignored the pang that went through him at that and just focused on the relief on hearing they weren’t together.

“Okay then,” Alejandro said, startling them all and Duncan looked at him in shock.
“Okay?” Duncan asked, scarcely believing that Alejandro was just fine with this and truthfully, Alejandro was a bit as well that he just said so. Going with it, Alejandro settled on a shrug of the shoulders.

“Yeah, sure, it’s cool. I mean if you guys aren’t together and as long as you still play by the rules of our agreement, it’s all good. I did say that you could use whatever means you wanted to use within the parameters was fine and a training partner is totally okay as long as you eat my stuff as well and as long as I can watch you guys.” Duncan was shocked, having expected Alejandro to freak out a lot more over this than he was and Geoff was as well.

“You don’t mind me helping?” Geoff asked and Alejandro shrugged.
“Hey, not at all, it’s cool dude. Just don’t touch Duncan outside of it and I won’t rip your balls off and mail them to you.” Alejandro said with a straight face and Geoff blanched. Duncan was shocked and he grabbed Alejandro.
“Don’t you dare threaten my friend,” Duncan said, breathing hard. Alejandro looked down into Duncan’s eyes for a moment and then shrugged again.
“As you want. So, what is his main purpose?” Duncan blushed a bit and looked at Geoff and Geoff replied fearfully.
“Well I rub and take care of Duncan’s stuffed stomach and make it feel good,” Geoff said, wincing as he expected a blow to come. Instead, Alejandro looked at Duncan and he looked at Geoff. Alejandro sighed, shaking his head.
“Fine, you could still do that and everything else.” Both Geoff and Duncan were shocked at that.
“Really? You don’t mind?” Duncan asked. Alejandro sighed in response.

“Yes, I know you need comfort and it helps and I am not good at that type of physical touch and even if I did, Geoff does it better since you keep going back to him. But we can make it work. I feed you, you eat, Geoff and I get to take care of you. Sounds reasonable?” Duncan totally happy with this outcome and that Alejandro did not kill someone quickly agrees and Geoff leaned back, watching the two, thinking there was something going on but he couldn’t put his finger on it. He was glad he could still be of assistance to Duncan since something was going on and that way he could watch Alejandro and see just what was up between the two…
15111222112211121.title: Duncan tells the truth

151112221122111212.content:
Geoff mumbled something about 'having to go to the bathroom' and when Duncan distractedly nodded, Geoff walked out and as he did so, pulled a surprised Alejandro out along with him. Roughly pushing Alejandro against the wall, Geoff bravely glowered at the bigger man as he growled harshly.

"Okay, talk. What are you doing with my friend?" Geoff said, gritting his teeth. Alejandro gave him a dark look and then smiled, it not quite reaching his eyes.

"I would be careful if I were you. Don't want to have to hurt you, you being Duncan's friend and all. I also promised Duncan I wouldn't. Otherwise, I would beat the crap out of you for doing this."

"What's your angle in this? I am a bit confused in that why it matters so much to you. At first it just seems like you're an obnoxious asshole bent on torturing him and the next you act all nice to him and crap. So what's the deal?" Alejandro looked at Geoff for a moment, and Geoff saw the calculating look as Alejandro figured exactly whether it was worth it hurting him. Apparently deciding that at the time it still wasn't, Alejandro shrugged and a different look came on his face.

"I have never told anyone this but I..." Alejandro leaned over and whispered it in Geoff's ear. Geoff was startled for a moment.
"No way, you like Duncan?" Geoff all but shouted, letting go of Alejandro. Alejandro hissed at him, slapping his hand over Geoff's mouth.
"Idiot! Don't shout it out like that! I don't want him to know yet." It all made sense to Geoff now on Alejandro's obsession with Duncan but there were still things he couldn't seem to get.

"But if you like Duncan, why are you torturing him like this?" Geoff asked.
"I can't really say, he doesn't like me, he's fun to mess with, he's sexy as hell when mad..." Geoff interrupted Alejandro there.
"Okay, okay, I get your point. It's so weird to have Duncan my friend described like that, especially by you but you really do like him. I did kinda figure that, or that you really hated him. One or the other. Your way of showing it is a little odd."

"What can I say? I know how to get to him. And you can't deny he looks good."
"It's still weird talking about my friend like this but yeah, Duncan is a good looking dude. I may not be interested him in that way but it's not like I don't see it."
"He looks even better with some meat on his bones, to say the least" Alejandros said, his mouth quirking a bit. Geoff rolled his eyes.
"Yes, that too."
"Far too skinny earlier, looked almost unhealthy. But now he's fine with a capital F and only getting better."
"This really is weird talking about this but yes again. I always did think he looked a bit unhealthy and anorexic before."
"Can't say that now." Alejandro said with a self-satisfied smile.
"Nope. But you still suck for putting him through hell" Geoff said, a bit harsher.
"I guess. It was a bit extreme. But it was and still is worth it. Besides, he did survive."
"No thanks to you," Geoff said crossing his arms. Alejandro shifted a bit guilitly.
"Point taken."
"It was admittedly a clever plan," Geoff said gruffly. "Knowing as well as I Duncan can never resist a challenge, especially when his manhood is called into question."
"Thanks."
"Does he know?"
"Know what?" Alejandro asked confusedly.
"That you know...you like him." Geoff said awkwardly. Alejandro shrugged.
"I don't know. I haven't told him, too nervous to. I'm hoping for him to figure it out."
"By mercilessly stuffing him?" Geoff asked a 'you're kidding me' look on his face.
"Okay again, point taken. I just can't help myself. You know it's hot when he's all full and bloated."
"Again awkward and I'm not into my friend Duncan in that way but yes."
"It's a good thing you aren't. I would have beaten you if you were," said Alejandro.
"I know that as well," Geoff said. "But no worries dude. Since now it all finally makes sense I can leave you guys alone."
"Nah, you can help. Duncan really likes to do it with you as well. And why not? Since we both have the same goals and care about the same guy, we could work together."
"Sure, I guess that's okay."
"Good."
"Man, you really did a number on him yesterday. What was it that he ate?"
"Let's just say a lot."
"No really, how much?" Geoff asked curiously. Alejandro leaned in and whispered everything and Geoff's eyes widened.
"Holy crap that's a lot of food!"
"Even I was surprised," Alejandro said smirking.
"How far are you going with this?" Geoff asked curious. Alejandro shrugged.
"I actually don't know. I haven't planned that part out yet. I'll stop it at some part but for now, I'm just letting nature takes its course."
"Well, okay, I guess." Geoff said. Suddenly they heard Duncan's voice raise.
"Hey, what are you guys doing?" Alejandro and Geoff looked at each other.
"So, amigos? Friends? Eh, partner?" Alejandro said putting out his hand. Geoff looked at it and thought briefly for a monent.
"Eh, sure dude. Amigos are nice. Let's go in and see Duncan."
"Exactly what I had been thinking," Alejandro says with a smirk. "He must be starving."
"Pfft, as if anyone can be starving after that feast last night," Geoff said shaking his head.
"Okay, that might be pushing it. But definitely hungry at least." Both Alejandro and Geoff entered the room.

"Man, what took you guys so long?" Duncan asked curiously. "Also, I'm surprised there was no yelling or trying to kill each other for that matter."
"We discussed a few things and came to a consensus," Alejandro told Duncan. Duncan looked sceptical and looked at Geoff for confirmation. He relaxed when Geoff nodded.

"Oh, okay cool. So, uh, now that we're all aquainted, what do you guys want to do?"
151112221122111212.title: Geoff confronts Alejandro in private

1511122211221112121.content:
Alejandro spoke up, "I thought I'd take you out for breakfast; I saw a few good places to eat on the way here."
At the mere mention of food Duncan's stomach rumbled. He blushed and tried to play it off, "That sounds alright I guess, I could maybe go for some food..."
Alejandro smiled. "Terrific. I guess we should start getting ready amigo."
"I guess so." Duncan smiled back before turning to his friend, "You coming Geoff?"
On the one hand Geoff wanted to join the two for breakfast and help Duncan with his eating challenge. On the other hand Alejandro did say that he had a thing for Duncan, maybe he should leave the two alone to spend some quality time together.

Once he made his decision he replied:
1511122211221112121.title: Go out for breakfast

15111222112211121211.content:
"Breakfast sounds great!" Geoff said. Geoff and Duncan joined Alejandro in his car and they were off.
After 25 minutes of driving, Duncan began to complain.
"Alejandro, I'm really getting hungry..." Duncan said. Alejandro's heart raced. He felt his 'amigo' get harder at the thought of Duncan voluntarily gaining weight, and then he remembered his response.

"We're almost there amigo. Only 5 more minutes." Alejandro said and stepped on it. In 5 minutes the boys arrived. "Here we are!" Alejandro said. The building looked like a normal breakface place, which confused Geoff for the long wait.

The waitress lead the party to a booth. "Can I get y'all anything to start with?" she asked.
"Yeah - some water. And we already know what we'd like to order. The Belly Bulger." Alejandro said.
"Alrighty!" The waitress said and was off.

"What is the belly bulger..." Duncan asked, a little afraid. Its a 15 pound breakfast of pancakes, eggs, sausages, waffles, bacon, donuts, cookies, everything you can imagine for breakfast." Alejandro explained. "If you eat it in then 2 hours, its free! And you better finish it because I didn't bring emough money to buy it." Alejandro smirked. Duncan would usually feel scared right about now, but with Geoff by his side, he wanted to show him that their practicing was helpful: and that he was greatful.

In a few minutes, the belly bulger comes out and the plate is huge. It takes up the entire table, and the waitress sets a timer on the table. "Even more stress - great" Duncan thought. The timer started and Duncan started chowing down.

"C'mon Duncan! You can do it bro!" Geoff said. Alejandro, in response tried to updo Geoff.
"Amigo you can do it! Imagine how great you'd feel if you finished it!" Alejandro cheered.
"You're not helping!" Duncan said, with a mouthful of food.

Duncan's belly got bigger and bigger with each bite. It had really swelled up, and his belly sat in his lap. His shirt couldn't cover the monster even before they started. Althought the slight feelings of being full started to arrive, Duncan kept eating at the same pace.

After 30 minutes, Duncan was 1/4 done with his plate - just on time. He finished the pancakes and waffls, and started on the bacon. He didn't use his fork, he just used his hands. He took handfuls of bacon and stuffed it into this mouth. The grease dripped into his gote and down his double chin.

Althought he finished a large amount of food already, his hunger was still im his belly. He felt ridiculous, still being hungry even after eating that much. Maybe Geoff's 'tutoring' helped him out. He stuffed another donut into his mouth.

An hour and 15 minutes had passed, and Duncan hadn't finished. He had finished all the bacon, sausages, pancakes, waffles, donuts, and cookies. However, he still had the eggs and toast to go. He was halfway through the eggs and he couldn'f eat anymore. Yet, he still fought on. He grabbed a part of the egg with his fork and stuffed it in his mouth, and he had to hold himself from gagging.

All this eating made Alejandro unresistant. He just wanted to get on the table and feed Duncan, but he held himself. His big amigo throbbed in his pants, and he also couldn't resist. Seeing Duncan get so big, Alejandro excused himself and rushed to the bathroom, to uh... do the unmentionable.

Once Alejandro was in the bathroom, Geoff grabbed the toast and eggs and started stuffing them in his face.
"What are you doing?!" Duncan said, with his a piece of scrambled eggs in his mouth.
"I know you can't pull through that much longer, I'm helping." Geoff said, swallowed, and ate another piece of toast. Geoff ate about 1/5 of the entire plate, while Duncan rested. 2 minutes remained, Geoff was still eating, and Alejandro would be coming back soon. Geoff shoved the last slice of toast in his mouth and Alejandro left the bathroom. Once Alejandro sat down, and timer rung, and the waitress came over to the empty plate.

"Nice job! Your meal is free! Congrats!" she said, and walked away.

"I'm proud of you man!" Geoff said, while he rubbed his own tummy. That small 15 minute eating session gave Geoff a baby bump, but he didn't feel full. Duncan on the other hand, was the opposite. He was huge, and beyond full. He ate 13 pounds of breakfast in 2 hours, and his belly ached. Duncan laid down on the back seat of the car while they drove home.

When Duncan awoke, ____ was sitting next to him.
15111222112211121211.title: Breakfast sounds great

151112221122111212111.content:
Duncan squnited his eyes, and saw Geoff sitting next to him, eating some pizza, and watching tv.

Duncan groaned. "What time is it?" Duncan asked.
"5 pm." Geoff said, and grabbed another piece.
"What happened?" Duncan asked.
"You fell asleep in the car. It was really hard, but me and Alejandro carried you to the couch. Man you're really heavy." Duncan rolled his eyes. "Then Alejandro left to go get some huge dinner planning, and I stayed here. I was going to start our training early, but I couldn't resist myself dude." Geoff said.
