Duncan looked over at the 2 empty pizza boxes.

"Geoff, Thanks so much man back at the breakfast place." Duncan said
"No prob dude! I could see you were struggling and I was getting hungry." Geoff said.
"Maybe you could come with me everywhere me and Al go to eat! and help!" Duncan pleaded.
"Id love to! But we gotta make sure you eat enough, we still want your appetite to grow so that this will be easier." Geoff said. Duncan felt relieved. Less eating = less pain.

"How's your stomach doing?" Geoff asked Duncan.
"It feels a lot better, I'm actually kinda hungry." Duncan said.
"I'd offer you some pizza... but I ate it all!" Geoff laughed, as did Duncan. Their laugh was cut short when they heard Alejandro's car reel up. Duncan sighed. Time to eat his heart out - again.

Alejandro came in the door with 10 boxes of pizza piled high.
"All for you amigo!" Alejandro told Duncan. Duncan sighed, sat down, and started eating.
Geoff and Alejandro watched Duncan savage through the pizzas. After a half hour, all of them were gone. Duncan was shocked he ate all that, maybe his appetite was growing.

"Are you still hungry?" Alejandro asked.
"No!" Duncan said, half lying. He wasn't hungry, but not full either.
"Well I'm sorry to say, that theres 10 more." Alejandro smirked. Duncan groaned. Alejandro returned with the boxes and placed them infront of Duncan. Duncan took a deep break, and started earing the pizza again. He ate at rhe same rate at first, but once he finished the first 2 boxes he slowed down dramatically. After another half hour, he finished 6 boxes, and Duncan struggled to finish the 7th. Duncan came up with an idea.

"Alejandro, is there amy more pizza?" Duncan asked. Alejandro was shocked.
"No... but I could get you some! Why?!" Alejandro asked excitedly.
"I'm only on my 7th box and I know I can eat way more." Alejandro danced inside. "Could you get it now so by the time I finish it will be ready?" Duncan asked.
"Yes my good friend!" Alejandro said, grabbed his keys, and leff.

Duncan sat back. Geoff came in and started eating pizza #7, 8, 9, and 10. Geoffs belly stuck out foreard, but only a pebble compared to Duncans. Duncan was glad to have some time to relax, at least another 10 minutes til Alejandro would come back. What he would do with those pizzas? Hopefully Alejandro would go to the bathroom and Geoff could fill in. Duncan was suprised about how Geoff could eat so much in so little time. While Duncan rubbed his belly, thepain eased. Once the pain felt almost 100% gone, Alejandro came in with the new 10 pizzas. Alejandro placed them infront of Duncan and got a trash bag to collect the old boxes.

Duncan fed himself piece after piece slowly, as to ease the pain, but at box #6, Duncan couldn't finish.
"Alejandro.. I can't..." Duncan started to say.
"Its okay amigo! I'm very proud of you! 25 boxes in that large belly." Alejandro said and grabbed Duncan's belly. Duncan pushed his hands away and laid back down to fall asleep.

"Do you want some pizza Geoff?" Alejandro asked, and handed a box to Geoff. Alejandro and Geoff sat down, and started to eat from the 5 boxes that Duncan didn't finish. Alejandro didn't eat all day, and suprised himself when he finished a whole box. Alejandro was even more shocked to see that Geoff finished the other 4. Geoffs belly had swollen up a lot today. But it couldnt just be from those 4 pizzas...
Alejandro dismissed it, and the trio fell asleep.

The next day, Duncan woke up around 9 am. Geoff had gone, Alejandro had gone, Duncan could relax. Even before he could do anything, the phone rang.
"Hello?" Duncan asked.
"Hey! Its Alejandro! today we're gonna focus on having some dessert!" Alejandro said. "I'll be home in a few!" He hung up.

Duncan was kind of excited, he loved desserts. Before he could get hyped up, he called Geoff to help him with his eating today, although he was confident he could finish his favorite sweets.
151112221122111212111.title: Geoff

1511122211221112121111.content:
Alejandro came through the door with cakes, donuts, cookies, chocolates, candy bars, cupcakes, everything sweet. Infront of Duncan were a lot of cakes and other assorted sweets. Duncan , for once, was excited to eat. Even before Alejandro's feeding, Duncan couldn't help himself around sweets. Right away, even before Geoff came, Duncan dug in.

He pushed the cake to his face, ate all of the chocolate cake, grabbed some chocolate bars and shoved them in his mouth. He grabbed the cupcakes, 2 in each hand, and ate them in bites. Duncan stuck his hands into another cake, and took out pieces and put them in his mouth. He put chocolate donuts around his fingers and ate them each. Duncan really didn't hold back from the food. Duncan picked up another cake and ate from it again, and in no time at all, all the dessert was in Duncan. belly.

"Duncan I'm glad you ate all of that! I expected you to be a little more full after rhis and to fall asleep, but do you want more now.?" Alejandro asked.
Duncans belly rumbled.
"I guess rhats a yes!" Alejandro said, and was off.
Duncan was still hungry after the dessert. He wanted more. He never felt like this before, he was enjoying stuffing his face. Soon Geoff came over, and Duncan filled him in.

"See! Our training has been working out! We should confinue tonight. And since you love sweets so much, we need to practice with them. You like and theres less pain with more food!" Geoff explained. Duncan nodded, and in a bit Alejandro came back wirh rhe same amount of dessert.

Duncan again stuffed his face, and all the sweets made Duncan want to eat more. While eating, Duncan's shirt began to tear. Fat replaced the ripped parts of the shirt, and soon all of Duncan's shirt was gone. Duncan stopped eating and saw the damage. Alejandro stared at Duncan's bare hairy bare belly.

Duncan's short buttons popped off a while ago, but this is the first time he was full aware of the effects on his body. He was too focused on either eating or the pain in his belly to notice his shirt's tightness.
"Duncan, lets weigh you." Alejandro said. Duncan felt proud to say he wanted to finish eating. Alejandro happily let him, and once he finished again, the 3 went into the bathroom.

Alejandro's well toned abs remained, and even though he also ate a lot, Geoff's abs were still there. Duncan's old abs were old news, and his fat belly was huge. Duncan remembered his weight was 180 pounds of pure muscle before the weigh in. He stepped on the scale and it was 265. Duncan gained 75 pounds of all fat. Alejandro inspected Duncan's body. His love handles poured over his teared shorts, his thick arms and hands were fat, and his huge butt was amazing, but above all his gut was huge.

Alejandro didn't know what to do with this information. He was overly excited to know Duncan weighed 75 pounds more. Although, Alejandro wanted him bigger. While Alejandro thought this, Duncan asked, "anymore dessert?".

Alejandro was happy dessert worked for Duncan, it was more fattening then the other foods. "I'll go get you some more!" Alejandro said. Just as he was about to leave, Geoff asked something that puzzled Alejandro.

"Me too?"
1511122211221112121111.title: Alejandro comes in

15111222112211121211111.content:
'I dont want him sneaking any of Duncan's food, but I don't wanf him thinking all the food I get is for him...'
Alejandro thought for a second, and decided he was to let Geoff have SOME. "Okay!" Alejandro said and was on his way.

"What are you doing?!" Duncan turned to Geoff.
"I'm hungry, thats all." Geoff said. "And by the means your still eating, it must be good."
"I dont want Alejandro to have any ideas of fattening you up! Its horrible, and I need your help, and you can't if ur full!" Duncan said.
"I dont think Alejandro is gonna fatten me up, you saw how long it took him to give an answer." Geoff responded. "But if ur so worried I won't do it again."

Suddenly, Alejandro came through the door with the cakes. he put two aside for Geoff, and the rest for Duncan. Geoff and Duncan started eating, and Geoff hardly felt full after his cake, so he just sat back. Duncan tore through his food at a much slower pace, and when he finished, he held his belly.

Alejandro leanred that Duncan was starting to eat in more amounts, so he had to prove more food. His appetite was growing, as was Geoffs hunger.

Alejandro sat next to Duncan and he rubbed his belly. Geoff decided this was a good time to go, and he let the two have their space. Duncan wanted Geoff to stay, and he was sad to see him leave. Geoff went to his car and drove off. His stomach grumbled in hunger.

Geoff stopped by a burger place and got himself 4 burgers. His hunger needed to be situated. He ate the four burgers happily, and although he wasn't full, he didn't feel the need to keep eating.

A few hours later, Duncan called Geoff.
"Hey do you want to train soon?" he asked.
"Sure! Where's Alejandro?" Geoff replied.
"He had some personal stuff to do, I sas his phone say something about Heather." Geoff could hear Duncan's belly rumble over the phone.
"I'll be there in a bit!" Geoff said and drove towards Duncan's place.

Geoff came in with multiple boxes of pizza. He set them down.
"For every 2 slices you eat, I'll eat 1. We can do this training session together. Think of it as with every step you take, no matter how big or small, you're getting close to finishing the box! Geoff said.
Duncan knew he was trying to be inspirational, even though it wasn'f, be he played along. Duncan grabbed the first two slices and chowed down.

Geoff showed Duncan a technique by putting the 2 slices ontop of each other and eating it was a whole. His logic was it would take less time, and Duncan found it to be efficient. And Geoff did was he said he would: eat a slice for every 2 Duncan ate.

After a while, they had gone through 12 boxes of pizza. Geoff ate 4, Duncan had 8. Geoff was starting to slow down, and Duncan kept eating at his pace. After they finished the 13th box, Geoff had to sit back and his rub his swollen belly. He groaned.

"Its harder than it looks, isnt it?" Duncan said and grabbed another slice. Duncan felt more motivated with Geoff. Instead of being forced to eat with Alejandro who would yell at him, Geoff and him would tell jokes. Duncan grabbed another slice, and Duncan finished that 14th box by himself and then he couldn't go on, and they were left with another box.

"You can eat it bro! Its only 1 more!" Geoff encouraged Duncan.
"No, you eat if, I can't." Duncan rubbed his belly. Geoff grabbed a slice and put it in his mouth. He grabbed 2 more and fed them to Duncan. Another slice in his own mouth, 2 more in Duncan. He grabbed one last slice for himself, and there were 2 more for Duncan. Duncan couldn't get them down, so Geoff ate the final 2. The two sat back, feet up, and fell asleep.

Alejandro walked in and was....
15111222112211121211111.title: Alejandro says yes

151112221122111212111111.content:
Geoff was just cms away from cuddling Duncan, and Alejandro walked in and barely dropped the food he was going to prepare for Duncan. Both of them were smiling, with bulging bellies and empty pizza boxes were everywhere. He was outraged. He wanted to do nothing more but drag Geoff out of the house and lock the doors (even though he might be too heavy now with that belly) but he held himself.
"I can't break this up yet, Duncan likes eating when hes with Geoff and has more motivation. Once Duncan is big enough, he'll come back to me." Alejandro thought. He angrily stormed into the kitchen.

Alejandro prepared a 24 oz steak, some fries, chips, and mashed potatoes. While waiting for the steak to cook, Duncan woke up. He sas a glimpse of Alejandro in the kitchen, and pushed Geoff off of him. He worried if Alejandro had seen them. 'No, he would've said something if he did.' Duncan thought. Duncan got up, his belly grumbling for food. Geoff still laid on the couch and Duncan went into the kitchen.

"There's my big man!" Alejandro said and hugged Duncan. "You hungry?" He asked.
"Actually yeah..." Duncan said, patting his belly. "Its funny becaue I just had a ton of pizza before I fell asleep."
"Thats good, I'm cooking you up something right now!" Alejandro said. He pulled up Duncans shirt and his fat belly popped out, with hair coming from his deep belly button. "Lets feed this thing!" Alejandro said. The steak was ready, and Alejandro served it to Duncan.

"What?! How big is this?" Duncan asked.
24 ounces." Alejandro replied.
"24 ounces?! A normal person can barely eat 16!" Duncan said.
"Eat as much as you can," Alejandro stated nicely. "Push yourself a bit, and with that appetite of yours you can finish it. If you don't thats okay... but please eat as much as you can!"

Those words rung in Duncan's ear. "Eat as much as you can." Alejandro was acting different. He must've saw us sleeping on the couch, hes probably pissed. He told Geoff not to do this.' Duncan thought. He needed to ease Alejandro's anger. He was determined to finish the steak.

Duncan ate bite after bite, and to his surprise he was't feeling full yet. He had finished 17 oz's, and could keep going. Around the 21 oz mark, Duncan began to feel full. His belly was obsorbing the table and he sat back, rubbing his belly. He wanted to finish the steak. Alejandro looked at him kindly, but Duncan felt the power to continue. He finished the steak, being full to the limit, and shoved the chips and fries into his face. With the last bit of energy, Duncan ate the mashed potatoes, he sat back in pain and rubbed his belly. "Ughhh..." he groaned.

"He ate it! He ate the whole thing! Maybe his thing with Geoff is helping him eat!" Alejandro thought. He rubbed Duncan's belly, and Geoff woke up. His small belly had lowered and he barely had evidence he stuffed himself.

"Whats up guys!" Geoff said.
"Duncan just ate a 24 oz steak!" Alejandro stated confidently. Geoff looked over and saw Duncan closing his eyes, rubbing his belly. He felt sympathy.

Geoff sat down next to Alejandro and all 3 of them rubbed Duncan's belly. Duncan, even though it was easing the pain, NEEDED Geoff to leave. He saw Alejandro glare at him, and Duncan didn't Alejandro to be more mad: he didn't eat 24 oz of steak for nothing.

"Geoff... go get something to eat... I know you'rs hungry." Duncan said. Geoff wasn't hungry. He was starving.
"Okay man, I'll see you guys later!" Geoff said and drove off.

Alejandro hoisted Duncan up, and brought him to Alejandro's car. He sat him down and the car jumped down on Duncan's side, due to his weight. Alejandro sat on the other side and they drove to the highway.

"Where are we going?" Duncan said.
"You'll see, you can fall asleep, it'll be a long ride." Duncan, desperate to please Alejandro, fell asleep.

-

Geoff sped to the nearest fast food place. He was desperate to eat, he felt starving. Ever since coaching Duncan, Geoff noticed his own appetite doubled. He always felt hungry. Geoff pulled up to the McDonads drive thru and ordered 6 McDoubles, 2 Big Macs, and 2 DoubleMcchickens. Geoff pulled over with his meal and began unwrapping burger after burger, and soon all 10 were in his belly. Geoff unbuttonef his shorts, and his belly bulged out even more. Geoff felt satisfied, but he wasn'f full. He had the urge to order more, to stuff himself. Geoff turned the car back on and re entered the line to Mcdonalds. He ordered the same meal, and pulled over to eat again.

About half way through he felt full. But he pushed himself to finish the last half, and when he was done he felt exhausted. He decided to drive back to Alejandro/Duncan's house, and he found they left.
151112221122111212111111.title: angry

1511122211221112121111111.content:
Duncan stirred and when he awoke, it was about 8:30 pm. "Are we there yet?" Duncan groaned.
"Actually yes! Its just around this block!" In 2 minutes they pulled up to a gigantic restaurant. And by gigantic, it wasn't its size. It was the people.

Duncan and Alejandro walked in, and everyone here was at the least 300 pounds. Everyone, mainly men, were fat, and they kept on eating. Alejandro was 6'2, muscled up, and no one would ever miss with him. But in this place, Alejandro was a toothpick. He was skinny compared to everyone else. Duncan, too, felt small. He was 6'1 and 275 pounds of fat (and gaining!) but everyone here was so big he felt small. A host, who obviously used to be a young good looking boy, now filled woth fat, brought them to a table.

"This must be your first time here." He said and patted Alejandro's rock hard abs. "I remember when I used to have those..." he said. "We got to get some meat on your bones! Like your friend here!" he said, and patted Duncan's fat belly, as it almost ripped out of his shirt. The fat teen, at least 20 years old, walked off.

"What is this place?" Duncan asked.
"Its a place I googled up, its the most fattening restaurant in the area and it serves massive amounts of delicious food!" Alejandro explained.
"I feel small in here..." Duncan said.
"So do you want to get bigger?!" Alejandro urged for Duncan to say yes.
Duncan did want to get bigger, he felt the need to be bigger than all of these fat men. Ex jocks, preps, dads, everyone in here was bigger than Duncan.

In a few minutes, a server, bigger than the host, approached their table.
"Hello, I'll be your server tonight" he said, and in one hand he held a pad and paper, and the other was eating a cookie. Alejandro noted this guy must've played football in high school and college; and now he was at least 375 pounds.
"What can I get you guys."

Alejandro began to order before Duncan could say anything.
"6 triple bacon burgers, 5 thick crust pizzas, an 8 oz steak, 3 dozen donuts and 4 slices of cake for dessert". Duncan looked up to the waitor, excpecting him to be disgusted, but in fact he didn't look surprised at all. The waitor only had one reaction.
"We don't serve 8 oz steaks, our smallest size is 12 oz if you would like that." Alejandro nodded.
"And for you?" the waitor turned to Duncan.
"Nothing." Alejandro said and the waitor was off.

"I can't eat that much!" Duncan said.
"Save the steak for last; if you can't eat that, its okay. Everything else I'm positive you'll be able to finish." Alejandro said and smiled.
The waitor, placed down the donuts first as the 'appetizer.' Duncan ate every single one with no difficulties at all. Duncan awoke to a dark room. The last thing he remembered was falling asleep in his bed at Playa des Losers. "Okay... where am I? If this is someone's idea of a joke, I swear I'll-"

The light clicked on, blinding the punk for a moment. When his eyes adjusted, he saw Harold sitting in a chair nearby, a pizza box in his lap. "Have a nice nap?" he asked, a faint smirk on his face.

"What's going on, Doris?" Duncan asked. "And why the hell are my arms tied up?!" He added, pulling at a thick rope binding his wrists. He also noticed he was sitting on something, but didn't think much of it.

"I'm tired of you bullying me, Duncan!" Harold snapped. "Always humiliating me, and pushing me around just because you're bigger than me! Well not anymore..." the tall boy opened the box, revealing a large pepperoni pizza, glistening with grease and emitting a delicious aroma.

"So you're gonna feed me a pizza as revenge?" Duncan scoffed. "Lame."

"Not just THIS pizza" Harold clarified. "THESE pizzas!" he waved his arm around the room, and the punk's gaze followed. Stacked everywhere and high were mounds of pizzas, which explained why the odor of grease, cheese, and meat was so strong. Dunan's stomach rumbled.

"Okay so where-" before Duncan could finish speaking, Harold bolted forward and crammed a slice into his mouth, rubbing Duncan's neck so as to force swallowing. The nerd repeated the process until the punk's belly was tight and swollen, making a slight bulge in his black skull shirt, and the first box was empty. Here Harold paused to rub his palm into the gut, helping it convert into soft fat.

After a moment, Duncan burped, and Harold took this as a sign to start with the next pizza, occasionally pausing to force some kind of gainer shake down the punk's throat."I'm gonna keep feeding you until you can't move!" Harold laughed.

The feeding continued for hours until Duncan's clothes began to feel quite snug. A soft bulge pressed against his waistband and the ropes, which he had given up struggling against after Harold pointed out he was a master at knotting, where starting to chafe.

Before he had begun, the nerd had weighed Duncan on a special scale he had borrowed from Owen that had a max of 1000 pounds, and found that he weighed 170 pounds. When Harold paused to check Duncan's current weight, he now saw 200 pounds even. "Yes!"

"What?" Duncan asked, shifting in place.
"You've put on thirty pounds!"
"THIRTY?! Just how fat do you plan on making me?"
"Like I said, until you can't move!" With that, Harold resumed his stuffing, until Duncan had gained...

Harold chuckled as he watch Duncan eat. "Wow man, you keep eating like that and you'll be bigger than Owen pretty soon!" he said teasingly, though there was no malice in the ginger's voice.

The punk decided to play along and finished the bone before replying. "Yeah, well its my body, so I can do what I want. Besides," he added while smirking and pointing at Harold's distended waistline with a full fork, "it looks like I'm not the only one. You four been pigging out when I ain't lookin'?"

Ezekiel was first to look down at his hoodie-covered torso. His belly did seem bigger, filling out his frame nicely, which a nice change from his emaciated feral form. It seemed to the others that after having been deprived of food for so long, The homeschooled boy would eat as much as he could whenever he could. "I guess so, eh?" He commented. "Better than starving!"

Noah was next to examine his body. The bookworm had fallen into a habit of eating while he was reading, and vice-versa. This mindless consumption, combined with his constant laziness, had naturally resulted in a thin-but-growing layer of pudge on Noah's skinny body. "I'm okay with it." he shrugged, going back to his book and food.

Cody ran his hands over his belly. His weight had climbed the quickest of the four, having put on over 50 pounds. The tech-geek gave a small, gap-toothed grin. He had wanted to gain for some , but while Total Drama was running, he had had few opportunities to try. Now, with a several season break for everyone, he felt free to do so with a little encouragement from Owen. "I kinda like it!" Cody added, happily patting his tummy.

Harold however barely looked any different. His lanky height making it hard to tell he was any fatter unless one was actively looking for it. His middle was barely pushing against his shirt, creating a faint bulge under the blue fabric. "You're rubbing off on me, I guess." Harold finished. The skater nerd had apparently been sneaking some of the pizzas he had been feeding Duncan.

The fatter male nodded. "Looks like it!" he replied, chuckling as he resumed eating. Duncan occasionally glanced back up at the other four, who had drifted off to the buffet table and refilled their own plates before sitting back down and following his cue. The punk began to imagine each of them at his own weight. In his mind's eye, each of them began to grow bigger and softer. Smiling at the daydream, he cleaned his plate leisurely. "Hey, uh... wanna go play a video game in the lounge?" The four agreed, finishing up as well and following Duncan out.

In the lounge room, Duncan began teaching Zeke how to play against the three nerds. Once the prairie boy stood a chance at the fighting game, he stepped back and sat in a nearby chair, drifting off to sleep. His dreams of vandalizing things were interspaced with visions of food and being fed. The punk watched in his mind's eye as he grew bigger and bigger, moving around less and less. Somehow, the idea was intriguing. He had never thought about being that big.

Eventually, Duncan woke up to...
1512321112112112.title: Teasing and Dreaming

15123211121121121.content:
Eventually Duncan woke with a start to Zeke cheering as he dealt the final blow to his opponents. He yawned and stretched in his seat with a proud smile. "Taught ya well, did I? he asked happily, before taking a gulp from his shake.

The pudgy farm boy nodded. "Guess so, eh!" he replied with a grin, followed by a blush as his belly gurgled.

Harold chuckled. "Looks like you need a victory snack!"

Noah looked up at the mention of food. "Gonna need to be one heck of a snack to satisfy him!" he commented, smirking. Cody agreed, leading the others back to the buffet table. Slowly Duncan pulled his gelatinous body up out of his seat, giving himself a moment for his stomach to stop jiggling before following.

Upon arrival, he saw the quartet had piled an entire table full of fatty foods, with Harold setting out glasses of the gainer shake at each of the five seats. Duncan raised an eyebrow at the ginger, who simply nodded in reply. Nodding, he sat down next to Ezekiel, giving him a congratulatory pat on the back. "Good job, Zeke. You did good!"

"Thanks!" the toque-wearer smiled as he reached for his drink. Duncan watched as the others drank some of their smoothies and began to eat, slowly at first, but gradually picking up the pace. He could practically see them, as well as himself, getting bigger and bigger with every bite. Chairs began to creak slightly as their burdens increased, and loose clothing grew snug. Noah and Harold moved past slightly pudgy and into fat, their clothing highlighting their new curves. Ezekiel looked like he was in bliss, his hoodie stretching over his growing gut as he stuffed his face. Cody seemed to balloon outward as he ate, his body swelling up in every direction but up. Duncan could feel his own body converting just about whatever he ate into ounces of fat.

By the time the five males had emptied the table off food, their bellies were almost painfully stuffed. Shirts had ridden up and pants opened to make room for the engorged mounds of their bellies. One by one, each of them slowly stood up, trying to be careful not to jostle the sloshing stomachs and wincing in pain when it happened. They made their ways to bed, with Duncan following Harold. The ginger waved him off to bed, saying that there wouldn't be a stuffing that night, and that they were just gonna alternate it. The punk was surprised that he had been expecting to be stuffed again, and more so that he was disappointed when it wasn't gonna happen. Frowning, he nodded and went off to bed.
15123211121121121.title: Winner, Ezekiel!

choices: they see a bigger Geoof & Al
151232111211211211.content:
The next day Duncan was awaken by Harold, and he looked up to see much fuller Harold, but not as bloated as before. Duncan got up and his bed creased in relief from the weight of Duncan. Harold led Duncan outside.

"So yesterday you said we'd change things?" Duncan asked Harold.
"Yep, this time I'm not gonna feed you - You are.." Harold said. Duncan glazed, confused.
Harold led Duncan to a large room, filled with food piled high and all around. The room was the size of a warehouse and it was absolutely full with food. Duncan stared in amazment, hoping he could eat all of it.

"Heres 5 pills." Harold started and handed them to Duncan. "1 increases appetite, another decreases metabolism, another is an addictive stimulant, and the last is a pill that prevents you from feeling full." Harold explained.
"You're going to take one of these every hour. You will eat as much of the food in the warehouse as you can eat, and 10 hours later I'll get you so we can go to bed." Harold said.

"And where will you be?" Duncan asked.
"Thats none of your business. Now get eating!" Harold said. He pointed to a camera in the corner of the room and left the room.

Duncan swallowed the pills started feasting.

He started with the pile of pizza boxes. He opened a box and stuffed pizza after pizza into his mouth. He finished thay box and opened the next, and the next. Duncan was englufing the food and wasn't even feeling the pain. After 45 minutes of eating nonstop pizza, Duncan decided to move to another food. He got up to start with the burgers, but stammered forward, now noticing his huge gut. His belly was as big as last night already, and it wasn't even an hour yet. In addition, he also still felt starving. He sat back down in front of the burgers and started eating, and fast.

15 minutes passed and a speaker came on. "Duncan take the next pill!" Harold said.
Duncan opened the jar and swallowed the pill. He then wondered what would happen if he had 2. He skimmed the jar and he decided to take another 5 pills. He then countinued eating.

Duncan noticed that the slow sense of feeling full disapeared, and he was hungrier than ever. He ate the burgers for an hour straight and was interrupted by Harold to take another set of pills. Duncan double dosed again and moved to the dessert section. He stuffed cake, donuts, cookies, cupcakes, and other sweet desserts into his mouth and was mesmorized by the tastes.

Duncan was in the midst of eating when he was again interrupted, but not by Harold. A loud ripping sound echoed the room, and Duncan looked down to see his bare body. His shirt had ripped and Duncan examined the damage of the hours of fillinh himself. His belly was huge, along with his moobs. His happy trail led down to ripped pants as well, and his ass and legs were so strained by his underwear. Duncan felt his stomach, and if growled. He was still starving! He grabbed another full cake snd brought it to his face and chowed down.

Hours of stuffing food, and Duncan had eaten 5/6 of the entire warehouse. Harold came in, also looking a bit plumper, approached Duncan.
"woah Duncan... I didn't expect you to eat almost the entire warehouse!" Harold said.
Duncan didn't respond as he was too stuffed. Duncan weighed 3 times as much as he did than before Harold started stuffing him. He got up and they walked through the hallways.
151232111211211211.title: The next day...

choices: Cody rubbing Duncan's belly, wearing the collar
151232111211211212.content:
Over the next several days, the quintet only continued to grow. Cody quickly matched Duncan in weight at 330 pounds, with the latter only surpassing the brunet in height. They began getting closer to each-other as time passed and Cody spent more time with Duncan. The delinquent developed an appreciation for Cody's tech skills, while the geek grew to enjoy Duncan's prank knowledge.

Harold had put on quite a bit of weight as well, up to 301 pounds. His body had grown wide and chunky due to eating the leftover slices that Duncan didn't eat. Noah and Ezekiel had also grown rather fat, the former's 290 pound gelatinous frame almost glued to his chair, while Zeke's 280 pound one was still barely mobile.

One day the ginger designed and made a pill that decreased one's metabolism to a near-crawl while boosting their appetite sky high. "Okay Duncan..." Harold commented after giving it to the punk. "Follow me." The 310 pound teen led the slightly larger one to a warehouse-sized room, occupied by an equally massive vat of high-fat lard. "I want you to try and finish this."

"All of it?!" Duncan replied incredulously. "But it's huge!"

"Yeah, and so's your appetite now!" the ginger responded. "I'll be back in a couple hours to see how you're doing!"

"Doing what?" Duncan asked curiously.

"You don't need to know." Harold answered before leaving and waving. "Bye!" He shut the door behind him. Duncan sighed and sat down in front of the vat, resting his head on it. He grabbed a nearby hose, stuck one end in his mouth, and turned on the valve at the other. With a gurgling noise, the fluid began its journey down his throat and into his cavernous belly.

Resting a hand on his belly, he could feel it getting bigger and fatter with every swallow. His larger-sized pants, which had started out snug, quickly grew very tight and suddenly ripped at the sides and back. 'Aw man...' Duncan thought, 'those were my last pair!' His shirt was thankfully more resilient, and simply rode up to nearly his chest, though still extremely tight. Even his favorite studded collar was growing too tight, but before Duncan could attempt to remove it, the snap on it popped open, causing him to make a moaning sound in relief.

After an hour, Harold return to find...
151232111211211212.title: Delinquent Distended

1512321112112112121.content:
After a couple hours, Harold return to find that Cody had come into the room. He was wearing Duncan's collar on his wrist and rubbing the punk's now-immense stomach lovingly. Duncan, having turned off the flow for the time being, was breathing heavily and smiling over at Cody, an affectionate look in his blue eyes. The look was matched in the brunet's own. Harold smiled at the scene.He had to admit, the scene was adorable.

Harold looked up at the vat to see almost half of it was gone. He was clearly impressed; Duncan had consumed more than he thought. Calmly, he approached Duncan with a new pill and a glass of water in his hands.

"What's... that one... do?" Duncan puffed out, looking up.

"Supposed to help your body handle the weight." Harold answered. "Won't help ya walk much, but you'll be able to breathe a little better."

In response, Duncan opened his mouth for the pill, which was promptly inserted and swallowed alongside the water. He took a deep breath and exhaled, sounding like a massive set of bellows. "Much... better..." he panted. "Thanks..." Inside Duncan's body, the pill's chemicals burned away any clogs in his arteries.

Harold smiled. "No prob." he replied with a shrug before turning to Cody, who looked about to doze off. "And how long have you been in here?" the nerd asked.

"About an hour or so." Cody responded, yawning. "Wanted to spend some time with Duncan and went lookin'. Found him in here."

"Dude just... started cuddling me." Duncan added, gently rubbing Cody's back. "C'mon dude; lemme get to bed. We can go to sleep there."

"Alright..." Cody moaned, getting up. He and Harold watched as Duncan slowly got to his feet. His gelatinous body rippled as he wobbled unsteadily before he found his balance and settled, panting slightly. The other two could see just how big he had gotten.

Without a doubt, Duncan's belly was the most massive part of him. It hung out of his too-small shirt and over his waistband along with large love handles, with his belly button stretched until it was almost a line. His moobs were splayed on top, looking like large pillows. Duncan's thighs looked like tree trunks, and the seat of his pants had torn open wider from the effort of containing his rear when he was getting up, which revealed that his boxers were hugging his butt rather nicely and causing Cody to blush. His arms hung limp at his sides, massive, heavy, and filling his sleeves snugly. Duncan's face had completely lost most of its angular shape for a plump round one, with chipmunk cheeks and double chin. Even his usual hard, aloof smirk had relaxed into a soft, kind smile.

Harold was surprised at just how big Duncan had gotten. It was almost hard for the ginger to believe Duncan had been a fairly muscular teen over two months ago. He had wanted Duncan big, but this was far and beyond his plans. Cody on the other hand was excited. He enjoyed larger guys, as well as being big himself. And now Cody was gonna get a whole night to spend with Duncan.
1512321112112112121.title: Duncan and Cody-like a mattress and a pillow

15123211121121121212.content: The next day, Duncan's parents, brothers, and parole officer stopped by the resort to see how he was doing (and/or make sure he hadn't violated his parol). Asking around revealed the 400-pound teen planted on a couch in the rec room, playing a video game against Cody. Duncan's visitors were stunned and...
15123211121121121212.title: Duncan's family arrives

151232111211211212121.content:
Duncan's visitors were stunned and smiled at their son/sibling, while the parole officer was merely stunned.

His brothers had also put on a noticeable amount of weight. Not as much as Duncan of course, but enough so that their bellies visibly bulged with soft fat under their clothes. “Duncan?” Ian asked, incredulous. “Dude is that you?!”

Duncan looked over and grinned. “Ian? Jeremy? Mom, Dad? … Mr. Kester.” He added with a polite nod at the officer, who calmly nodded back. “When did you all get here?!”

“Just a little bit ago, little bro,” replied Jeremy as he walked over and poked Duncan’s belly, “or should I say BIG bro?” he added with a chuckle.

“Yeah, yeah, look who’s talkin’!” Duncan joked back, before glancing at Cody who had turned around to look at everyone. “Yo, Code, this is my family!” Mom, Pops, my little bro Ian, and big bro Jer. And my parole guy.”

Cody smiled and waved. “Hello everybody!” The family said various hellos back. “So… why are you all here?”

“Just making sure our boy’s doing alright.” Duncan’s father replied while Mr. Kester made some notes on a clipboard. “And it looks like he’s doing rather well! But I have to ask, how’d you get so…?” he made awkward gestures at Duncan’s massive belly.

“... fat?” Duncan asked, finishing his dad’s question and getting a nod in response. “Well, it all started a few months ago…” he told them the story about what happened, from the night he woke up to being stuffed (which got incredulous expressions), to gaining with his new friends (which got pleasant smiles), to his feeding session with the vat the previous day (astonished looks). "So, it turns out I really like being this big, and I don't regret it!" He added proudly.
151232111211211212121.title: Happy Family

1512321112112112121212.content:
Duncan chose not to mention his relationship with Cody in his explanation.

"Well, I'm glad you're happy about it bro." Ian commented, smiling.

"But what about you two?" Duncan asked. "Didn't think you'd be the kinda guy to start packing it on!"

"Well, I met a girl who's really into bigger guys." Jer explained. "And I really liked her, so I started eating a lot more. Ian just wanted to be porky!" Ian nodded in agreement.

"Wow..." Duncan looked impressed.

"Well, it was nice seeing you, sweetie," Duncan's mom hugged her son's neck as she spoke and kissed his cheek. "And we'll see you at home, okay?"

"Alright Ma..." Duncan hugged back and watched as his parents and the officer left.

"You... didn't tell them about... us?" Cody asked, taking Duncan's hand and intertwining their fingers.

"Didn't think it was the right time." Duncan answered, looking into Cody's big blue eyes with a smile. "Cody, I... I love you. I really do! More than I ever did with Court or Gwen!" he admitted.

"R-really?"

"Yeah, I mean, Courtney was too uptight and y'already know how me and Gwen broke up after All Stars..." Cody nodded as Duncan explained. He squeezed his flabby body into what little space remained on the couch.

"And you've stood up to me... I dunno how many times, dude! You're fun, smart, good at pranking people-not that either of us could really pull one off at this size!" Duncan added, giving his girth a firm thump and getting a giggle out of the brunet.
1512321112112112121212.title: Not Just Yet...

15123211121121121212121.content:
The pair returned their attention to the game in front of them, before the loudspeaker crackled. "Attention contestants! Please assemble in the pool area immediately! That will be all."

"Wonder what that's about?" Duncan wondered, heaving himself to his feet and tugging Cody up.

"Guess we'll find out," Cody replied, leading the way.

Standing next to the pool was a man who put a scowl on both their faces: Chris McLean, who was holding aloft a thick contract. "Alright, kiddos! Time for a new season! This time, the contestants ae gonna be..."
15123211121121121212121.title: Chris' new season!

15123211121121121212122.content:
Cody then leaned forward, pressing their girths together, and clumsily mashed his lips onto Duncan's.

Duncan was briefly startled by the sudden kiss, but after a split second leaned into it. For a moment they stayed that way before pulling away for air. ”... Well. Not bad for your first kiss, huh?" he commented with a sly smile. Cody chuckled and blushed. "Help me up; time to feed the beast!”

Cody laughed and got to his feet, belly jiggling before settling. He grabbed Duncan’s hand and tugging the larger boy upright.

“Guess that sumo training’s payin’ off, huh?” Duncan commented with a smile.

Cody nodded. “Yup!” With that, he led the way to the buffet table. With now six enormous teenage males to feed, the table had practically tripled in length and amount of food present. Cody helped Duncan load up a tray with two whole pizzas before getting a plate of fried drumsticks for himself.

Finding their usual spots by the pool, they dug in.
15123211121121121212122.title: One Fat DunCo Kiss

151232111211211212121221.content:
“Oof…” Duncan leaned back, rubbing the expanse of his tight, swollen belly as he burped into his fist. “UURP! Oh, I feel like a Thanksgiving turkey…” Duncan moaned. “So full…”

Briefly, Duncan recalled his old, lean, muscular, angular, and meaner self. The old him would’ve been disgusted with the new him, Duncan silently admitted to himself. But that person was buried deep under a few hundred pounds of flab, and Duncan had no intention of going back to that.

Smiling to himself, he glanced over at Cody, who was moaning with a mild tummy ache. He was slowly rubbing circles into his gut. Without warning, Cody hiccuped, groaning as the sudden movement jostled his tummy. “Hic! Ow…” he groaned.

“Eat too fast, bro?” Duncan couldn’t help but chuckle.

“Yea-hic!-eah…” Cody nodded.

“I’ll get you some water,” Duncan suggested “You stay here and chill.” With that, he heaved himself upright, his body rippling from the movement. Allowing his girth a moment to settle, he waddled over to the water fountain, snatched up a cup, and stood sideways as it filled.

Sticking a straw in the cup he went back to Cody’s chair and handed it over. “Mom used to say that if you hold your breath while drinking water they’ll go away,” Duncan explained.

“Hic!-Thanks.” Cody accepted the water and started sucking it down. Pulling away from the straw after draining the cup he waited a little bit and grinned. “Your mom was right, it worked!”

“'Course it did!" Duncan smiled back. "Wanna float in the pool for a bit?”
151232111211211212121221.title: Stuffed (Like a Thanksgiving Turkey)

choices: Cody, Harold, and the other underdogs
1512321112112112121212211.content:
Cody shrugged. “Sure, why not?” he replied, getting to his feet and leading the way toward his room, which along with Duncan’s and the others, had been relocated to the ground floor when.

As he trailed behind, Duncan gazed at his boyfriend-the idea of which still brought a faint blush to his chubby cheeks-and took note of how Cody looked almost as wide as he was tall. Duncan smiled to himself at the mental image of rolling the brunet in front of him like a ball.

Shaking the daydream away, Duncan watched as Cody squeezed his way into his room (which had another door connecting it to Duncan’s).

Cody plopped down on his now-queen-sized bed and kicked off his shoes and socks as Duncan shuffled past into his own room. Listening to Cody move about, he looked in the large mirror at his expansive frame.

If Duncan was being honest with himself, he looked massive enough to fit his old skinny body inside his gut with room to spare. While still muscular enough to support his obese body, his tree-trunk thighs were still coated in thick fat. His biceps had long dissolved into a similar layer of flab. Pulling his skull shirt over his head, he gazed at it. The garment looked like it would’ve swamped Owen, it was so large.

Tossing it onto his bed, he shucked off the long sleeve undershirt next and exposed his gelatinous torso. Duncan put a hand to his belly and smiled to himself, giving it a loving rub before reaching under and fumbling for the fly of his pants, noting how his front was almost out of reach, before shimmying his way out of them and into his trunks, glad that the producers had procured several times bigger than their original sizes by the studio. Waddling out into the hallway, he found…
1512321112112112121212211.title: "Sure!"

15123211121121121212122112.content:
Waddling out into the hallway, he found Cody chatting with Harold and Zeke, all of whom were in their swimwear as well. “Hey Harold.”

“Hi, Duncan. You look good by the way!” the ginger commented, giving a firm pat to Duncan’s belly, which jiggled like jell-o in response.

“Thanks, you too!” Duncan looked Harold up and down. Harold was still the third-largest of the gang at 315 and counting, with a belly that peeked out from under his shirt.

Zeke, now the thinnest, looked skinnier than the last time Duncan had seen the homeschooled teen, having dropped his weight to 250. “Yo Homeschool, you losin’ weight?” he asked.

“Yeah,” Zeke nodded. “Got a little too big for my likin’,” he explained, patting his tummy. “Trying to reach just 200 even!”

“You do you, man,” Duncan replied, patting Zeke’s shoulder. “I for one don’t plan on losin’ a single pound!” he added proudly.

Noah rolled his eyes. “Really, we hadn’t noticed,” he snarked with a faint smirk. The bookworm hadn’t lost any weight as far as Duncan could tell, nor had he gained any. “Now are we going to the pool or what?”

Duncan nodded. “Yeah, yeah… now let’s go!”

After a moment of walking, Duncan spoke up again. “Anyone else notice that the producers or whoever is in charge around here seem to be encouraging us to pack-” he jiggled his belly- “all of this on, or is it just me?”
15123211121121121212122112.title: The other Underdogs

choices: They were alone for the moment
They weren't alone in their pool time
151232111211211212121221122.content:
“Now that you mention it,” Cody replied, “I did. They replaced all my pants with elastic the other day when I said I was having trouble doing the button.”

“Really?” Duncan asked. He remembered the conversation but hadn’t noticed the slight change in his friend’s wardrobe.

“Yeah!” Cody noticed they were passing his room and asked everyone to wait up as he hurried inside. He came back holding what at first glance appeared to be a pair of his usual cargo pants, but closer inspection revealed that there was no button and the fly was fake. Cody pulled at the waistband, which revealed a large amount of give in them. “See? Totally stretchy!” he said, tossing the pants back on his bed before shutting the door.

“Wow.” Duncan was impressed. “How’d they get your new waist size?” 
“Cameras, remember, ex-punk?” Noah piped up. “Of course they noticed us inflating like balloons, how could they not?”

“Good point, good point,” Duncan admitted. “Wish they’d get me some of those?”

“At the rate you’re growin’, Duncan?” Noah snarked. “They’d be a bit tight by the time they arrived.

Chuckling at the comment, the group resumed their stroll outside, blinking briefly as their eyes adjusted to the sunlight. Looking around, they saw
151232111211211212121221122.title: How could they not notice?

1512321112112112121212211221.content:
… that they were alone for the moment. Smiling at this, the five overweight teens drifted apart, with Noah and Ezekiel draping themselves on lawn chairs while Harold loading up a plate of food before plopping his butt down in a chair of his own. All three pieces of furniture promptly emitted creaks of protest at their weights.

Duncan and Cody meanwhile eased themselves in the pool, the former placing his pudgy hands atop his belly as he relaxed and simply floated. “Aaah, this is the life!” Duncan commented. “Fat, full, happy, and healthy!”

“How big do you wanna get anyway?” Cody asked, getting himself a smoothie from the snack bar. “I mean, punkin, you’re already over a hundred bigger than Owen!”

“Punkin?”

“I wanted to try out a pet name. Is that okay?”

“I ain’t gotta problem with it loverboy,” he shrugged. “And I know, I know I’m getting huge… but I kinda… don’t wanna stop yet,” Duncan admitted. “Is that weird?”

Cody blushed lightly at the name. “No, there’s nothing wrong with it!” he replied. “But still, how big you wanna get?”

“Maybe… twice as big as Owen said he was back in the hunting challenge?” Duncan said after a moment. “What was he, 296? Harold once told me he wants me immobile, so Imma give him immobile!”

“Punkin, that’s…” Cody paused and did a little math in his head. “That’s just shy of 600 pounds, dude! You sure you wanna get that big?” he asked. “You prolly won’t be moving much if you get that big!”

Duncan thought that over.
