Duncan sat up and examined his belly for the first time. It was small, but soft and squishy. Duncan thought to himself...
15132.title: story 4

151331.content:
'Oh man, I hate being back on the island " announces Duncan. Total drama is scheduled for a brand new season, and seeing as Duncan needs the money to pay off fines he committed before and during juvi, Duncan couldn't say no to the invite. Duncan is amongst one of several former contestants invited to come back, however due to the show splitting up to two mini shows in a year, only boys were invited. along Duncan is Noah, Justin, Trent, Scott, Cody, Mike, Geoff and, Alejandro and Tyler.
Chris is awaiting for the total drama hopefuls on the deck as per every other total drama season, Woe is joy all the contestants think to themselves. One by one by contestants step off the gross little dinky boat that smells like stale horseradish. "Thank god that journeys over, now welcome to terrible boring total dramaaaaa... Uh" as Duncan finishes he looks at the island in aw. "Welcome total drama glutton island!" Shouts Chris.
The island as far as the eye could see is almost completely edible. The mountains look like giant birthday cakes and the said looks like sugar. After taking in the sight in front of them, the contestants look at each with confusion each wondering why this place looks so tastefully beautiful. Chris closes his eyes as he prepares for another introduction speech "allow me to explain, food shows are all the ratings on TV right now therefore with the money we had and the technology, we managed to create and island mostly made of edible conduct, sure in to make for some sickingly sweet TV". Duncan is very unimpressed, but he knows he needs to win.
They teams are set, Duncan, Noah, Tyler, Justin and Scott on team sweet vs the rest on team dinner.
Noah is entirely unamused and as per usual can't keep his sarcastic mouth shut " wow, so happy to be teamed up with you guys, syke, but damn we need Owen on our team." Turns out Owens appetite is too good that the challenges will be too easy for him so they need scrawny guys for entertainment value. "Ugggh whatever, if I have to team with you guys fine but I'm gonna pay off my debts no matter what and these challenges don't scare me" as he gets into his top inedible bunk.
The confession room is also a scale, mostly for the viewers at homes amusement. Duncan decides to go in 1st and he currently weighs 135lbs. "Man this sucks, I get stuck on a team with these dingbats and the island looks like Owens favourite dream. Can't believe I'm stuck here for three months! No matter, whatever task you put before me I will win that money! What's the first challenge anyway?"
151331.title: A new Island

1513311.content:
Noah"Catching a chocolate bear?"
All of the total Drama contestants have been gathered around the marshmallow sculpted statue of Chris where Chris has begun explaining the tasks to the contestants.
Chris"Yes, a chocolate bear; you see no only is the land and water and buildings mostly edible but so are the animals. Thank you very much finance incomes from previous Total Drama series and technology from the best scientists we can afford." For your first task, in your teams you must venture into the forest of chocolate and kidnap a living chocolate bear. Once your done, you must bring it back to the campsite."
Duncan isn't amused, nor are any of his teammates. They grab their candy cane spears and walk into the forest of chocolate, where everything from the leaves to the ground is made of some kind of milk, dark or white cocoa. Scott is the most enthrilled to be on this island as he actuall can stop eating the white chcocolate leaves off the trees.
Out of nowhere theres a presence infront of them, what is it...?
1513311.title: Catching a living chocolate bear

choices: They manage to eat it and Duncan eats the most
The eat it and Noah eats the most
15133111.content:
A real chocolate bear comes out of the edible trees and roars just like any other grizzly. "Aghhh, holy crap run if you don't wanna become Pez drops!" shouts Noah as all the boys run in the oposite direction. The bear is quicker than it appears and closely catching up to them. Scott, full from all the chocolate he's been eating on the way gets a stomach cramp and stops. "Oh man, this is it, you guys gotta tel Papi I got ended by the most delicious foe to ever grace anyone on the the farm" wails Scott as the bear knocks him down. Duncan uses his Juvy wit to best, Ousted the bear by clobbering it with the candy cane before it makes a dessert out of Scott. With the bear passed out, they all celebrate. Scott gets up and goes to shake Duncan's hand which is a rarity for them. Duncan pats Scott's hand away and eats a leaf off the tree "you were good bait for the hear, but I took control as always like I'm gonna win every challenge".
They guys arrive back at campsite with the bear all tied up with liquorice rope all eagerly awaiting a prize. "well here you are Chris, a real chocolate bear now where's our prize?" Says Duncan proudly. Chris smirks at Duncan's arrogence, "Well Duncan, I'm afraid the task isn't over until you eat the bear and by the way, it's also tonights dinner so better get eating because the other team are on their way and if you can't finish it, one of you will be going home tonight so enjoy" says Chris. The boys all look at each other, the bear must be about 500lbs of chocolate.
15133111.title: A chocolate Bear

choices: Duncan gets rewarded as he ate the most
Team Sweet all get rewarded for winning
151331111.content:
By the time Team Dinner finally arrived Team Sweet had already devoured a quarter of the bear. Scott and Justin were taking it easy, the former because he had already eaten a lot, the latter due to trying to maintain his figure. Noah and Tyler kept up a steady pace despite their full stomachs. Duncan however was really going at it, eating far more than was required of him, his belly bulging out with at least 50lbs of chocolate. But there was still more to be had...

By the end of the challenge all the boys were clutching their distended bellies. Justin had eaten around 40lbs of chocolate, far more than the average person would eat but a minuscule amount compared to the other contestants. Scott had managed to eat 60lbs on top of all the chocolate he'd been snacking on earlier. Noah and Tyler had both managed to eat 100lbs of chocolate each but Duncan had really taken the lead with 200lbs of chocolate stuffed inside him! His shirt had ripped long ago and his fat gut grumbled and sloshed in protest, trying to digest the massive load.

After Chris had finished talking to the losing team he turned to the other contestants to explain the rewards this season:
151331111.title: They manage to eat it and Duncan eats the most

choices: Geoff goes to the Gym and meets with his buddy Duncan
Geoff has to go see Bridgette and tries to hide his slight gain while doing so
DJ comes over for their weekly videogame tourney with food like always
152.content:
It was a known fact that DJ made the best sandwiches, even better than DJ's mom although DJ would highly protest that and Mama would smack him silly for mentioning that. That is not to say that her other cooking was less and it wasn't as on many nights when he stayed at his friend DJ's house, a lot of her food would find its way into his stomach, sometimes a bit too much. Just that DJ was a sandwich making God, if there was such a thing. How he could take ordinary ingredients and make such delicious sandwiches, even plain ones, was scary and there were many including him who wondered what DJ's secret was.

The problem was, the sandwiches were addictive. At least that was what he thought. It would explain how they always tasted so good and why whenever DJ made a tray, he couldn't help but taking a few. Oftentimes just one or two but then he'd get bored or hungry or forgetful or the smell would waft over...and he would get a third, fourth, fifth, sixth, whatever until next thing they knew, the serving tray was empty and this was a pattern that repeated often. And DJ's ingredients were not the most healthful oriented. He used full calorie, none of the low calorie or diet stuff, DJ said they made food taste like crap which in comparison was kind of true. And DJ was a big guy and oddly with very little fat which was odd considering all the ingredients he used and the fact that he actually wasn't a serious exerciser. Yeah he went to the gym and stuff but that was mainly with him and Duncan and generally socialized more than anything and didn't stick to a straight routine. So he was all natural with ridiculous luck and genetics that many people would have killed and sold their souls to the devil and such things for and he never had to try.

He supposed between the whole sandwich thing and DJ's mom's cooking which again is fantastic, what happened would have been inevitable one way or the other. One day Geoff had woken up and when he dressed in front of the mirror he saw something that chilled him. His sexy six-pack abs (admittedly done with only slightly more work than DJ although with DJ he was muscle all over while Geoff actually had to work the other parts, but at least his abs had always been natural) were not as toned as they were before and there was a few inches of flab that covered them. He supposed he shouldn't have had so much to drink the night before and stayed away from DJ's sandwiches but this had never happened before. He was actually getting...he couldn't believe it, fat. At least it was only a little bit.
152.title: Geoff

choices: Duncan coaching Geoff while he gains.
Asking DJ to be Geoff's personal chef while he gains.
Contacting Chris McLean about helping Geoff gain.
1521.content:
Geoff walked into the local gym and looked around. The place was filled with fit men and woman all working out, but he felt like he was sticking out like a big, fat sore thumb. He put his hand on his tiny belly when he heard a voice call out his name. He turned his head and grinned to see Duncan walking over to him, "Hey, man!! What's up?"

Duncan bumped fists with Geoff, who grinned, "Not much, D-Man. You ready to get our work out on?" Duncan nodded, but his expression changed to a look of realization, "Geoff, did you put on a few?" Geoff's face looked panicked as he tried to think of a way to change the subject, "What are you talking about. Of course not. Let's uh... Let's start with some crunches!!" Duncan reached down a poked Geoff's stomach, which sank in slightly, "Yeah, dude. You've gained a few." Duncan lifted up Geoff's shirt and gave his tiny belly a few good pats, but Geoff shoved his tank top back down, "Stop that!!"

Duncan laughed, "No need to be so uptight, Geoff. It's not that bad. To be honest, it looks pretty good." Geoff stared at Duncan, confused, "What? My FAT looks good?"
Duncan nodded, "Yeah, dude. If you kept working out while growing that gut of yours, you could look like one of those super beefy American football players." Geoff hadn't thought if that way, but it made sense. He watched American football often, and those guys were massive. "Do you really think I should, Duncan?"

Duncan put his hand on Geoff's shoulder, "Yeah!! I think you'd look super manly if you did!! In fact, I can help you out if you want." Geoff grinned, "Alright, bro. Let's do it!!" Duncan and Geoff spent the rest of the day at the gym talking about ways to help Geoff beef up. They decided on...
1521.title: Weighing in on Geoff's weight

choices: They begin Geoff's new "diet" finding what's available
They hang out and bond a little more before starting later
15211.content:
"Thanks so much for helping me man," Geoff said shaking Duncan's hand vigorously. "At first I wasn't certain and thought gaining even the slightest weight was terrible but you've got me to see a different side of it. I mean yeah I like my abs a lot but bigger and stronger, being huge and beefy is way better when you think about it." Duncan flickered his eyes down to Geoff's belly for a second and then back up so quickly it wasn't noticed.

"Oh don't mention it, what else are buds for? I'm honored to help you. Asking DJ to help was a pretty good idea and we might incorporate that later because face it, he and his mom are fantastic cooks and make lots of good things that could help in our, uh, your quest. However as an all natural, he wouldn't really know how to properly feed and train you. Heck, he doesn't really exercise except when required which is so bull that he's got muscles like those but whatever. He's one of those rare gifted people so whatever he does/doesn't do won't really apply to you anyways." Geoff nodded. That made total sense of course so asking DJ for help (at least initally) would not have been a good idea. DJ probably wouldn't get it and freak out.

"We still get to eat their food right?" Geoff asked and Duncan gave him the 'duh' look.
"I just said that, just that we aren't solely going to be relying on them."
"Oh yeah."
"Very good. Well before we start, we're going to need some time getting some fuel and packing more mass onto that skinny frame of yours."
"Hey, I resent that. I am NOT skinny!" Geoff said pouting, crossing his arms.
"If you want to be really big, yes you are. So we're going to add some weight on of course."
"How?" Geoff asked and Duncan smirked.
"Food of course. The all-food diet."
"What's that?"
"You're going to eat whatever you want when you want and not care about such things like calories or fat, as long as you exceed a certain amount of calories per day"
"So even junk food?" Geoff asked salivating. Duncan smirked.
"Yeah. All the pizza, hamburgers, icecream, chips, chocolate, whatever, that you want."
"That sounds exciting! This will really help?"
"Oh, absolutely. You'll be packing on the pounds in no time and I'll help you the whole time," Duncan said grinning.
15211.title: Duncan coaching Geoff while he gains.

choices: Geoff wakes up to a phone call from Duncan.
152111.content:
Duncan and Geoff hung out at the gym for an hour or two working out before they decided to go eat. Duncan wasn't the kind of guy who wanted to have massive, bulging muscles, but he did like being muscular. He body was defined, but not overly so, as opposed to Geoff, who was spent most of his time on the bench press working on making his pecs and arms bigger. When the two were finished and ready to go, Geoff took his shirt off for the first time and examined his body. His arms and chest were still pretty big, but not as big as he wanted, and his stomach curved out slightly, but they didn't go farther than his pecs. Duncan gave Geoff's pecs a hard punch and it made thick, low, manly THUMP, "Nice." Duncan said.

The two left the gym and headed to a pizza place that Duncan knew. It was the kind of place that just had rows and rows of pizzas under heat lamps, and you just take what you want then pay. When they got inside, the two of them grabbed a tray each and started filling them up with Pizza. Duncan had six slices on his tray, but he only planned on eating two of them The other four where for Geoff, who had grabbed six slices himself. When Geoff and Duncan payed and grabbed their seats, Duncan went to get drinks, leaving Geoff to his own work. The party boy picked up the first slice and took a massive bit out of it, his mouth watering at the taste. He was so into it that he didn't even notice when Duncan came back with their soda.

Duncan finished his two slices quickly and pushed the other four pieces of pizza at Geoff, who had just finished eating his last slice from his plate. He leaned back in his seat and rubbed his stomach, letting out a long belch before sighing contently and sipping his soda. "What, you're done?" Duncan asked.

Geoff nodded, "Yeah. I'm really full and I don't think I can eat those other slices."
Duncan frowned and leaned forward, "Geoff, as your eating coach, I think it would be good if you DID eat those last slices. How else are you gonna gain weight if you don't pig out at every meal?"
Geoff scratched his bloated belly, "Good point." Geoff sat back up and picked up the first slice, shoving half of it into his mouth and eating quickly. After a few minutes, Geoff pushed the plate away and flopped back in his seat, "Done." Duncan pushed the two large soda glasses towards Geoff, the one that Duncan had seemingly untouched, "Those too?"
Duncan nodded, "You're gonna eat everything we get you, no matter what." Geoff sighed and gulped down the two sodas before the two decided to head home. After dropping Duncan off, Geoff went straight to his bedroom and crashed, his stomach bloated from all the pizza he had eaten, but he knew it would all help him turn into a beefy, sexy man.
152111.title: Geoff gorges on pizza.

1521112.content:
The ringing of a phone woke Geoff up from his slumber. Blearily, he went to his bedside phone and picked it up, looking at the clock. 12:00. This had better be important or he would be very unhappy. Geoff was usually a pretty chill guy with a lot of patience, but not even he could appreciate being woken up randomly from sleep at such a late hour.

"Yes," he said curtly and he heard Duncan's voice answer jovially.
"Hey Geoff, how's my big bear feeling?"
"D-man, you're confusing me for DJ. And why are you calling so late?" Geoff said, trying to keep from being irritated at his friend.
"Nah, that's soon to be you, although DJ certainly is and should be. Anyways, just wanted to know how you were doing and to confirm you were okay with this."
"Tired. I'm tired. And yes, I am okay with beefing up. Now if that's all..."
"No, no. But that's good that you're okay. Had to make sure there was no postmortem guilt or you changed your mind or something. But since you haven't, I have another task for you to do."

"Right now?" Geoff asked a bit more awake.
"Yeah right now. Constant feeding really helps to both slow down your metabolism a bit and also pack on the weight necessary. Especially at night. Studies have been done about this you know that those who also eat at odd hours of the day gain more weight." Geoff was fully awake now.

"Now, I want you to go down to your refrigerator. Are you there?" Duncan asked as Geoff walked down the steps. Geoff nodded his assent when he got there before he realized Duncan wasn't actually there and couldn't see him, as far as he knew although that would be pretty creepy if Duncan was spying. And there would have been no need to as Geoff would have either let him in or Duncan would invite himself in as he often did.

"Yeah. I'm there." Geoff's voice trembled in excitement.
"Open the refrigerator. I left you a little present earlier when I dropped you off. I want you to eat it." Geoff opened the refrigerator and pulled out...
1521112.title: Geoff wakes up to a phone call from Duncan.

choices: Geoff gives in half way and needs a belly rub.
Geoff eats it all and needs a nap.
15211121.content:
Geoff was surprised when he pulled out the huge chocolate cake Duncan had left him in his fridge. He set it on the counter and leaned against it, "D-Man, you want me to eat this whole thing?"
"Not the whole thing," Duncan said on the other end, "Well, if you can, then yeah, the whole thing. But, if you can't, just eat as much as you can fit into that growing gut of yours. You don't have to worry about slicing it. Just dig in."
"Okay, man. You wanna stay on while I eat or are you gonna go?" Geoff asked, pulling a fork out of a kitchen drawer. He buried the fork into the cake and pulled off a big chunk, pushing it into his mouth. Geoff let out a long groan of satisfaction at the taste, and started chewing fast, wanting more.
Duncan chuckled, "If you keep on moaning like that I might just stay on to see if you can finish it. No, I gotta go. I need to get up early tomorrow and think about your meal plan. Hope my big bear enjoys the cake."

There was a click, and Duncan's end went silent. Geoff wondered why Duncan had started calling him "His Big Bear", but this cake was so mesmerizing that as soon as he took another bite, all he could think about was eating more. After maybe his third or fourth huge bitch, Geoff was starting to realize how thick the cake and frosting was. He set the plate down and went to the fridge to get a glass of milk, but when he saw that it was half empty, he decided to save a glass and drink straight from the jug. Geoff took five large swigs before going back to the cake, which he had already finished a 1/3 of it. Geoff set the milk on the counter and went right back to the cake, devouring it at an incredible speed.

Geoff's extreme weakness for chocolate was his downfall in this. He could feel his stomach becoming bloated and tight, but the gooey taste of the chocolate cake was so good, he couldn't stop. After every few huge bites, Geoff would gulp down some milk to wash it down, before digging back in. After 15 minutes of eating, Geoff had eaten the entire cake and emptied the jug, and his stomach was so full that it stuck out past his pecs. The party boy threw the empty cake container and jug away and walked back to his bed slowly, rubbing his bloated belly the whole way. What he wouldn't give to have Duncan rubbing his gut right now. Geoff realized he was still dress from the day, and stripped down to his boxers. As soon as Geoff hit the bed, he passed out for the rest of the night.

The next morning, Geoff was woken up by a loud knocking at his front door. Geoff forced himself out of bed and walked to the front door to see Duncan, grinning. "Morning, big guy! How was that cake last night?" Duncan said, walking in and headed towards the kitchen.
Geoff yawned and rubbed his eyes, "Mooh- AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAH... morning. Oh, D, you don't even know. I finished that whole thing last night before I went to bed. It was SO good."
Duncan set the bags he had in his hands down and walked back over, patting Geoff's bigger stomach, "I can tell. Looks like that cake alone helped this thing get even sexier."
"What?"
"Bigger. It helped it get even bigger." Duncan put both hands on Geoff's bigger stomach and rubbed it, his hands traveling to the bottom of his belly and squeezing the newly formed fat, "You're already looking huge, Dude. I hope my big bear is hungry now."

The simple thought of food made Geoff's stomach grumble, "Yeah, I am. What did you bring over?"
Duncan walked back into the kitchen and opened the first of four bags, pulling out several wrapped breakfast sandwiches, "I stopped by a fast food place on the way over here and bought a bunch of their breakfast sandwiches. Egg, two sausage patties, bacon, cheese, on a burger bun.: Duncan reached back into a different bag and pulled out a smaller bag, "Plus I bought you a bunch of hashbrown sticks. Potatoes, especially fried ones, are GREAT for putting on the pounds." Duncan put these back in the bags and set all four of them on the coffee table in front of the TV, before grabbing Geoff by his wide shoulders and setting him down, "You start on those. I need to go get the sodas I bought you to go with this."

Since Geoff couldn't say no to his coach, he pulled out the first sandwich and started chowing down. Duncan came back with 4 large cherry cokes and sat down next to Geoff, ready to help him eat.
15211121.title: Midnight Cake and the Big Breakfast.

choices: When Geoff wakes up, Duncan has prepared a hugely tasty and filling lunch
When Geoff wakes up, Duncan takes him out to an all you can eat buffet
152111211.content:
Geoff ate most of the sandwiches and a few of the potatoes before the quickly becoming familiar sensation of being completely utterly stuffed came back over him and he thought he was going to explode. Plus, he had eaten that giant cake earlier and an enormous amount of pizza earlier than that all within the last 24 hours, not even a whole day by time standards. He leaned his head back and moaned.

"Hic-sorry coach, I-ugh," Geoff released a huge belch and moaned rubbing his stomach and Duncan shifted Geoff's hands off and continued rubbing and Geoff moaned with relief this time as Duncan had magic fingers and oh that was so good...."uh, oh yeah, I don't think I can finish," Geoff said sadly, watching the tv and not Duncan to spare him the disappointment of seeing failure. "I really did try..." Duncan smirked, leaning his head closer against Geoff, tickling him with his breath.

"Oh, I know. I know you did try which is what's important. And I did feed you that cake last night so it's really unrealistic to expect you to actually finish. In fact, you finished way more than I thought you would. In fact, I'm proud of you my big bear as you ate far more than I or anyone could have expected you to. Now lay down, I want to give you a treat." Gently pushing Geoff down, Duncan proceeded to really massage Geoff's swollen protesting gut which really, really felt good as he sighed and moaned appreciatively letting Duncan know he was doing a good job. And Duncan was impressed. Geoff's belly was absolutely huge compared to normal and felt so hard (from being stuffed so much) yet soft at the same time as he pinched and kneaded it, kind of like dough. Geoff's body was on full hot alert and he could feel Duncan's hands touching and playing. Geoff pointed out spots that needed attention and Duncan gave it and it was sooooooo good that he had Duncan as a coach because wow, he was amazing at this.

"Big bear is getting so cute and beefy," Duncan said complimentingly as he moved up fondly playing with Geoff's pecs.
"But not big enough," said Geoff and Duncan just smirked.
"No, but well on the way to becoming huge. After all, we've only just begun." Duncan shuffled out to the kitchen.
"Where you going?" Geoff asked. Duncan turned and grinned mischieviously.
"Plotting lunch and dinner big bear. You just stay there all cute and rest your manly belly a bit while I work. I'll take good care of you."
"Okay," Geoff turned watching the tv, scratching his belly at subconsciously as he watched a show on wolves and it went well as he nodded off to sleep which was so cute, Duncan had to smile.
152111211.title: Geoff gives in half way and needs a belly rub.

choices: When Geoff wakes up, Duncan takes him to the gym.
1521112111.content:
Geoff moaned softly as he opened his eyes, feeling a slight, but wonderful pressure on his stomach. He no longer felt painfully bloated like before, and he could feel the pressure on his belly get a little stronger, but in a good way. Geoff lifted his head up so he could see over his beefy pecs and saw that it was Duncan who was rubbing his belly. Duncan had both hands on it and he was kneading into it happily. Even with the added pressure, Duncan's hands worked like magic on his tummy. Every single movement made Geoff groan happily and occasionally sent chills up his spine. Duncan laughed softly as he squeezed Geoff's squishy belly with both hands, "Morning. Did my Big Bear have a nice nap?"

Geoff smiled, "Sure did. I think I slept off that cake and those sandwiches." Geoff sat up and pushed against his stomach, which smooshed inward and there was hardly any pressure on his stomach. He smiled, happy to see that he could eat even more now for Duncan, "So how long was I asleep for?" Geoff asked.
Duncan ran his hands in circles on Geoff's belly, "A few hours. It's already two in the afternoon and you feel asleep at. Lunch should be done in a few minutes."
"Oh, cool." Geoff said, happy to know it was time to eat again. He looked up at Duncan and smiled, "You sure do love rubbing my belly, don't you, Coach?"
Duncan smiled, squeezing it with one hand and rubbing it with the other, "I really do. Watching it grow and rubbing it are my two favorite things about coaching you while you grow. I hope you don't mind but whenever I had to wait for food to cook, I would come back in here and rub your big belly for you, since you looked so uncomfortable and stuffed while you tried to sleep."

Geoff smiled, "Hey, Coach, no worries. That's what you're here for, rub and grope it all you want, whenever you want." Geoff said, smacking his soft belly hard, making a loud smack and causing it to jiggle.
Duncan grinned and patted it a few more times, before reaching up and punching one of Geoff's thick pecs, "We'd better start working you out soon. We don't want your pecs to get soft." There was a loud DING and Duncan stood up, walking to the kitchen, "Looks like lunch is ready." Geoff sat up on the couch, adjusting his boxers(the only thing he was still wearing), while Duncan put together his lunch. Geoff sniffed the air and he heard his stomach growl as he smelled something greasy. Seconds later, Duncan walked back in with a big plate of chicken strips and french fries, setting them down on the coffee table in front of Geoff, "Lemme go grab my Big Bear his soda."

Duncan came back quickly from the kitchen with one of the large cherry cokes he had bought Geoff for breakfast that he never got to drink. The green haired teen sat down next to his huge best friend and rubbed his shoulders, "Eat up!!"
"Thanks, Coach. Man, this smells SO good." Geoff reached down and grabbed the first strip in the pile of twelve, tearing it in half and dipping it in ketchup before shoving it into his mouth, groaning happily at the taste. Geoff happily started eating as he and Duncan watched TV, Duncan's hand rest on Geoff's growing belly the entire time, scratching it absentmindedly and enjoying the show they were watching.

Thirty minutes passed by quickly and Geoff had managed to drink the entire large soda, eat all of the fries, and eight of the twelve chicken strips. He groaned loudly as he sank into his couch and put his hands on his bloated belly. Duncan smiled as he held one chicken strip up to Geoff's mouth, "Just one more and you can rest." Duncan said, trying to sway Geoff his way.
Geoff shook his head, "No, way, Coach. I'm way to full."
Duncan smiled, "If my Big Bear eats this last piece, I'll give him the best belly rub of his life." Geoff sighed, thinking if over. He was really full, but the way Duncan called him his "Big Bear" really made it hard to say no. Geoff opened his mouth and bit off half of it, chewing slowly as Duncan smiled, "I knew you could eat another one. Just one more bite." Geoff swallowed the chicken in house mouth before letting Duncan feed him the last bite, Duncan's fingertips being pulled into Geoff's mouth.

Duncan pulled them out and Geoff chewed the last bite swallowed, letting out a loud belch, "Uuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuurp!!~"
Duncan smiled and patted Geoff's bloated belly, "Now THAT is what I call manly."
Geoff grins, "Thanks. Man, it feels so good to have that out. Now, what about that belly rub again?"
Duncan smiled and moved Geoff into a laying position, putting both hands on Geoff's bloated gut and working his magic. Geoff was so comfortable that it didn't take long for Duncan's rhythmic motions to lull Geoff back to sleep. Duncan relaxed on the couch and rubbed his sleeping Bear's hard belly as he watched TV and waited for Geoff to wake up.
1521112111.title: Belly Rubs and Lunch.

choices: Duncan manages to wake Geoff up long enough for another meal
Geoff is so exhausted, he sleeps the whole night through
15211121111.content:
Duncan felt Geoff begin to stir a little and moved to the side as Geoff gave huge drawn out yawn as he pulled himself up, shaking and shifting his shoulders and feet. Stretching, Geoff got to his feet and instinctively rubbed his belly which made Duncan grin a little.

"How's my big bear doing," Duncan asked and Geoff opened his eyes and smiled.
"Really good D! Feel like I'm ready and pumped for anything!" Geoff said flexing and posing a bit causing Duncan to laugh a bit as he got up and placed his hands on Geoff's pecs and belly.

"I say big guy," he whispered and Geoff felt really good and warm at the way Duncan said it as he trailed his fingers down, again playing with the new softness which he never seemed to tire of. Duncan then straightened up and seemed to be replaced as he snapped a command.

"Geoff, get your workout outfit on, we're going to work on your arms, chest, and legs to give you good support for your big frame and prevent such important necessities from getting to soft," Duncan said thumping Geoff's chest, pleased at the thumped thick sound it made.

"Sir, yes sir!" Geoff saluted as he bounded heavily up the stairs to his room to get his workout clothes.The tanktop was a bit of a struggle to get on, getting stuck at his beefy pecs and then stretched by his expanded belly but he finally did manage to get it on right before Duncan came up wondering what was the holdup.

"What's taking so damn-oh," Duncan said, staring at Geoff's shirt and Geoff felt a bit self-conscious as it barely fit and showed a bit too much, unable to completely cover his belly after struggling to contain his wide chest.

"S-sorry coach, just having trouble getting this on," Geoff said a bit confused. "It fit much better before but now it was a bit of a struggle to get on." Duncan licked his lips.

“That’s fine. We’ll get more fitting things later. For now, let’s just go,” Duncan said, grinning as he walked behind Geoff and he got to watch his bear from behind with those thick beefy shoulders, gorgeous golden locks of hair, wide back, and nicely bouncing butt which it had not done before. Geoff was already beefing up before their eyes and Duncan loved just how big his bear had gotten already. The gains would eventually slow down but for now were clipping along at a fast pace with the major sudden changes in eating and Geoff clearly had gained a bit more than either had thought which was exciting.

When they got to the gym, Geoff could really feel the eyes on him and Duncan holding his hand and glaring at anyone who stared for too long, causing people to look away. While Geoff was committed to gaining and beefing up, he still was a bit shy of being stared at like that and the faint looks of disgust at his belly like he was some ex-jock who let a bit too much go and gone to seed did not make him feel particularly well.

“Ignore them, they mean nothing,” Duncan said under his breath squeezing Geoff’s hand as they took their usual spot of workout that was known to be theirs. Although Duncan was not the biggest or strongest person in there, and actually kind of far from the league of DJ, Geoff, etc, no one dared mess with Duncan whose bad-ass attitude, reputation, and death stare kept most people afraid of him which Geoff thought kind of funny because Duncan was one of the nicest people he knew and a bit of a sweet heart, although that might be only to people he liked. On the other hand, he did see Duncan go nuclear on someone once and he never wanted to see that again as Duncan really was scary.
“Hey amigos,” came the sultry voice of Alejandro, one of the very few people who was not terrified of Duncan. Alejandro leaned against the wall watching them his bright green eyes glistening innocence although all three were aware Alejandro was far from the angelic being people often took him to be. They had a weird relationship with him and Duncan and Geoff were never really sure if Alejandro really wanted to be friends or was just messing with their minds so they sort of considered him a friend although Duncan withheld trust in that department.

“Hey Alejandro,” Duncan said carefully and Alejandro smiled a bit flashing teeth as he was well aware and understanding of their reluctance.
“I’ve seen you guys have gone through a few changes,” Alejandro said, his eyes flickering to look at Geoff and then back to Duncan. Duncan crossed his arms and looked edgy, trying to figure out what Alejandro’s angle was, if he was insulting them or like what?

“What’s it to ya?” Alejandro shrugged his shoulders and Geoff was a little nervous. Alejandro was a pretty big guy and although not to the same extent as Geoff or DJ, easily outweighed and outmuscled Duncan, and was potentially even more vicious should he choose to be as Alejandro was legendary at their school’s hockey and wrestling team. Duncan had to be careful in how he dealt with Alejandro.

“Nothing. I just wanted to say that Geoff looks pretty good like this,” he said, surprising both of them.
“Really?” Duncan and Geoff asked startled at this unexpected comment.
“Yes, very much so. His frame had always been more of a powerlifter or beefy guy anyways. I always had been kind of disappointed that he had abs to be honest so think this is a good turn of events.”
“Uh, thank you?” Geoff said confusedly while Duncan fumed. Alejandro smirked at Duncan.
“Down boy, I was just giving a compliment, no need for the stare. I just wanted to say congratulations and finally for you doing what should have been done earlier.”
“Does everyone think this?” Geoff asked interested. If Alejandro thought this then maybe other people did too and he was just paranoid.
“Alas no. We three are among a minority in this respect.” Alejandro gave Geoff a longer look over, running his eyes up and down appreciatively.
“Can I touch?” and Duncan growled but did not stop him as Alejandro put his hands on Geoff’s exposed belly and trailed up to his beefy chest and back down rubbing it.
“Interesting,” Alejandro said, his voice having a tinge of warmth for once.
“He’s mine,” Duncan said and Alejandro turned and looked at him as they engaged in a stare off, Duncan glaring and Alejandro looking back almost blankly before Alejandro finally turned away from them.

“Understood,” Alejandro said looking back at Geoff. “As pretty as you are, I can see you’re taken. That’s okay, I have someone else in mind.” Alejandro looked across the room and they both followed his gaze and saw him looking at Tyler who was clumsily trying to shoot a basket and fell on the floor. Duncan and Geoff both looked at each other and back at Alejandro. Alejandro noticed their looks and he shrugged almost dejectedly. “Yes, I know, Tyler really? But there’s just something…” they all winced when Tyler epically fell on the floor again. “about him…ugh, I’m going to go help him. See you guys later.” With that, Alejandro went across the gym to where Tyler was and helped him up, whispering something.

“Who would have thought?” asked Geoff when it was safe.
“I know. That is just…unexpected,” Duncan replied.
“I mean Alejandro and Tyler…?” Geoff said and Duncan finished.

“I know. Let’s just get to working out.” Duncan put him through a very rigorous routine of benchpress, curls, squats, deadlifts, and variants. By the time Geoff was done, he was sore in every part of his body and sweat drenched his ill-fitting uniform. That was probably the hardest workout he’d ever done in his life but also highly successful as his muscles were pumped and bulging which Duncan admired, rubbing them as he cooed compliments in Geoff’s ear about his Big Bear which Geoff could barely understand over the blood rush in his head and how tired he felt. Duncan was a bit tired as well but he held back a little just so he could get the nice rushing pump and feeling of exhilaration but not to exhaustion as he knew he was going to need to help Geoff out. Struggling, they went back out and Geoff slid into the car with a groan as Duncan buckled himself in and they drove back to Geoff’s house where Geoff was walk-dragged to the couch and collapsed there, not wanting to move. Duncan leaned down and tried to peel off Geoff’s uniform for him but it was so attached to him that Duncan got irritated and got out his knife and actually cut it off him which felt like such a relief to Geoff as air hit his bare skin. Duncan leaned down and rubbed him down.

“See you later my big bear. Have nice sweet dreams.” Geoff yawned and Duncan rubbed his head as Geoff closed his eyes sleepily.
“Nigh Duncan,” Geoff mumbled and was out like a light as soon as his eyes closed. Duncan stood there for a moment, and then went up to take a shower.
15211121111.title: When Geoff wakes up, Duncan takes him to the gym.

choices: Geoff eats it all in one sitting.
Geoff eats it all, but takes a few belly rub breaks.
152111211112.content:
Duncan walked back in from his shower dressed in only his skull boxers and saw Geoff's massive body passed out on the couch. His right arm across his growing belly while the other arm hung limp over the side of the couch. Duncan smiled warmly at his big, sleeping bear and knelt down, rubbing the bottom of Geoff's bigger belly. He smiled at how soft it was, and he squeezed it, his smile widening as he felt it. He stood up and gave Geoff's broad shoulders a shake, "Geoff.. Geoff, wake up." Geoff groaned slightly, but didn't budge. Duncan chuckled, "I guess you're to tired to get up. That's okay, I'll just make sure to feed you more to make up for missing dinner."

Duncan yawned and stretched his lean body, feeling his eyes getting heavy with sleep. He considered getting his clothes back on and driving home, but he soon realized how sleepy he was and knew it was a bad idea. The last thing he wanted was to wrap his car around a tree because he fell asleep. Duncan started to walk back upstairs to Geoff's room when an idea came to mind. Duncan walked back over to Geoff's sleeping form and moved the one thick arm on his stomach, lied down, and placed his head on Geoff's belly. A sleep smile spread across his face as he felt it sink into Geoff's squishy gut. He placed Geoff's hand around his shoulders and wrapped his arms around the blonde's wide body before passing out.

Geoff groaned as his eyes opened slowly, blinking a few times to try and get the sleep out of them. He raised one large hand up and rubbed his eye, yawning loudly. Geoff tried to sit up but quickly realized there was pressure on his lower torso. He leaned forward slightly so he could see over his chest and a warm smile grew across his face. He never would have thought Duncan was a cuddler, or that he could look so cute asleep, but he was and did. Geoff rubbed Duncan's back as he laid his head back down, ready to go back to sleep, but his stomach let out a loud gurgle. Geoff sighed, 'I'm sleepy, but I'm also really hungry. I don't wanna wake up Duncan though..."

"Morning."
Geoff lifted himself up with his elbows and looked down at Duncan, who still had his arms wrapped around Geoff's wide body. His eyes were half open and he had the biggest smile Geoff had ever seen on Duncan. Geoff smiled back, "Morning, Coach."
Duncan sat up and placed both hands on Geoff's fat belly, squeezing it, "Is my Big Bear hungry? I heard your belly grumble."
Geoff laughed, rubbing the back of his head, "Yeah, I am. What's on the menu for today?"
Duncan rubbed Geoff's belly happily before his hands slowly slid up to Geoff's thick, beefy pecs, which Geoff flexed and bounced as Duncan groped them, "I'm not sure yet, but my Big Bear missed his dinner last night. I'm gonna have to feed you extra today."
Geoff nodded, "Okay." The two sat there in silence for a bit, Geoff enjoying the feeling of Duncan's amazing hands exploring his new beefy body. As Duncan's hands was fondling Geoff's thick thighs, Geoff cleared his throat, "Hey, Duncan. I have a question... I mean, you've been calling me your 'Big Bear' for the last few days and we've started holding hands and everything, and what you said to Al yesterday at the gym. Are we a couple?"

Duncan smiled at Geoff and his hands slid back to Geoff's belly, looking up at him, "Well, if you want to be. Cause I kinda do."
Geoff blinked, "What about Courtney?"
"We broke up MONTHS ago. About a month before you and Bridgette did."
"Oh yeah... So, do I have to come up with a cute pet name for you now?"
"You can just keep calling me coach. I like it a lot."
Geoff gave off one of his big, goofy grins and Duncan couldn't help but smile back. He patted Geoff's belly, "I just want to make one thing clear, okay? Just because I'm super cuddly with you, does not mean I'm not a badass anymore."
Geoff laughed heartily, "I never once questioned your bad-ass-itude, Coach."
"Good. Now, I think it's time I feed my big bear his breakfast." Duncan pushed himself off of the couch and walked into the kitchen to start cooking.

"Awesome, cause I'm gonna go shower up. I stink from last night." Geoff said, pushing his large body off the couch. As much as he wanted to admire his big muscles and belly, he was starving. Geoff pulled his boxers off, washed up quickly, dried his body off, and put on a clean pair once he was in his bedroom. Geoff had intended to get in and out so he could eat, but he was having a hard time finding clothes that fit his new physic. He smiled as he finally found something he could wear, a pair of shorts that he bought a few sized bigger. He slipped them on and was surprised at how perfectly they fit him now. Geoff threw on another skin tight tank top, much like the one he wore yesterday, and went down stairs to meet Duncan for breakfast.

When Duncan saw Geoff in that snug tanktop, his face instantly lite up. He loved seeing his new boyfriend's massive pecs and big belly stuffed into tight shirts like that. He eyed Geoff's bouncing belly, which was barely covered by the tank, as he walked over to Duncan. Geoff looked over his breakfast and grinned, there was a large stack of 6 pancakes, a plate with huge portions of scrambled eggs and bacon, and a separate plate for just hash brown. "Wow, Duncan, you're a really fast cook!!"
Duncan chuckled and patted Geoff's belly, "You were gone for an hour, Bear. I was about to come find you. Now, since you missed dinner, you have to fit all of this into this." Duncan said, smacking Geoff's belly and loving the thick sound it made, "You're allowed to take breaks, but all of this has to be gone. How else will my Big Bear get bigger if he doesn't eat?"
Geoff smiled at his boyfriend, "Sure thing, Coach."
152111211112.title: Officially a couple and Geoff's big breakfast.

choices: They go shopping to get Geoff some new clothes
They get a surprise visitor who comes by while in the middle of their fun
1521112111122.content:
Disclaimer: Does not go further than flirty making out.

Duncan smiled as he watched Geoff dig hungrily into his breakfast. Up until a short time ago, Geoff wouldn’t have ever done that, well without complaining of carbs and fat, almost like one of those annoying girls. But now Geoff would probably eat everything put in front of him, even vegetables although that would certainly get a (rather cute) nose wrinkle and snort. He’d seen it done before a few times although that had been earlier although he bet Geoff still did that now…he was going to have to test that out later. Anyways, Geoff was becoming a hale hearty eater and Duncan approved very, very much as he saw that shirt squeeze tighter as his belly peeked out even more than it already was, which was a lot. He couldn’t believe he hadn’t thought of this before, the results were marvelous on his big bear. Geoff looked up for a second, smiling before realizing he still had food in his mouth that spilled out and Duncan giggled. Yes, he actually giggled and Geoff was frozen, fork in midair, just staring at him in shock. Duncan laughed even harder and Geoff looked like he thought Duncan had lost his mind while the laughter died down and Duncan took in a few shuddering breaths, getting back under control.

“Well don’t just sit there and stare, keep eating!” Duncan snarled and Geoff blanched as he started shoveling eggs into his mouth.
“Yef coach, mmf sorry,” Geoff said terrified which was both amusing and irritatingly guilt inducing as Duncan wrapped his arms around his bear.
“I’m sorry, didn’t mean to snap at you…” Duncan said, trying to apologize and Geoff paused between his bites.
“I know, just felt like messing with you,” he said grinning and Duncan for real wanted to punch that smirk off his face although he got an even better idea as he took Geoff’s spoon and shoved it in his mouth and forced him to swallow, Geoff choking a bit.
“Just keep eating,” Duncan said sitting abruptly down onto Geoff’s lap causing a ‘whoompf’. Duncan reached over and began caressing Geoff’s chest and slipping mouthfuls of food in while Geoff sat there stunned.

“Mmm, so big and beefy and manly,” Duncan continued seductively running his fingers slowly up and down. “Yeah, I do love me some beef, don’t you? Such a BIG bear like you...” Geoff was almost drooling when all of a sudden, Duncan got off his lap and returned to the other table.
“Nope, you haven’t finished all your food yet,” he said smirking at Geoff’s crestfallen expression. “Do be a good bear and eat it all for your big hibernating bulk.” Geoff rolled his eyes but continued eating, a bit faster, keeping his eyes on Duncan as Duncan looked on in fascination and amazement.”

However, Geoff began to slow and feel a bit full as he slowly scraped up the remaining bits of eggs and bacon. Duncan looked confused at these actions as he came back over.
“What’s wrong Big Bear?” Duncan asked and Geoff painfully pointed at his stomach which caused Duncan to smirk. Leaning down, he undid the button of Geoff’s pants for him and there was an audible sigh of relief from that direction as Geoff’s belly spilled out to fill the place. The tank could no longer really contain his belly at all right now. Suddenly Geoff let out a big rumbling belch which caused Geoff to blush when Duncan said “better out than in which means more room in my Big Bear’s tummy,” grinning mischievously the whole time as he rubbed the bloated gut a bit.

“Still more to go, those 3 remaining pancakes and hashbrowns are waiting for you, calling out ‘Big Bear, Big Bear, eat us to fill your sexy gut Big Bear!’” Geoff gave him the evil eye for a few seconds before moaning in pleasure as Duncan started massaging his belly with his quite talented magic hands as they moved over, kneading and playing. Duncan leaned closer, whispering in Geoff’s ear.
“So what is your response?” and Geoff grinned as he took his fork again and dug in with renewed vigor.
“Aye aye coach! This food wants to be in my gut and there in it it shall go!” Duncan smirked as he patted Geoff’s belly fondly.
“Good boy, that’s the right decision, easy does it now, don’t want you to be sick…” Duncan continued massaging Geoff’s belly while Geoff finished off the rest of the food before leaning back and sighing happily as he gives out an even more humongous belch.

“Buuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuurrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrppppppppppppppp, aw man that feels good! So glad it’s just us dudes. If there were girls, I’d never have been allowed that.” Duncan grinned.

“Oh yes, we couldn’t have that could we? Not from such a manly stud like you. That is so manly and impressive and a sign of great enjoyment of my cooking, that I did my job correct in filling up a Big Bear like you. How full are you Big Bear?” Geoff was confused by the question before looking at Duncan and realizing Duncan was playing a game because Duncan had the game face on.
“Oh, Big Bear is very full coach. Big Bear is stuffed from all your delicious food.” Duncan grinned wider, his eyes with humor and amusement as he gave Geoff’s belly a quick jiggle and squeeze, it remaining solid.
“Oh, Big Bear really is stuffed like real bear. Big Bear’s coach likes a lot.” Duncan nuzzled his head against Geoff’s wide back.

“Big Bear so big, he needs new clothes in although for now, we could do without,” Duncan said slyly, and Geoff chuckled even sounding like a bear which almost made Duncan laugh and lose the game as Geoff and Duncan struggled to get Geoff’s tight shirt off and pulled down his pants so he was just in boxers. Geoff gave him a look and Duncan smirked as he with agonizing slowness unbuttoned his button shirt until Geoff got so frustrated that Geoff pretty much ripped it off him (it was worth the loss of his shirt, he didn’t like it and was getting to get a new one later anyhow) and wavered as Duncan pulled down his pants as well .
“What now?” Geoff asked and Duncan smirked.
“Wanna make out?” Geoff gave a big smile at that.
“Heck yeah, party on.”

15211121111222.content:
It had started to get a little heated when all of a sudden the doorbell rang, causing Geoff to look towards the door and Duncan to sigh in annoyance and want to kill whoever it was that dared to interrupt what had been beginning to look like at the very min a freaking hot makeout session if not further. Geoff was blushing a little and Duncan stomped to the door and slammed the door open, as he glared at who was standing there. For the love of all that was good, it had to be HIM that interrupted like always. Duncan had to physically restrain himself from launching at the guy and he still might have had Geoff not gone up sensing the oncoming commotion and knowing how Duncan was when seeing Alejandro. The Spanish guy leaned in the doorway, nonchalant and admittedly Geoff wanted to let Duncan go and have a swing at him. But only for a moment. Still, what was he doing there?

"Al, what are you doing here?" Geoff asked since Duncan wasn't going to as he was too busy staring death glares at Alejandro right now for interrupting their activities.
"I want what you're doing," Alejandro said, taking the time to ogle Geoff which made Geoff uncomfortable and Duncan possessively jealous. But then what Alejandro admitted sunk in the silence and both Geoff and Duncan looked up surprised.

"Wh-what?" Geoff asked, surprised. This was a surprise. Seeing the stunned, disbelieving looks on their faces Alejandro groaned as he realized how that sounded.
"No, not for me numbskulls, I meant for Tyler. I've just been noticing how...big Geoff here is lately and it does have quite considerable charm if I do say so myself," Alejandro rolled his eyes at Duncan's renewed struggles to get away from Geoff and launch himself at him. "Geez, can you be any more obvious? I mean really. Geoff is cool and all and if he was single, I wouldn't mind getting a piece of that hunky man but I do respect relationships despite what you may think. And as it is, I want Tyler at the moment so no need to go all wild man on me." Duncan calmed down slightly at hearing that and a whispered promise Geoff gave him if he promised to be good and not do anything stupid. Geoff warily let go, ready to grab Duncan in case Duncan tried to start fighting again because Duncan never was predictable around Alejandro or vice versa. Duncan gave a smile to Geoff and stepped aside a bit and crossed his arms.

“So what is this about Tyler?” Duncan asked, his eyebrows lifting a little. Alejandro blushed, his tan face darkening a little.
“I…I kind of like him as you know…course, he’s kind of oblivious as you can probably understand and I’ve never really been good at exposing myself to others…” Duncan gave a snort and Alejandro looked up, a bit pissed.

“S-sorry dude, it’s just that, you being afraid of exposing yourself…” Geoff said, struggling not to laugh himself and Duncan couldn’t help but do so.
“You danced naked with only those straps for the entire school once during bloody lunchtime and you say you’re scared of straight out telling Tyler you like him? That’s hilarious,” Duncan said laughing and Alejandro just sighed.

“I know, I know, it’s embarrassing! But that’s different and I really like him…and before you ask, I don’t know why, I just do and I feel all different around him compared to everyone else and he is freaking oblivious and it just hurts so much…” Alejandro trailed off and Duncan and Geoff were surprised because Alejandro genuinely seemed to really like Tyler which admittedly they thought was a bit of a joke or boredom since Alejandro had a reputation of buzzing around but looking at him now…
“Back on track, what is it you need from us again?” Geoff asked and Alejandro looked at him hopefully.

“Well, you know Tyler and how he always wants to be good at sports but never really seems to do them very well? I was thinking maybe you could talk him into doing something, oh I don’t know, with the heavy lifting. It would not only capitalize on his strengths but do everyone a favor since it would get Tyler away from the sports arena and injuring everyone and himself? And he always says he wants to be bigger and stronger and well, I just thought of you guys and how well it works for you and I want that with me and Tyler. And, not that he isn’t sexy right now but can you imagine how awesome it would be to bulk up a bit?” Alejandro’s eyes brightened at the thought and Duncan understood totally and emphasized. Maybe Alejandro wasn’t so bad, he was acting differently from how he used to be all snooty and high almighty. He rather liked this change and Alejandro actually wasn’t so bad when he didn’t act all superior all the time (though Duncan grudgingly admitted Alejandro was in many areas compared to most people, it still was irritating to be reminded of it).

“Sure, how can we help you?” Duncan asked and Geoff had the gall to actually look shocked as did Alejandro. Alejandro blinked in surprise, then pleasure. That was easier than he thought, he thought that it would take a lot more than that to win Duncan over considering their past relationship. A bit too easy…Alejandro kept calm as he cast a critical look over Duncan. He wasn’t sure if this was a trick or not but for now, he was just going to keep watch until he knew for sure.

“I don’t know, maybe you, Geoff, me, and Tyler could go on a friendly outing?”
“A double date?”
“Yeah, like that,” Alejandro said.
“I don’t know…” Duncan said thinking about it. A double date with Alejandro and Tyler? That might or might not end in disaster. Alejandro straightened up and shrugged his shoulders.
“Just think about it. You know how to contact me,” Alejandro said, winking a little as he strolled off. When he was gone, Geoff looked at Duncan who was staring in the direction Alejandro had gone.
“Whatcha thinking D?” Geoff asked. “Do you want to?”
Duncan replied…

152111211112221.content:
Duncan thought about it and shrugged, "Sure, it won't be that bad." Duncan wrapped his arms around his thick boyfriend's wide body and smiled, "As long as I get to spend time with my bear it doesn't matter who we're with." Geoff's stood there for a second, smiling that big goofy smile of his, when he realized what Duncan had said and his face turned bright red. Duncan chuckled and unwrapped his arms, "You should go get dressed, big guy. We need to go shopping for food before we go out tonight."

"Sure thing, Coach!!" Geoff gave Duncan a kiss on the forehead and headed towards the bedroom. Duncan smacked Geoff's bubble butt as he walked before grinning and pulling his cellphone out to text Al. Geoff made it into his bedroom and he started to go through his closet, trying to find something to wear, but Geoff quickly realized that almost nothing he had fit him. Everything was too tight on him; his button ups wouldn't button, his thick arms tore his t-shirt sleeves, and he could barely fit a pair of his shorts on around his wide waist. After about ten minutes, Geoff was finally able to find an outfit that fit him; a black and pink striped tank top that clung to his chest and belly, and a pair of cargo shorts that showed off his bubble butt nicely. Geoff sighed, "Well, it's still tight, but at least it covers everything up..."

Geoff walked into the front room and a grin spread across Duncan's face instantly. Geoff rubbed the back of his head and laughed, "It's uh... It's a little tight."

Duncan put both his hands on Geoff's belly and rubbed it, "Just how I like it."

Geoff felt his face flush, "You know, D, maybe we should get me some new clothes? This is kinda the only outfit I have that fits anymore."

Duncan smiled, "Sure thing, Baby. While we're at the mall we'll feed this belly of yours first. That way we'll know what size to get you when you're stuffed."

After an hour of driving, Geoff and Duncan reached the mall and headed inside, "Where do you wanna eat first, Bear?" Duncan asked as he interlaced his fingers with Geoff's.

Geoff scratched his chin as they walked towards the food court, but once they got there the intoxicating scent of cheeseburgers took over. Without even saying anything Geoff headed straight towards the burger place and Duncan followed, being pulled along by his big bear. Duncan pulled out his credit card and smiled, "Go ahead and order anything you want, big guy."

That wide, goofy grin spread across Geoff's face and he made sure to make a big order so he could get even bigger for his coach. Geoff ordered two triple cheese burgers, a large order of fries, and an extra large Dr. pepper. Duncan paid and as soon as the order was up, the two sat down and Geoff dug in. Duncan sat next to him the whole time, rubbing his belly and encouraging his bear to eat more.

After 10 minutes, Geoff leaned back in his seat, rubbing his stuffed belly with his massive hand, "Oh man, that was so good."

Duncan smiled, patting Geoff's solid stomach, "Look at you. A few days ago you would have stopped after just one burger."

Geoff grinned, "YEP. To be honest, Coach... I'm still hungry." Those were three of Duncan's favorite words. He rubbed the bottom of Geoff's belly, which was peaking out of his tank top, and told Geoff to wait here while he went and got his Big Bear a reward.

Duncan comes back with...
152111211112221.title: Big lunch at the food court

1521112111122212.content:
"Hey Bear, look what I brought you," Duncan said as he placed a bowl containing a large mound of icecream and chocolate sauce in front of Geoff. "I got it from that new icecream shop, 'cream 'n things' or whatever its called. Amazing discounts for a newly opened store. Anyways, I know how much you love chocolate." Duncan grinned a little at Geoff, remembering the cake he left him. Man, if only he could have seen or gotten a tape of it. Oh well, he'll just do it next time. Geoff looked up at the treat and wasn't sure whether to drool, cry, or both.

It was a mountain of vanilla icecream covered with chunks of fudge and chocolate sauce, sprinkles, and of course the cute little cherries on top like little flags. Geoff looked over at Duncan and smiled.

"Coach, you're amazing but I don't know if I can eat all that," Geoff said, his smile turning into a frown at the but. "Not if I want to have dinner tonight. Plus, I may still have room left over after that absolutely delicious lunch but not that much." Duncan shrugged as he affectionately rubbed Geoff's belly. Now that they were together, Duncan was very touchy-feely with Geoff which was different than when he used to be more aloof hands-offish not wanting to touch anyone longer than necessary. Geoff found it cute and adorable how his coach took such good care of him and others.

"That's okay, I was hoping to share anyways. It does look really good you know, just like you." Duncan said playfully. Geoff widened his eyes in mock hurt.
"I'm a large bowl of icecream to you?" Duncan smirked, as he trailed his eyes up and down Geoff's body for him to see.
"Oh yeah. Large, sweet, and deliciously good. I just want to eat you up, metaphorically speaking." Duncan added. "Except of course you don't melt, unless I make you." Geoff smirked back;

"Someone should wash your mouth out with soap you dirty talker you," Geoff said and Duncan cocked his eyebrows seductively.
"You can clean my mouth anytime with yours." Geoff looked around at some people who were beginning to stare at them. It wasn't like they were exactly keeping their voices down.

"Yeah, let's just stop talking about this, people are beginning to stare." Duncan grinned and pulled Geoff closer to him.
"Hey everybody, this is Bear, and he's my-mmfff" Geoff covered Duncan's mouth.
"Ignore him," Geoff said and people broke away bored now that there wasn't anything interesting going on. When they were gone, Geoff let go of Duncan. Duncan grinned at Geoff and Geoff despite himself grinned back. Duncan took out two spoons and gave one to Geoff.

"Anyways, there's a big sundae waiting for us to eat it," Duncan said looking at it.
"Okay Coach," Geoff said getting ready and on Duncan's signal, they both dug into the sundae.

It was as everything that it had been promised, better in fact.Duncan thought it was one of the most delicious things he ever tasted and Geoff was sure enjoying it because of the moanings and groanings of pleasure. Despite the large size, it was soon gone the lion paw's majority of it of course in his bear's belly but a decent amount in his as well and if Duncan felt stuffed, he couldn't imagine what Bear was feeling. Duncan looked over to see Geoff nearly passed out, his eyes glazed and unfocused and totally in pain as he rubbed his showing belly. The tanktop had rolled up even further and Geoff's belly looked and felt completely solid, about to explode at any moment.Duncan forced himself over and started rubbing Geoff's belly soothingly as well. Letting out a massive belch, Geoff moaned again opening one eye weariy.

"-uuuuuuuuuuuuuuuurrrrrrrrrrrrrrrpppppppp, Oh god, I think I'm goimg to explode. This is the end for me." Duncan rolled his eyes as he continued to apply pressure causing Geoff to do another series of belches.

"I admit, that might have been overdoing it and a bit of a mistake but that sure was good wasn't it?" Geoff slumped his head in agreement of Duncan's comment. It was good, so could he couldn't have stopped himself if he tried. Which he had no desire for, he just didn't think he'd even eat that much. When one thought about it, he'd never thought he'd eat this much or do what he was doing and Duncan was right, in only a matter of days he had changed his whole life around completely and it was like something was unlocked inside him. The beast, so to speak. Geoff groaned in pleasure again as Duncan rubbed and massaged his way overstuffed belly and belched a couple more times in relief. Duncan was phenomenal, he had no idea how but Duncan was gifted at this. Opening his eyes, he grinned weakly at Coach, dully noting the irony which would appear much funnier later but right now, Geoff was too focused on his pain. Coach's belly was also bloated a little and peaked out of his tight shirt as well. While the bloat wouldn't last for long, it was still weird to see Duncan even sporting a little gut compared to the fact that most of the time his stomach was flat.

Okay, he liked growing but there were certain disadvantages like this and clothes. Oh well. He managed to keep Duncan off untill they got home and as soon as they got in the door, Duncan growled and tackled him to the floor laying kisses as he yanked Geoff's shirt off surprisingly fast.

Geoff was fast asleep in bed, snoring happily after spending an amazing first time with his boyfriend. He stirred in his sleep and slowly opened his eyes, blinking them a few times before sitting up and pulling himself out of bed. Without thinking, Geoff put on his pajama pants and his skin tight pink and black tank top -his belly now sticking out of the bottom no matter how much he tried to hide it- and walked into the kitchen, following the scent of amazing food.

When Geoff reached the kitchen, he smiled sleepily at Duncan, who was cooking a big meal for Geoff, "Mornin'..." He said sleepily.
Duncan turned around, smiled, and walked over, wrapping his arms around Geoff's wide middle and kissing him softly on the lips, "Morning. Did my big bear sleep well?"

"I'm making my big Bear a special dinner! All of his favorite foods: ribs, a few burgers, a LOT of mashed potatoes, and for a dessert a nice big chocolate cake." Duncan said with a bit of mischievous in his voice. No matter how much Geoff ate, Duncan knew Geoff couldn't say no to chocolate cake.

Geoff smiled and flexed his big arm, which made Duncan lean in and kiss his bicep, "Tomorrow before our double date we'll go to the gym and get you a work out." Duncan said, patting Geoff's belly, "But lets give fill this up first."

Duncan set Geoff down at the table and brought in two massive plates: one with a huge stack of barbeque ribs and mashed potatoes, the other with a couple double cheese burgers with fries. Duncan set down a full bottle of soda and sat down next to Geoff, who had picked up a burger and just started chowing down. Duncan watched, mesmerized by his big bear's big appetite. Geoff finished the first burger and moved onto the second one, eating a few fries in between bites, and before he knew it, they were gone and in his growing belly. Geoff opened the soda and put the bottle to his lips, chugging half of it before setting it down and letting out a massive belch, "UUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUURP.", before going right back into eating. He tore into the stack of bbq ribs and just started inhaling the meat off of the bones.

Duncan watched, completely in love with Geoff, as he gorged himself on his cooking. The ribs were gone and Geoff devoured the mashed potatoes just as quickly, picking up the soda and and swallowing the last of it before slouching back in his seat and letting another huge burp, "UUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUURP.... WOOH."
Duncan leaned in and rubbed his hands on Geoff's bloated, solid belly, "My big bear is getting to be such a good eater. I'm gonna have to start making even more food." he said as he massaged Geoff's growing, stuffed belly.

Alejandro scanned Duncan slowly. "Yep, also hot, in a completely different kind of way." Duncan shook his head.

Geoff here is going to require a lot of food to keep this sexy tank full and I imagine Tyler will too," Duncan slapped his hand against Geoff's stomach releasing another pent up burp. 152311111.content:
The day of DJ's party arrived and Geoff and Duncan were excited, both because it was a party and also that DJ was providing the food. There was going to be a lot of people there.

"Dude, thanks so much for doing this!" Duncan told him.

"Yeah, you're the best!" Geoff added. DJ nodded and stretched his arms, letting out a big yawn.

"Oh man I'm tired. I was up all night cooking, again. I don't know why I let you guys convince me this was a good idea. On the other hand, I will get to have more opinions and reviews for my cooking to decide what to send in for the contest so there is that."

"That's the spirit! Speaking of, we should probably set it out, people are going to be coming in an hour." Duncan, Geoff, and DJ set out all the tables, each one containing platters of all different sorts and drinks. Geoff and Duncan each had a couple samples of it while doing so, a hotdog here, a roll there, some of DJ's delicious mayo splattered sanwhiches there, etc. They were still eating a sample when the first people to arrive came. It was Tyler, his girlfriend Lindsay, Geoff's on-off ex(?) girlfriend Bridgette (Geoff wasn't at all sure what their status was at this point), and Leshawna.

"Hey guys! I see you already got started on the snacks! I'm starving, and I know this is going to be good," Leshawna said hurrying over. Spooning some chilli into a bowl she brought the spoon to her mouth and tasted it, letting out a long sigh. "This is so good," she moaned. Tyler, Lindsay, and Bridgette got other things and made similar moans of pleasure. Tyler loved the ribs, Bridgette loved the salad, and Lindsay shared some of Tyler's ribs. Soon other people started arriving as well: Alejandro and Heather, Cody, Brick, Scott, Eva, Lightning, and all sorts of people, known and unknown. Some of those people were there because they heard there was a party with free food and decided to crash it. Once the flood started, DJ's lawn and house became filled with people. Geoff turned on the music and everybody danced.

There was also a lot of people that hung out around the food tables and they were very crowded. It was a good thing DJ was experienced at making a lot of food on short notice since everyone actually managed to have enough. More than enough actually as when people weren't dancing or talking, people were stuffing their faces with DJ's food. Even health fanatics Alejandro and Brick were stuffing their faces with anything they could get their hungry hands on. When a tray of food ran out, DJ just ran to the kitchen and brought out a new one. He also made sure to ask everybody what they thought about the food which generally got responses of "amazing," "fucking amazing," "heavenly," etc. Nobody had anything bad to say and everybody was in awe of DJ's cooking skills.

When it became an eating party more than anything else, various food competitions broke out like who could eat the most hotdogs in five minutes or consume the most burgers or mac n' cheese. Surprisingly, Alejandro won the hot-dog eating competition. When Alejandro lets loose, he lets loose, and he was a very highly competitive person. Heather taunted him about all the sausages he must have sucked to enable him to eat all those hot-dogs so fast but was shut up when he deadpanned back that he did. No one was sure if or how much Alejandro was joking about it. While it was fairly obvious to all but the most astute that Alejandro was head-over-heels for Heather, he was a known swinger who went both ways.

Geoff crushed the sandwich competition though Brick came pretty close. Geoff however was more used to eating them consistently though and he was a sandwich eating machine. Eventually, all the food was consumed by the party-goers and they milled about, occasionally rubbing their bloated distended bellies when they thought no one was watching. Everybody was pretty full and were all thus surprised when DJ brought out multiple dessert trays that had various pies and cakes sitting on them.

"Oh god, I think I'm going to explode," Cody moaned, even as he eagerly cut himself some slices of cake. There was a lot of agreement with this statement as people ate their dessert, although more slowly than they had the earlier meals as they were already full. Geoff was one of the few who was not yet suffering from an aching belly because he was getting used to crazy amounts of DJ's food, especially after the feast he had eaten when DJ had him and Duncan test before. Now that had been a struggle on how to not explode so this was nothing yet. He just kept opening his mouth and chewed, enjoying the rich sugary delicious flavor of cake.

First one by one and then groups eventually stopped eating once they became too full to continue eating anymore. There was still a lot of cake and pie left but they simply couldn't handle it anymore. With a lot of burping and shifting of positions, trying to subtlely open up pants to allow room, groaning, and rubbing of guts, everybody laid down. Geoff eventually stopped too when he got tired and his pants felt constrained around his massively bloated gut, which was strange considering he had only just gotten new pants recently. With a thunk, he sat down next to Duncan and just unbuttoned his pants sighing in relief.

"UUUUUUUURRRPPP oh man, that feels so good," Geoff groaned and Duncan was again amazed to see how big Geoff's stomach had expanded with no hint of six pack abs anywhere. It looked like a big solid ball underneath defined pecs. Of course, Duncan had been noticing that Geoff's famous abs were beginning to smudge but as Geoff put on some weight, but this was no longer subtle once they got a taste of DJ's food. Duncan stretched back his arms and smiled as his own shirt rose up, exposing his bloated stomach which pushed forward a bit. It went out a little bit further than when he and Geoff had tested food out with DJ which was awesome and meant he must be gaining some weight which was great! Slapping his stomach he let out a burp in relief. DJ's food was so good but so filling. How on earth was DJ not incredibly fat if he could cook like this? It was just so odd to think about so Duncan changed thoughts as he rubbed his full aching belly.

Looking over, Duncan saw Alejandro who was also leaning back, his normal six-pack washboard abs gone and buried under a highly distended belly that forced his red shirt to rise over. It wasn't quite as big as Geoff's but it was pretty dang big, especially compared to earlier. Weirdly, Heather was being nice and rubbing and soothing it and it was obvious Alejandro was getting a lot of pleasure from that.

Once people could manage to make themselves move again, they got up and waddled off, bellies swaying.

Duncan smirked as he reached out but it disappeared when the first time Geoff accidentally yanked him down because he wasn't ready. Getting back up, they tried again and eventually after a few tries, Geoff managed to get up, belly-swaying.

"Finally," Duncan said, poking Geoff in the gut.

"Hey DJ, can we stay the night?" Duncan asked when they waddled slowly up to the back kitchen door.
"Of course you can," DJ said as he put them into the guest bedroom. "Stay as long as you need to."
