There, DJ was cooking another huge meal. There will piles of pancakes, bacon, sausages, and other breakfast foods that were unresistable. Dj looked up and saw Geoff admiring all the food.
"I'm sorry Geoff, did I wake you?" Dj asked, concerned for his mistake.
"No, no," Geoff said, not listening but staring at the food.
"Well I'm still practicing for the food competition, do you mind helping me and testing these out?"
Geoff only heard the last words and sat on the chair. Dj handed him plate by plate, and after an hour of gorging, and a lot of food left, Duncan entered the kitchen.
"Hey Duncan!" Dj said, and Geoff muffled something, but his mouth was full so no one understood.
"Wow, Geoff's getting all the breakfast?" Duncan asked, and sat down.
Dj handed him a plate and explained he was just helping. Duncan and Geoff stuffed themselves to the brim. About 3-4 hours later the food was gone and the two boys were still a little hungry. Geoff's gut was getting big, and Duncan wasn't far behind.
"Thanks guys, how was it?" Dj asked. The boys gave great compliments and reassured Dj of his confidence in the competition.

Duncan and Geoff returned home with still a little hunger in them. They ate some more at their house and met up together at an all you can eat buffet.
1523111111.title: Overnight

15231111111.content:
At the buffet, Duncan and Geoff grabbed a plate and talked at the table. They started eating and started talking.
"Dj's food is so good!" Duncan said, and he ate another piece of pizza.
"Can't agree with you more!" Geoff said.
"I hope Dj does well in his competition, but what happens after he wins?" Geoff asked.
"Won't he go away to like some tv show and cook there?" Duncan said, realizing his point.
As much as they hated the thought, if Dj wins he'd leave. They'd miss their friend, but also his cooking. They didn't want to, but they had to sabotage Dj's win, so they came up with a plan.
15231111111.title: the buffet

152311111112.content:
Duncan and Geoff's plan to sabotage Dj's game was simple: they would make him miss the competition. They knew Dj needed his sleep, so they'd keep him up all night of the competition. The next 2 days went as usual, at least now it was usual. Duncan and Geoff always ate whenever Dj needed "help" and enjoyed every single bite. Duncan's belly was getting big, but it was an ant to Geoff's huge stomach. Both boys were also getting fatter in other places. Geoff's butt was big, and Duncan was forming a double chin. They ate endlessly and only slept for a few hours and ate the rest of the time.
Day 2 Duncan had invited some of the other boys from the party to Dj's house, for a "good-luck" for Dj. Dj fed the beasts of Geoff, Duncan, Alejandro, Brick, Lightning, Cody, Tyler, and Trent. They ate hot dogs, burgers, sandwiches, pies, cakes, and other fatty foods. Alejandro's gut stretched out a lot, with Lightning and Tyler not far behind. Brick, Trent, and Cody weren't far behind. Duncan's gut was double the size of Alejandro's and his shirt was about to rip. Geoff, however, ripped his shirt in the middle of the feast. His huge gut was bare to the air, and his dark happy trail was blowing in the wind. Geoff never realized how big he had gotten. He knew he gained a few pounds, but not enough to rip his shirt. He couldn't get up, and neither could Duncan or Alejandro. The other boys left with huge guts bouncing as they walked. Alejandro knew Duncan and Geoff were using Dj for his food and he wanted in.

After an hour or so, Geoff asked Dj for more food. Alejandro was shocked he wanted more, since he had gotten so huge, but didn't blame him for wanting more of the delicious taste. If he was gonna use Dj, he wanted to use him to the fullest. Alejandro and Duncan joined Geoff in the beg, and Dj gave each boy 3 huge cakes. They dug in and Geoff finished first, Duncan next, and Alejandro last. Alejandro had trouble keeping up with the other boys, but still finished his cake. Duncan asked for more, and Alejandro groaned to himself, but ate on anyways. After another hour or 2 of little "snacks" Duncan's shirt had ripped as well and Alejandro's shirt barely covered his belly. Alejandro couldn't get up, but with the help of Dj's strong arms he was able to waddle home. Alejandro's gut hurt, but he was definitely coming back for more.

Duncan noticed Alejandro wanting to get into their group. Duncan liked Alejandro and didn't mind, but he didn't want him taking more of Dj, but then he realized Alejandro could help their plan. He could help keep Dj awake all night.

Duncan filled Geoff in on his idea, and Geoff agreed. The nexg day when Alejandro came back, with a shirt that didn't cover his belly button, Geoff and Duncan filled Alejandro in on the plan. Alejandro liked their mischievous idea, and was up for it. Dj came out with a plates and plates of hot dogs to see if they were good enough for the show, and after 50 had been consumed they liked if. More and more food was stuffed into their faces and Geoff and Duncan didn't fit in their new shirts either.
152311111112.title: next 2 days

1523111111121.content:
Each time Duncan or Geoff ripped a shirt, the more Alejandro wanted his to rip. He was far behind the big boys and wanted to get bigger. He was never on the "outside clique" and hated the concept. This anger made him more motivated to eat.

The night had finally come, and the plan was set in action.
First the boys "ordered" a full plate of burgers. The boys ate that quick. They had huge cakes and pies next. Then they had doughnuts, cookies, brownies and other treats. They had ribs, steaks, hot dogs, and more food than you can imagine. The boys ate the most food Dj had ever served, including the huge end of the year party. After 3 hours in, Alejandro's shirt ripped. This gave him more ambition.

The boys ate endlessly as the night went on, and Duncan was getting tired. It was 5 am, 4 hours until Dj was set to go, and Dj hadn'f gotten an ounce of sleep. He knew if he had fallen asleep Dj would of remembered the competition and went to bed instantly. They needed to keep him up for another few hours so he would keep sleeping and sleep right past the competition.

Geoff was surprisingly quiet all night. He had always been the loud one, but his mouth was never full of food. He ate like a machine, everything given to him was eaten. He ate the most of the boys.

It was around 8 am and Dj saw the time.

"Oh my god!!!!!! I can't believe I didn't get any sleep! Oh my god. I wont have any time to sleep then."
Duncan's dreary eyes lit up.
"No no! You need sleep! Remember presentation is a part of the competition. You need at least an hour of sleep!" Duncan campaigned.
Dj thought, and decided he would take a rest. He set an alarm for one hour and crept into bed.
Alejandro, being the lightest of the 3, crept into his bedroom and turned off the alarm. The boys celebrated their victory of keeping Dj awake and had a celebratory sleep.
1523111111121.title: night before the competition

choices: they decided to weigh themselves first
15231111111212.content:
Alejandro woke up around 5 pm, and Geoff woke up not soon after. They realized Dj was still asleep and were sad to know he lost the competition, but glad to of kept their food and their friend. They decided to wake him up and break him the bad news.

"Dj!" Geoff shook Dj. He woke up groggy, and asked what time it was.
"5:20". Alejandro said.
"You missed your competition..." Geoff said sincerely.
"W-What?!" Dj said, and got up quick.
"But i prepared so much!!" Dj said with tears in his eyes.
Geoff felt really bad, and told Dj he was the best cook ever.
"Really?" Dj asked.
"Yes and you don't need no award to prove it." Geoff said and hugged his friend. Dj attempted to hug back but he couldn'f reach his arms all the way around Geoff. After a few minutes of Dj soaking in the bad news, Dj woke up Duncan up and asked everyone
"Whos hungry?"
15231111111212.title: Boys wake up before Dj

152311111112121.content:
Now that the competition was over, Dj could cook freely. He cooked the boys a huge dinner, consisting of 20 huge pizzas, 20 plates of burgers, 10 plates of hot dogs, 30 plates of sandwiches, and 10 cakes. In the midst of their feast, Dj realized how big they were getting.
Before, he was focused on cooking, and the responses, not the boys themselves. He knew all of them had 6 pacs, which were now lost under layers and layers of fat. He saw them chow down so fast and asked himself,
"Did I make them this way?"

After the food was all gone, Dj decided to comfront the 3 boys about their weight gain.

"So.. you guys have put on a little weight."
"A little," Duncan said and ate another doughnut.
"Actually a lot..." Dj replied. They all looked up and wondered where Dj was going with this.
"How big are you guys?" Dj asked. The boys looked at each other, and then down. They never though to weigh themselves.

They got a scale out and Geoff stepped on first.
"475!" Dj said, super surprised. Duncan was next, and he weighed 438. Alejandro was last and weighed 321.

"We got really big..." Geoff said and looked at his bare belly. He didn't fit in shirts anymore and didn't bother to find a bigger size.
"I kinda like it..." admited Alejandro. Duncan and Geoff pretended to be surprised, but actually liked it themselves. Duncan agreed, and so did Geoff.
"So do you guys need me to like, feed you?" Dj asked. The boys again looked at each other.

"Dj, everyone thinks your cooking is amazing. We want to always eat it, so if you don't mind, but could you cook for us?" Geoff asked formerly. Dj thoughh about it, and decided to do it. The boys cheered, and Dj made some more food.
152311111112121.title: the boys eat

choices: dj wants to be as big as them
dj wants them to get bigger
1523111111121211.content:
The next week was simply of stuffing food into faces. The 3 big boys were never without food in their mouths. They ate and ate, all night long. Their eating pain phase has passed and could eat endlessly easily; and they did. At the end of each day, Geoff still ate the most.

Dj never ate his cooking, he would test it, but he knew it wasn't the healthiest, so he never tried it. But now that he would cook endlessly, he would need to eat his own. After a week Dj also became obsessed with his food, and when the boys were sleeping, he was eating. Dj grew a gut himself, and gained 30 pounds in a week. The boys were proud of their friend, but he was far far behind. Geoff gained 75 pounds that week, Duncan gained 70, and Alejandro gained 62.

All four boys wouldn't stop eating, and everything was getting bigger. Geoff had moobs the size of a basketball, and Alejandro was growing a triple chin. Duncan's arms were huge, and all the boys' feet had gotten at least 2 sizes bigger. Geoff didn't notice this since he was always eating, but Dj did. The next week Dj had gained some more weight and saw his friends grow.
1523111111121211.title: the next week

15231111111212112.content:
Dj was still in the pain phase, and he couldn't take it when his belly felt like it was going to explode. He came to his senses that he wasn't going to get as big as them and decided not to gain, purposely. But this didn't stop Dj from getting ideas.

Dj wanted his friends to get bigger. He never realized how good they looked with huge bellies. He was already cooking endlessly, so how could he get them bigger?

Dj had an hour to himself as the boys ate and when he used to try to gain. So he used this hour to look up how to gain weight. He saw a page where he could add weight gain powder to their food to make them grow faster. He order 6 whole jugs and they came in the next day.
15231111111212112.title: dj wants them to get bigger

152311111112121121.content:
Dj noted how much food each boy ate a day to see how much powder he should add.

Geoff ate the most, and Duncan and Alejandro werent far behind. Alejandro had a very low metabolism and gained weight fast. All the boys ate everything they could and loved to eat it. As a test, Dj fed each boy a 1/4 gallon of powder. He did this to every single meal and waited fir the effects.

The weight gain powder had a little effect, He noted that Geoff gained about 5 pounds a day, and now he was gaining at least 6. He was displeased with the outcome.

The next week he added a 1/2 gallon. Alejandro went from gaining 5 pounds to 7, and Dj was disapointed again.

Dj was tired of wasting weeks so he put the full gallon in. Duncan went from gaining 6 pounds ti gaining 10. Finally a noticeable effect! After the 3 weeks of testing, Dj wanted to weigh the boys again.
152311111112121121.title: Dj adds weight gain powder

1523111111121211211.content:
Geoff stuffed in another bite of the wedding sized birthday cake befofe stepping on the scale. The numbers climbed and climbed, until they hit 723! Geoff was over excited, and glad to gain over 200 pounds over the last few weeks.
Next was Duncan who wasnt far behind with a weight of 709. Last was Alejandro weighing at 689. The boys' weights were close to each other and they definitely enjoyed the competition. They stuffed their faces again until they heard a crash.

Geoff had sat back down on the couch and was finishing the cake he was eating and the couch broke. It simply snapped in half, where Geoff was sitting.
"I-uhm, sorry?" Geoff said. He tried getting up but it was no use since he was so far down. He decided just to keep eating. Alejandro's eyes lit up with jealousy. Why was this fool of a boy Geoff so much fatter than him, almost 40 pounds. Alejandro wants to get a lot bigger and Geoff's fat belly was fuel to the fire.

Alejandro never stopped stuffing his face, and Dj noticed. Dj saw how much fatter Alejandro wanted to be, and saw how Duncan and Geoff were just enjoying the food. Dj decided to...
1523111111121211211.title: weighing

15231111111212112111.content: Dj wanted to help Alejandro. Alejandro did have a disadvantage for starting so late, and Dj wanted to make things fair. That week, Dj added the normal 1 gallon of weight gain powder to Geoff and Duncan's food. He added 2 gallons for Alejandro to help his weight. Alejandro gained 2 pounds for every 1 pound Geoff gained. That week, Alejandro gained 80 pounds and Geoff gained 40, and Alejandro weighed almost the same as Geoff. Duncan was slipping behind so Dj added 2/3 gallons to Duncan's. Soon all the boys weighed the same.
15231111111212112111.title: help Alejandro gain

152311111112121121112.content:
Geoff saw that Alejandro and Duncan blew up, and quick. He didn't really think of this eating all day-everyday thing as a competition, but he was not pleased when he wasnt in the lead anymore. So far, Geoff was casually eating, but now hes gonna eat as much as he can, and hes gonna be the biggest of them all.

Duncan didn't know why he gained so much extra weight so fast, he wasnt eating different. But he wasn't going to let this opportunity go to waste. He was finally in the lead and he was gonna eat like an animal. He grabbed a few cookies and stuffed them in his face.

Alejandro knew his new tactics worked, and was proud of it. He planned to keep eating like this until he weighed more than Geoff and Duncan behind. However, Dj stopped addung extra powder.

Dj was getting really tired. He had been endlessly cooking for weeks and got a break 1 hour a day. He rarely slept, and he was always hungry. He couldn't live like this! He decided he needed some help.

Dj looked online on his free time for a personal chef. He looked for only the best for his friends. After a few minutes of looking he found one and sent the request form. The chef was set to come in 2 days.

The chef came and saw the 3 huge boys and Dj with his shirt barely covering his belly button. The chef, who was Chef, just continued on. Dj told Chef the situation, and he gave him his cook book. Chef agreed and started cooking. Dj approached the fat boys.

"Guys, I no longer will be cooking for you guys. I'm sorry, but i hired a Chef with all my recipes."
All the boys were disappointed, because they loved their friend's cooking. But they weren't going to convince him of something he didn't want to do.

Now Dj had full time of his own, and the first thing he did was take a nap. A 9 hour nap. He hadn't slept this good in weeks.

After his "nap" Dj woke up and found the big boys asleep. He sat down at the table and ate some of the food there. His eyes split wide open. The cake was amazing, better than his. He dug his face into it, and enjoyed every bite. After the cake was gone Dj ate the 2 pies, the cookies, brownies, doughnuts, and all the other desserts. After finishing a mountain load of food, the pain in his belly started to cry. He rubbed his belly, while eating some more cookies. The pain was almost numbed by the taste of the food. He ate and ate and ate, and then the boys woke up.

"Hydye Gueyd" Dj said, with a mouthful of food. The boys were impressed that Dj ate this much!
152311111112121121112.title: Dj joins the gaining

1523111111121211211121.content:
Chef's food was very fattening. He added some ingredients that Dj didn't add to make it taste better, and make you gain faster. Dj's belly was touching the table- it was huge considering he only tried to gain this one night!

Duncan had gotten a lot bigger that night too. He ate the most, he started first and ended last. He was in love with this food and wanted more! Geoff and Alejandro had gotten bigger as well. Chef gave around the fattening bacon and pancakes, and everyone dug in. Dj ate the majority of the pancakes and Geoff ate the majority of the bacon. Dj decided now he wanted to gain, and be as big as the other boys. Dj still had 4 gallons of weight gain powder left, and he put it all in his food. He was 600 pounds behind but he didn't care. Dj bought some more online while eating, and dipped everything he ate in it. The 6 jugs came in, with the 10 gallons in them and he ate and ate and never stopped.

Geoff was the first to notice the gainer powder. He tried to get up and get some for himself, but then he realized he couldn't move. Geoff hadn't gotten up in weeks and now realized he couldnt. He called Chef over to get 2 jugs of the powder and Geoff dug in. Alejandro noticed the jugs next and he too couldn't move. He tried rolling to the powder but that failed. He called Chef over for it and he got one jug. Duncan was last to find out and Chef gave him a jug himself.
1523111111121211211121.title: next

choices: Dj tells the group of adding people
15231111111212112111211.content:
Over the next few weeks, Chef started adding more and more weight gain powder into the boys' foods. He started with 3, and by the end of the month, he had added a total of 7 gallons. And it showed.

Chef gave the boys breakfast, as usual, of 20 pounds of bacon, 100 pancakes piled high, 60 waffles, 15 pounds of sausages, and with every meal each teenager got 3 huge wedding cakes. Geoff finished his entire meal first and even before he could ask for more, Geoff was onto the cookies in front of him. Duncan finished next, and Alejandro only minutes behind and it was time for their prelunch consisting of all desserts. As Geoff Duncan Alejandro ate, Dj was still eating his breakfast. Dj had been trying and trying, but he was far behind. By the time the big boys finished their prelunch, Dj finished his breakfast.
"Man, I'm full.." Dj said. He didn't feel the eating today, and before he could say anything else, Geoff Duncan and Alejandro ate Dj's prelunch in seconds, grabbing for the cakes and pies. Although Dj had gained a huge amount of weight, he was still able to get up and weigh himself.

Dj stepped on the scale and it read "689". Dj massaged his swollen gut and looked at his body. His belly was the biggest, however his butt was pretty big too. His legs were thick and so were his arms, and although he was huge, he still felt discouraged.

Dj looked outside to see Duncan Geoff and Alejandro gorging themselves on their lunch, burgers and hotdogs that were too many to count.
Dj noted they were all well over 1000 pounds, guessing around 1300. Dj sat in the bathroom for another 15 minutes and thought of how he could gain weight, but he couldnt find a solution since he was alreadying consuming the limit of weight gain powder.

He thought about school coming up, thought about his other friends, and what they thought of his weight gain. He thought if they wanted to gain weight as well.

He decided he'd bring it up to the group later, but his stomache growled and he joined the others in stuffing their faces.
15231111111212112111211.title: next few weeks

Between his bites, Duncan said "No - Not - enough - food for - everyone".
"Hold on- " Geoff said. He grabbed a full pizza and stuffed it in his face. "If we have more people its more fun to gain, and see everyone else gain too!" Geoff said. Geoff's belly growled and he started eating again.
"It'd be funny for them to see how much food we can eaf" Alejandro said and he stuffed more slices in his mouth.
"I think we should" Geoff said, Alejandro agreed.
"As - long - as - it - doesnt interrupt - how much - food - i eat Duncan said and kept eating.
Dj smiled, knowing that seeing skiinnier people try to gain he'd probably feel more confident.

Geoff, between bites, named a few people they'd invite.
"Tyler, Trent, Justin," he said. Dj ageed, but Alejandro named a problem.
"How will we invite them?" he asked. "All of us are too big to move..."
Dj blushed, they didn't know how he was still mobile. Dj stuffed another pizza in his face.
"Hey Chef, will you do if?" Geoff asked and grabbed another few full pizzas.
Chef nodded, and he texted the 3 boys to come to Dj's house.
152311111112121121112111.title: Dj tells the group of adding people

Geoff, Duncan, Alejandro, and Dj were huge, Duncan Al and Geoff looking triple Owen's weight... or more. The bellies they worked so hard to get rid of from Dj's end of the year party grew back in minutes. and they were hooked onto Chef's cooking like magnets

Trent was watching jealously as Duncan and Gwen sat at the table talking and laughing. Trent really liked Gwen, from the moment he first saw her, and had no intentions of stalking her but when he passed by the window and saw her and Duncan eating together and looking like they were having a fun time, he couldn't help but come in to the restauraunt. To make sure she didn't get hurt by that creep Duncan and amittedly just a bit curious to what they were talking about since he did not often seem them together, hanging out in different circles one being a punk and the other more gothy. He frowned as heard that laughter as Gwen laughed at some dirty joke Duncan told her as he made a face. He couldn't believe Duncan thought telling Gwen stuff like that was funny or that Gwen laughed at it although maybe she was just being friendly. Letting an outrageous belch, Duncan leaned back, his thumbs resting on his belly, a dopey smile on his face that Trent really wanted to smack off his face, especially with what he said next.

"uuurrrp, aw Gwen, you really know how to treat a guy. That was delicious. We should do that again sometime." Gwen smirked a little and Trent couldn't believe it when she said "any time big guy." Duncan smirked back.

"No doubt. I know how you love your big guys that can eat. Kind of cooky if you ask me but I'm not complaining." Trent was now confused by this. What the heck was going on here? Gwen rubbed Duncan's stomach as he moaned in pleasure.

"See you next time and hope your session goes well," Gwen said and smacked Duncan's butt as he walked away, almost causing him to stumble but he just laughed it off as he gave a thumbs up.

"I can't stay long, gotta go, nice seeing you," Trent said nervously as he ran out leaving Gwen confused before she shrugged as she sat back down and took out her sketchbook drawing a new picture. Outside, Trent stumbled as he continued down the street, his head reeling at what he had just seen and learned in there. Duncan was having secret sessions with Gwen? More importantly, she liked big guys? That was a shocker. Stopping, Trent smiled as an idea came to him. He knew how to get Gwen's attention away from Duncan. He was going to eat more than him and win Gwen over that way. She'd drop Duncan in a heartbeat if she saw him bigger. Normally, he would have considered this a bad idea but Gwen was worth it. What was a little weight anyhow? Decided, Trent went to find something to start him off. If he was going to beat Duncan, he was going to need to eat and eat a lot. Trent wasn't ready for that and would need to get practice. What was he going to do?

Trent had seen Ms. Slater a woman of 40 fall over, blood gushing from her chest as Trent had backed up in shock. His green eyes were as big as dinnerplates as Trent was struggling to breathe from shock. A crying Austin ran from behind the ice cream counter to his dying mother's aid.

1551.content:
Alejandro was the perfect physical male specimen. Good height that was much taller than the average but not to freak size, toned arms and legs, a gorgeous six pack, and a fairly big chest. Now he granted that there were people bigger than him, but none were as clever or perfectly proportioned or handsome as he was. He could have anybody and anything he wanted just by asking and flashing a smile or a blink of his eyes. He was never used to anybody telling him no and one of the few things he loved was football. As quarterback, Alejandro lead his team to victory many times and kept expecting to do so and so he was surprised one day when he was called into coach's office.

"Yes?" Alejandro asked pleasantly and a bit confused. "You wanted to see me?" Coach Hatchet looked at him and spat.
"I'm disappointed in you." Hatchet said and Alejandro blinked, not sure if he heard that right or if he was dreaming or what.
"Ex-excuse me?" Alejandro said startled and more than a bit offended.
"You haven't been bulking up like I recommended for everyone else. Everyone here has gotten at least a bit bigger except for you. What do you have to say for yourself?"
"I don't see why I have to. I mean, why is this necessary?" Alejandro shot back.
"Wh-why! Because this year we're facing the biggest high school teams I've ever seen in years who make you guys look pathetic, that's why. They'll eat you alive."
"But I've always did my job with admirable performance without complaint, even against some pretty tough teams," Alejandro said pissed.
"Burromuerto! I don't care how good you are, if you play these guys at your current weight you'll be destroyed and our team will suck because of your refusal to do what your told. If you don't bulk up you're off the team and that's that. I can't get sued for hospital damages that might happen to you." Alejandro was shocked. Off the team? But that was his life! His friends, popularity, chicks...no! Alejandro straightened and glared at his coach.

"Fine, I'll get big. I'll bulk up so much you'll eat your words. Those other teams will go down and I will remain champion, understand? You will not cut me from the team."
"Fine, fine, whatever. Just do it already. Burromuerto, dismissed." Alejandro marched out of the office, pissed as hell and other people shrank away as Alejandro in a bad mood was never a good thing. He walked up to his friends and grabbed their big shoulders turning them around and they gulped, thinking they were in trouble.
“Duncan, Geoff,” he snapped out and they straightened up.

“Yes sir?” Geoff asked warily as they watched Alejandro pace around them angrily. They loved their friend but when he was in one of his moods, even they were terrified of him as he got nasty even to them at times. Still most of the time, he was a very good leader and they liked him, just not when he was like this.

“Coach threatened to cut me off the team,” Alejandro said angrily. Duncan looked up in shock.
“He did what? Why?”
“Coach is convinced I’m not big enough and wants me to bulk up or I’m off the team, even if I’ve won numerous games that without me you guys would have had no chance of winning.”

“He can’t do that! Why would he threaten one of our best players with such a threat? We need you!” Duncan said upset.
“Well, I know. There were so many things I wanted to say about this but it would definitely have made Coach decide to cut me and I am not doing that. I’ve decided to bulk up like required and see where it would go and I need you guys to help.”
“Really?” asked Duncan and Geoff together. “You want us to help?” Alejandro nodded.
“Yeah. You guys are my friends and I…I…I am not quite sure how I would do this without you,” Alejandro admitted grudgingly. “Not with any speed. Muscle? Possibly. But not fast or to the appropriate mass necessary. So I am going to need you two to help me.”
“Whatever you want boss,” Duncan said, tipping his mohawked head.”

“Yeah, we’ll help you dude,” Geoff said putting his arms around Alejandro and Duncan joined him and Alejandro rolled his eyes as his friends group hugged him. Tweedle dumb and tweedle dumber and he wasn’t sure which one was which at times. However, they were the best friends anyone could ask for and among the few people Alejandro liked. They knew who and what they are and did not hide it like most and they were always such fun and a hoot to be around. Feeling better he smirked as he pushed them off.
“Okay okay guys, enough with the hugging. We have work to do. So, ideas?

He IS sorta cute... and he's not a gasbag like Owen... but Cody's straight! He'd never fall in love with a guy... unless! Noah brightened and remembered a title on his bookshelf.

"I'm loving this!" Cody exclaimed giddily. "Hey Noah, could you get me some new clothes from my room?"

"Uh, sure." Noah replied, startled out of his thoughts, and left the room. He made a quick stop at his own for a moment to get a different book: "Hypnotism and Subliminal Messaging for Geniuses", but removed the book jacket so Cody couldn't tell what it was about. The snarky teen then made his way to Cody's room and acquired the requested garments. "Here ya go." Noah tossed them over and peeked over his book to watch the techno-geek get dressed.

First, Cody kicked off his shoes, revealing pudgy feet wrapped in stretched socks. He then slowly pulled on his pants, forcing them over developing thunder thighs. "Urgh..." Cody panted. "Umm... a little help?"

"Here, I'll help." Noah walked over and grabbed the back of the cargo pants, pulling them up and over Cody's rear end. "There ya go."

Thanks, Noah." The bookworm smiled faintly in response, not that the brunet noticed before tugging on his shirt. The dark yellow garment barely went down over the top part of his stomach, and its sleeves barely passed his elbows. His striped over-shirt on the other hand covered just his ample chest, an action Noah now blushed heavily at. Cody yawned and stretched his arms out tiredly. "Well, I'm gonna head off to bed. G'night!" he smiled, collecting his shoes and a thermos of what Harold had dubbed "fat juice," chugging it on the way to his room.

Noah said his farewells to Harold and zipped off to his own room.
1552121111221.title: Noah starts to be oddly attracted by this.

15521211112211.content:
Noah sat on his bed in his pajamas, holding a tape recorder in his hand. "Okay, the book says no major changes... be subtle... I can do that, easy!" Clearing his throat and turning on some relaxing New Age music, he spoke gently into the recorder. "I like guys... girls to but guys are also kinda hot... I especially like guys like Noah... skinny twiggy bookworms like him... helping me grow fatter and softer... pampering me..." He stopped the recording and listened to the playback. Satisfied, he smirked. "Perfect..."

The bookworm proceeded to sneak into Cody's room. The much wider brunet snoozed softly, not hearing Noah come in. Setting the tape down, he hit play and snuck out.

-----------

In Cody's dreams, images of Sierra chasing his old slender self began to change into visions of Noah feeding him and pampering him. The bulging brunet watched as hills of food materialized around him. Slowly, Dream!Noah slowly fed Cody every bite, rubbing him until he was blissfully lost. He could feel himself growing bigger and fatter with every bite, until he was three times his original weight; 450 pounds of soft, jiggly adipose. Dream!Noah then began to kiss, nuzzle and lovingly rub every bit of Cody he could reach.

When the dream reached his neck and head, the teen awoke. "Oh my God, that was... awesome! I think... I think I like Noah..." he muttered shakily, unsure of his sudden feelings that seemed out of nowhere. "I'm gonna go talk to him..." He sat up on his bed with a grunt. "Whew, man I'm gettin' heavy!" He chuckled, before squeezing into his clothes.

Cody waddled to find Noah, who was...
15521211112211.title: Later that night...

155212111122112.content:
in his room reading as usual. "Umm... Noah? Can I talk to you?"
"Sure..." Noah smiled nicely.
"Um... I had this weird dream last night..." Cody blushed a little. "You were in it, and feeding me, helping me get huge, bigger than Owen..." he explained, sitting down on Noah's bed which creaked loudly in protest.
"Really?"
"Yeah, I really liked it... I guess I... like you a whole lot too, hehe..." his blush deepened.
"Noah crawled over and hugged him. "I like you a lot too..." he replied.
"R-really? For how long?"
"I guess... since the ear-kiss incident back in season one..." Noah's cheeks reddened. "I only really realized it yesterday!" he rubbed his head nervously. "I guess I'm kind of a chubby chaser, though not for gasbags like Owen." Noah shuddered and went back to his hug, with Cody wrapping the bookworm in a lose bear-hug back.
"Definitely not him!" Cody giggled.
"You ready for a morning feeding?"
"Yeah!"

Noah helped Cody heave his 261 pound body up, and the two left to Harold's room. The ginger had left for breakfast, but the feeding machine's indicators were full. Cody sat on the floor next to the machine and opened his mouth for the tube. Noah turned it on and rubbed Cody's tummy as he ate. He ate until he had put on nine more pounds. "Oh, that felt good..." The brunet burped. "Excuse me!"
"You're excused." Noah replied, quickly taking measurements. "You wanna go outside and show off your new girth?"
155212111122112.title: NoCo, Thin and Thick

1552121111221121.content:
"Sure!" Cody nodded, his second chin wobbling. "Lemme get my swim trunks on!" the tubby brunet waddled off, retuning a minute later shirtless and wearing his patterned swimsuit. "A little tight, but at least it won't fall off!" The geek smiled.

Noah left to slip into his blue and red flowered trunks before leaning forward and kissing Cody on the lips, accidentally bumping his nose and sinking slightly into the bare belly. The geek didn't respond for a moment out of shock, then slowly closed his eyes and wrapped an arm around the bookworm until they parted for air. "That..." Noah panted, "was no accident."

"Nope..." Cody agreed. "You ready to show the others?"
"I dunno, is Chris sadistic?" Noah snarked in reply. Cody giggled and the pair strolled outside, holding hands.

Gwen was the only out by the pool that early in the day, relaxing under an umbrella. The geek's size quickly drew her attention. Sure she had noticed Cody packing on the pounds heavily, but seeing him shirtless drove home just how BIG he had gotten.

"Whoa, Cody... Gwen said impressed. "Just how big are you?"
"270 pounds." Cody said proudly, rubbing his girth with a free hand.
"You sure that's healthy?" the goth asked. "I mean, that's lot of weight to put on so fast..."
"He's been taking a few muscle stimulants to help him stay mobile." Noah spoke up.
"Really?" She then noticed their entwined fingers. "What's with that? Are you two-"
"Together?" the geek asked slyly.
"Yep." the bookworm answered with a smirk.
Gwen chuckled and smiled. "Just don't go cannonballing in the pool, okay?"

"Okay." Cody eased his body into the water, shuddering briefly as the he adjusted to the water temperature.
"You alright?" Noah asked, slipping in and wading over to his now-boyfriend.
"Yeah, just a little chilly."
The bookworm smiled and relaxed into the water, resting his head on the geek's floating belly.
1552121111221121.title: To the pool!

15521211112211212.content:
The pair floated quietly for awhile, barely noticing when Gwen chose to leave. Eventually, Noah was roused from his dozing by a deep gurgle in Cody's girth. "Sounds like it's time for your brunch!" the bookworm chuckled, before guiding Cody toward the steps.

"Guess so!" Cody chuckled, patting his gut. The geek hauled his waterlogged body up and out of the pool, where Noah helped towel him off. After struggling into his snug clothes, the pair made their way to Harold's room. "I hope I can put on another twenty pounds today!" Cody said gleefully as the nerd measured him.

"270... you're doing great!" Harold applauded as he wrote the data down. "Let's put on those extra 20!" Noah placed the tube in Cody's mouth and Harold flipped the machine on. The bookworm watched as Cody's body swelled bigger and bigger.
15521211112211212.title: Almost there...

choices: "Nah, I want to be soft and jiggly all over!"
155212111122112122.content:
Noah and Harold watched as the geek grew and plopped his plush rear in a simple wood chair that creaked in protest. His girth began to overtake his lap, which began to spread wider and droop slightly over the edges of his seat.

His shoes began to pull apart at the sides, showing off fat feet wrapped in painfully tight socks. The jean stitching at his butt and thighs slowly popped revealing underwear that could barely pass for a thong, followed by the seams at his shoulder and arms. Steadily, thick and heavy arm flab pushed outward, shredding his sleeves until they had split in half and hung limp from a few threads. Cody closed his eyes in pleasure at the feeling of his clothes becoming increasingly tattered, and only stopped sucking when the chair collapsed beneath him and he fell to the floor.

At the same time the machine ran dry, and the obese brunet spat the tube out. Shakily he climbed to his feet, staggering slightly as he adjusted to his new center of gravity. Noah rushed over to help, taking an arm. "I gotcha..."

"Urp... thanks Noah..." Cody replied as his body stopped jiggling briefly. He waddled over to the scale. partially using the bookworm as crutch until he stood firmly on it. "So what..." he panted, "is it Harold?"

"310!" The ginger exclaimed happily, patting Cody's belly. "You're officially bigger than Owen!"

Cody's eyes widened as he ran his hands over his girth. "Wow..." he grinned. "This feels great!"

"Y'know, maybe you should put some muscle under here..." Noah pointed out, poking a thunder thigh. "Not a lot, just enough so you can walk properly and stay relatively healthy."

Cody thought it over.

"You promise?" Cody asked, looking into Noah's dark chocolate eyes.

"I promise!" the bookworm replied, gently stripping off the ragged remains of the rotund boy's ragged clothing and watching the smooth hairless fat billow outward. He then rubbed and jiggled the geek's belly, causing the brunet to giggle. "Now, I doubt anyone's in the gym right now, so let's go." Upon arriving, the bookworm had to pull the snug trunks up over the paler male's butt, to Cody's embarrassment.

The two made their way to the gym, where they soon realized that exercising was not for Cody. He got exhausted by simply trying to use any of the equipment. Cody instead decided to get exercise by jogging around the Playa. This didn't work well though due to the brunet's immensity. But Cody tried his best not to give up.

Chris McLean arrived on the island, followed by Chef Hatchet. "Hello kiddies!" he greeted, holding a new contract aloft. "You been packing on some pounds Code?" Chris asked, lightly poking the rotund brunet.

Cody nodded and rubbed his belly proudly.

On it were the names B, Beardo, Brick, Brody, Cameron, Chet, Dave, Devin, Ennui, Jay, Junior, Leonard, Lorenzo, Max, Mickey, Mike, Rock, Rodney, Sam, Scott, Shawn, Spud, Tom and Topher.

15521211112211212212.title: Chris appears

You have a week to get ready to go, so get packed and those of you with girlfriends, say goodbye cuz you won’t be smoochin’ it up again once you arrive or until you leave!” With that, the host left the playa, and assorted chatter broke out among the cast.

“Wonder what prompted this?” Cody asked Noah from his reinforced chair, getting a shrug in response.

“Guess they just want to torture us more,” the bookworm answered, stretching briefly and leaning on Cody’s belly, a content smile on his face.”Least they can’t pull us apart!”

“Guess you’re right!” Cody smiled, laying an arm over Noah.

15531222211.content:
Total Drama Reunion: Week 1.
It has been exactly 6 months since Total Drama:All stars and everyone has settled back into their normal lives (except for Duncan who is still in prison for blowing up Chris' home). Sierra went back to writing copious amounts of fanfiction on Cody, Courtney went back to being a snobby overachiever in high school and Scott went back to the farm in the country. Problem for Scott is that despite all the horrendous stuff he was put through on the island there were also some good parts he missed.
Sunday night and Scott is looking through the empty cupboards for some decent food. 'Papi, when are ye ever gonna get in some good grub? If I ever won a task on the island I would be in a comfy bed and treated to a mighty fine meal in the morning with pancakes and proper swell toast for a whole pigpen to live off for life" exclaims Scott. His father has not been enamored by Scott's attitude since he was booted off the island, he seems to have become far to pretentious for the family's lifestyle.
Suddenly, there is a loud knock on the door which causes Scott to clumsily bang his on the cupboard door causing him to let out a loud yelp. "Now who could that be at this hour?" asks Papi. Papi opens the door to which he sees Chef Hatchet. All Chef Hatchet does is look at Papi and hands him a letter. Scott comes up behind Papi and they both mutter the letter to themselves.
Dear former Total Drama contestant, I have cordially invited you to come to Pakitew Island where you will be reunited with your friends and take part in another set of fun and sometimes grueling tasks. By the way this is not a real invite, it was in the fine print of your contract that I could force you to come back in a year. Sincerely Chris McLane.
Without having the chance to say bye, Chef Hatchet grabs Scott and throws him in the jet. Reminding himself of the good parts like decent food, Scott does not retaliate.
He arrives at the island, eagerly hoping to win every task which hopefully will be as good as last time. On the Island joining him are Noah, Mike, Justin, Owen, Cody, Trent, Duncan, Lindsay, Heather, Gwen, Dawn, Courtney, Bridgette, Leshawna and Izzy.
Before everyone can catch up properly, Chris informs them of what will entail their stay on the Island.
1st, Eliminations are the same as before
2nd, There is a million dollar prize
3rd, Boys and girls sleep in seperate cabins
4th, Lawyers say their are not enough health and safety untencils, so I went out and bought a pair of scales
%th and finally....
